author: @soonh_526
text: 캐럿이 된 지 1년도 되지 않았을 때 6주년 영상이 올라와서 너무 기뻤는데 하필이면 재계약 시기가 얼마 안 남았다길래 혹여나 완전체로 보지 못 하면 어떡하지 했는데 걱정이 무색하게도 약 두 달뒤 전원 재계약 이라는 공지글이 올라와서 말로 표현을 못 할 정도로 기쁘고 너무 신났었습니다 앞으로 이 좋은 사람들과 오래 함께 할 수 있다는 생각에 이 세상을 다 가진 기분이었는데 벌써 내년에 재계약이라니..... 시간이 이렇게 빠른 걸 보니 캐럿이 된 이후의 제 하루하루가 너무나도 행복했었나봅니다!! 이 빌어먹을 세상 속에서 한줄기의 빛같은 내 사람들(세븐틴 캐럿)을 또 한번 오래 볼 수 있기를 간절히 바랄게요 한명이라도 없으면 너무너무 허전한 세븐틴이에요 꼭 몇년 뒤에도 완전체로 볼 수 있기를 정말 제 모든 걸 걸고 빌어볼게요 🥺🩷🩵

author: @MIRI-v5f
text:
ネ サランウン キョウ イゴバッケ アン ドェ 내 사랑은겨우 이것밖에 안 돼 僕の愛はたったこれだけしかない
 
アンニョン ナエ キップミヨ 안녕, 나의 기쁨이여 こんにちは 僕の喜びよ  キプン チョルマンエド 깊은 절망에도 深い絶望でも
 
ハンサン ウッケ ヘ By my side 항상 웃게 해 By my side いつも笑わせてくれて そばに居て  チャムシ モドゥン ゴル 잠시 모든 걸 しばらくの間すべてを
 
イッケ ヘジョ 잊게 해 줘 忘れさせてくれ  アヌン ノレル トゥルゴ One step 아는 노랠 틀고 One step 知ってる歌を流して 1歩  トゥ ソヌル チャプコ パルル Two step 두 손을 잡고 발을 Two step 両手をつないで足を 2歩
 
オヌセ オヌレ ナエゲ 어느새 오늘의 나에게 いつのまにか今日の自分に  ネイレ ノル パラゲ ヘ 내일의 널 바라게 해 明日の君を望ませる  Baby It's alright Oh It's okay  ネ コジンマル タ アヌン ゴン 내 거짓말 다 아는 건 僕の嘘を全部知ってるのは
 
ノップニラ, O ah 너뿐이라, O ah 君だけだから  ト コマウォ 더 고마워 ありがとう  カックムン チチョ 가끔은 지쳐 たまには疲れて
 
コゲ スギョ ウヌン ノル ポル ッテ 고개 숙여 우는 널 볼 때 うつむいて泣く君を見るとき
 
オッチョル チュル モルヌン ナン 어쩔 줄 모르는 난 どうしていいか分からない僕は
 
ムォル ハル ス イッスルッカ 뭘 할 수 있을까 何ができるだろうか
 
チョンマル ミアネ 정말 미안해 本当にごめん  ネ サランイ キョウ 내 사랑이 겨우 僕の愛はたった  イゴバッケ アンドェ 이것밖에 안 돼 これだけしかない
 
クレド ネ ギョテ イッソジョソ 그래도 내 곁에 있어 줘서 それでも僕のそばにいてくれて  コマウォ My baby 고마워 My baby ありがとう  ネ サランイ キョウ 내 사랑이 겨우 僕の愛がやっと
 
イゴッバッケ アン ドェド 이것밖에 안 돼도 これだけしかなくても
 
オヌ キョウレド ノエ ポミ トェルケ 어느 겨울에도 너의 봄이 될게 どんな冬でも君の春になるよ  ネ マウミ キョウ イロン マレ 내 마음이 겨우 이런 말 해 僕の心がやっとこんな言葉を言う
 
ッソダジヌン ユソンウチョロム 쏟아지는 유성우처럼 降り注ぐ流星雨のように  ッカマン ハヌレ ピチ トェ ジョ 까만 하늘에 빛이 돼 줘 黒い空で光になってくれ  I can do everything for you きみのためなら何でもできる
 
ナン ノエゲ 난 너에게 僕は君に  ムォドゥンジ タ チュゴ シプン 뭐든지 다 주고 싶은 何でもしてあげたい
 
マウムマン コソ 마음만 커서 気持ちだけが大きくて  チャガジヌン ナヌン 작아지는 나는 小さくなる僕は  パッキマン ハヌン パボ 받기만 하는 바보 もらってばかりのバカ
 
オヌセ ネガ ミウォソ 어느새 내가 미워서 いつのまにか自分が憎くて  ノエゲ トウク ミアネ 너에게 더욱 미안해 君にもっと申し訳なくて  Baby It's alright Oh It's okay
 
ネ コジンマル タ アヌン ゴン 내 거짓말 다 아는 건 僕の嘘を全部知ってるのは  ノップニラ, O ah ト コマウォ 너뿐이라, O ah　더 고마워 君だから ありがとう  カックムン チチョ 가끔은 지쳐 たまに疲れて
 コゲ スギョ ウヌン ノル ポル ッテ 고개 숙여 우는 널 볼 때 うつむいて泣く君を見るとき
 
オッチョル チュル モルヌン ナン 어쩔 줄 모르는 난 どうしていいか分からない僕は  ムォル ハル ス イッスルッカ 뭘 할 수 있을까 何ができるだろうか  チョンマル ミアネ 정말 미안해 本当にごめん
 
ネ サラギ キョウ 내 사랑이 겨우 僕の愛はたった  イゴバッケ アンドェ 이것밖에 안 돼 これだけしかない  クレド ネ ギョテ イッソジョソ 그래도 내 곁에 있어 줘서 それでも僕の傍にいてくれて
 
コマウォ My baby 고마워 My baby ありがとう  ネ サランイ キョウ 내 사랑이 겨우 僕の愛がたった
 
イゴッバッケ アン ドェド 이것밖에 안 돼도 これだけしかなくても
 
オヌ キョウレド ノエ ポミ トェルケ 어느 겨울에도 너의 봄이 될게 どんな冬でも君の春になるよ  ネ マウミ キョウ イロン マレ 내 마음이 겨우 이런 말 해 僕の心がやっとこんな言葉を言って
 
オリョプケ ネ マウム チョグン 어렵게 내 마음 적은 かろうじて僕の気持ちを書いた  イ ノレワ カサップニジマン 이 노래와 가사뿐이지만 この歌と歌詞だけだけど  For you for you for you for you  イ ノレン ノル ウィヘ プルロ Tonight 이 노랜 널 위해 불러 Tonight この歌は君のために歌うよ 今夜
 
ニ サランエ タガガル ス イッケ 네 사랑에 다가갈 수 있게 君の愛に近づけるように  ネ サランイ キョウ イゴバッケ アンドェ 내 사랑이 겨우 이것밖에 안 돼 僕の愛はたった これだけしかない
 
クレド ネ マウムン 그래도 내 마음은 それでも僕の気持ちは  ピョンチ アナ ノエゲマン Baby 변치 않아 너에게만 Baby 変わらない 君にだけ  ネ サラギ キョウ 내 사랑이 겨우 僕の愛はたった
 
イゴバッケ アン トェド 이것밖에 안 돼도 これだけしかなくても  ピ ネリヌン ノエ 비 내리는 너의 雨が降る君の  ウサニ トェ ジュルケ 우산이 돼 줄게 傘になってあげるよ  チキョジュルケ ノエ モドゥン ナレ 지켜줄게 너의 모든 날에 守ってあげる 君のすべての日を

author: @violet-tq5ul
text:
I cried while listening to this song without understanding much but it made me so emotional multiple times. And just recently, I looked up the lyrics translated into English, I found myself just weeping and sobbing. 

Thank you Woozi, Bumzu and all the members for putting out such beautiful pieces of art in the world. I became a carat around 2 years ago, but each season I get stuck on new songs that were released years ago. Before becoming a carat, K-pop songs rarely could make me cry, but with Seventeen..there are separate playlists for such moments. It's so beautiful that we all as human beings can feel such deep and intense emotions when listening to creations of other just the same human beings. There's so much love and admiration that I can't seem to put into words. I just hope that all the members feel loved and fulfilled. 

while there's seventeen, there's hope in life.

author: @unshallowkyeomie
text:
Nah I'm always late to masterpieces 😭
I recently discovered this song, and from Carat's comments and the emotions they brought on this song (that's why I fell in love with Seventeen, they're such a storyteller, full of emotions) I've known the meaning without even need to search the full translation. Beautiful
Another thing I love about them, we don't really need any other guitar cover or remixes from anyone because they already did it themselves. 
The first time I heard this song, I really love Woozi's intro with the guitar... But the continuation of the song is really not what I expected, 'cause I really want the guitar to somehow still going throughout the song or at least popped again at some part of the song. But no.. 
So here I am today, searching a guitar cover of this song, and delighted to find this, another acoustic ver. by Seventeen themselves and I absolutely LOVE this version more. It needs to be on music streaming services 😍🎉
Now I feel guilty for being reallllyy late to join this fandom 🥲🥲🩷🩵

author: @dearmliz
text:
You probably won't read this, SVT. BUT, I handwrote the lyrics to this song in a letter that I gave my husband before I went into my third heart surgery not knowing if I'd make it out. We're both huge Seventeen stans ...  this song means so much to us both. Despite having so much to say to him, I felt this song would do it for me.
I love you, Seventeen.

author: @abigailm8608
text:
lyrics for myself to learn korean:

안녕, 나의 기쁨이여
Hi, my joy

깊은 절망에도
Even in my deep despairs

항상 웃게 해 By my side
You always make me laugh by my side

잠시 모든 걸 잊게 해 줘
Momentarily it makes me forget about everything

아는 노랠 틀고 One step
Turn on a song we know and take one step

두 손을 잡고 발을 Two step
Hold hands and our feet move two step

어느새 오늘의 나에게 내일의 널 바라게 해
Somehow you make today’s me look forward to tomorrow’s you

Baby It's alright
Oh It's okay
 
내 거짓말 다 아는 건 너뿐이라
Because it’s only you who knows all my lies

O ah 더 고마워
O ah I’m more thankful

가끔은 지쳐 고개 숙여 우는 널 볼 때
Sometimes when tired and I see you with your head down crying

어쩔 줄 모르는 난 뭘 할 수 있을까
Me, who doesn’t know what to do, what can I possibly do?

정말 미안해
Really, I’m sorry

 
내 사랑이 겨우 이것밖에 안 돼
My love only amounts to this

그래도 내 곁에 있어 줘서 고마워 My baby
But thank you for staying by my side my baby

내 사랑이 겨우 이것밖에 안 돼도
Even if my love only amounts to this

어느 겨울에도 너의 봄이 될게
Any winter, I’ll be your spring

내 마음이 겨우 이런 말 해
My heart can only say these words



쏟아지는 유성우처럼
Like a spilling meteor shower

까만 하늘에 빛이 돼 줘
Be a light in the dark sky

I can do everything for you

난 너에게 뭐든지 다 주고 싶은 마음만 커서
I only have a big heart that wants to give you everything

작아지는 나는 받기만 하는 바보
Me, who is becoming smaller, a fool who only receives

어느새 내가 미워서
At some point, I started hating myself

너에게 더욱 미안해
Towards you I’m even more sorry

Baby It's alright
Oh It's okay

내 거짓말 다 아는 건 너뿐이라
Because it’s only you who knows all my lies

O ah 더 고마워
O ah I’m more thankful

가끔은 지쳐 고개 숙여 우는 널 볼 때
Sometimes when tired and I see you with your head down crying

어쩔 줄 모르는 난 뭘 할 수 있을까
Me, who doesn’t know what to do, what can I possibly do?

정말 미안해
Really, I’m sorry

 
내 사랑이 겨우 이것밖에 안 돼
My love only amounts to this

그래도 내 곁에 있어 줘서 고마워 My baby
But thank you for staying by my side my baby

내 사랑이 겨우 이것밖에 안 돼도
Even if my love only amounts to this

어느 겨울에도 너의 봄이 될게
Any winter, I’ll be your spring

내 마음이 겨우 이런 말 해
My heart can only say these words


 
어렵게 내 마음 적은 이 노래와 가사뿐이지만
It’s just this song and lyrics I wrote about my feelings with difficulty, but

For you for you for you for you
 
이 노랜 널 위해 불러 Tonight
I sing this song for you tonight

네 사랑에 다가갈 수 있게
So that I can get closer to your love

 
내 사랑이 겨우 이것밖에 안 돼
My love only amounts to this

그래도 내 마음은 변치 않아 너에게만 Baby
But my heart won’t change, it’s only for you baby

내 사랑이 겨우 이것밖에 안 돼도
Even if my love only amounts to this

비 내리는 너의 우산이 돼 줄게
I’ll be your umbrella when it rains

지켜줄게 너의 모든 날에
I’ll protect you in all your days

author: @효링-x7g
text:
안녕 나의 기쁨이여
이 노래는 항상 들으면 울컥하게 되는데
이 영상이랑 같이 보면 항상 울게 되더라.
가사가 너무 이뻐서 매 번 위로가 되어주는것 같아. 속상하고 힘들 때 마다 나를 이렇게 사랑해주는 사람들이 있다는 생각을 하면 진짜 너무 고마워 뭐라도 다 주고만 싶어져.

어느 겨울에도 너의 봄이 될게
내 마음이 겨우 이런 말 해

항상 우릴 위해서 노래해줘서 고마워.

비 내리는 너의 우산이 돼 줄게
지켜줄게 너의 모든 날에

author: @기기대기대
text:
겨우가 진짜 사람 미치게 하는 노래네 난 이걸 왜 이제알았지 진짜 하...
'안녕 나의 기쁨이여' 상대방을 자신의 기쁨 이라고 표현할 정도로, 내가 절망을 하는 중에도 상대만 보면 웃음이 나오고 아픔과 힘듦을 잊게 할 정도로 상대에 대한 마음이 큰데 그런 마음을 겨우라고 표현하고

내가 너에게 주는 사랑보다 네가 나에게 주는 마음이 더 커서 너는 내가 힘들때 나를 일으켜 세우는 원동력이고 너만 보면 웃음이 나올 정도로 나의 기쁨인데 날 일으켜 세우고 웃게하는 너에 비해 난 네가 힘들어할때를 알아차려서 직접 위로해주지도 못하고 노래 가사로 간접적으로만 위로해줄 수 있으니
너가 나에게 준 것에 비해 내가 너에게 주는 마음이 턱없이 부족하게 느껴져서 겨우 이 정도의 사랑 표현밖에 못해서 미안하다는거아냐 진짜 미쳤네 아 돌아버리겠다진짜 과몰입 어쩔거냐거

author: @Belieberbtch
text:
[Intro: WOOZI]
My love only amounts to this

[Verse 1: Jeonghan, Vernon, WONWOO]
Hello, my joy
Even in deep despair
You always make me laugh, by my side
You let me forget everything for a moment
Play a song I know and one step
Hold my hands and put my feet in, two steps
Before I know it, the me of today
Hopes for the you of tomorrow

[Pre-Chorus: Joshua, HOSHI, Jun]
Baby, it's alright
Oh, it's okay
The person to know all my secrets
Is you, oh-ah, so I'm even more thankful
Sometimes when you get tired
And I see you crying with your head down
I don't know what to do, what can I do
I'm really sorry

[Chorus: Dino, DK, S.Coups]
My love only amounts to this
But thank you for staying by my side, my baby
Even if my love only amountsto this
I'll be your spring to whatevеr winter it may be
This is all my heart can say

[Verse 2: WONWOO, Seungkwan, MINGYU, S.Coups]
Just likе a pouring meteor shower
Please be the light in the dark sky
I can do everything for you
For you
I just want to give you everything
And that makes me feel small, a fool who only accepts
It suddenly makes me hate myself
And makes me feel sorrier towards you

[Pre-Chorus: WOOZI, THE 8, HOSHI]
Baby, it's alright
Oh, it's okay
The person to know all my secrets
Is you, oh-ah, so I'm even more thankful
Sometimes when you get tired
And I see you crying with your head down
I don't know what to do, what can I do
I'm really sorry

[Chorus: DK, MINGYU, Vernon]
My love only amounts to this
But thank you for staying by my side, my baby
Even if my love only amounts to this
I'll be your spring to whatever winter it may be
This is all my heart can say

[Bridge: Dino, DK, Seungkwan]
Though it was hard writing my feelings down
And all I have is this song and these lyrics
For you, for you, for you, for you
I sing this song for you tonight
So I can get closer to your love

[Chorus: Joshua, Jun, Jeonghan]
My love only amounts to this
But my feelings will never change, for you baby
Even if my love only amounts to this
I'll be your umbrella in the rain
I'll protect you on all your days

아 정말 들을때마다 눈물이 남 
나혼자 스스로가 한심스러울때마다 사용하던 ‘겨우’라는 단어가 이렇게 애틋하고 따스하게 다가온게 처음이고 
너무나도 과분한 사랑을 받고있다 생각했는데 그 사랑이 ‘겨우 이것밖에 안돼‘라는 말이 너무 고맙고 더 많이 사랑해주고 싶어짐

author: @viengsub
text:
Baru ngeh sama liriknya. Nangis bangett. 
Sayang sebong banyak banyak.

"Halo kebahagiaanku."
"Sayang, tidak apa apa." 
"Cintaku hanya sebesar ini. Namun hatiku tidak akan berubah."
"Aku akan menjadi musim semimu di semua musim dingin." 
"Kamu selalu berada di sisiku." 
"Terimakasih sayangku." 
"Aku benar benar minta maaf." 
"Aku bisa melakukan apapun untukmu." 
"Aku tidak bisa melakukan apapun." 

Nae sarang.

author: @DayandNight-utb
text:
나 또 들으러 왔네 ,, 이 영상은 언제봐도 새롭고 예쁘고 아름답고 벅차오른다 정말로 
배경도 너무 예쁘고 흰티에 청바지 코디도 다들 너무 찰떡이야
노래 가사 하나하나 음 하나하나 소중하게 불러주고 마음을 꾹꾹 눌러담아줘서 너무 고마워
겨우는 특히 가사가 정말 정말 예쁘기 때문에 계속 듣게 되고 듣는 내내 감탄하고 ,,
진짜 우리가 해주고 싶고 해줘야 될 얘기들을 노래해주는 이런 가수가 ..어딨냐고 진짜로 ,,
누가 뭐래도 서로만 믿고 가고 사랑할게♥️✨

author: @wooyazi
text:
겨우를 아무리 들어도 질리지 않는 이유.... 
0:18 우지 목소리로 훅 들어오는 도입부부터가 일단 사기
3:03 타임라인 가장 많이 다시 본 장면으로까지 된ㅋㅋㅋ 이 부분...
우지&도겸 미친 화음에서부터 시작해서 폭풍처럼 몰아치는 보컬팀 애드립 부분 ㅠㅠㅠ
그러다 마지막은 정한이로 딱 노래가 끝나는거... 이게 진짜 사람 미치게 함...ㅠㅠ 여운도 엄청 남고...
다른 멤버들도 각자 파트에서 목소리가 다 예쁘게 잘 들려서 더 좋음 ㅠㅠ 
처음에는 멜로디 자체가 너무 좋아서 좋아했던 곡인데 가사 조차 너무 좋다.... '내사랑은 겨우 이거밖에 안돼' 라니...ㅠㅠㅠㅠ
겨우 음원도 너무 좋지만 이 밴드라이브 영상 낸건 진짜 손꼽히게 잘한 것 같다...

author: @gxly
text: every time I discovered svt songs it always leave me an impression of how good the music was perfectly composed and how it is possible to make me feel loved and helpless with my situation got me thinking that they are days when I feel so loved and contented and also days when I can't do anything but to say  'it is what it is' and proceed to go on with life. And this song hit so hard. Tha first time I heard this was when I am struggling but idk yet what does the lyrics means. I find the melody soft (idk the correct term but that's the feeling I got when I listened to this) and somehow comforting yet sad.

author: @vastlxgy
text:
I dedicated this song to my boyfriend because I love him so much and Seventeen is my favorite k-pop group and love them so much because their songs helped me through a lot of things that happened in my life.

I told my boyfriend my story with seventeen and he was happy that they make me happy, so he supports me as a carat, because for the 2020 MAMA we watch it together and was cheering for them (even tho, he doesn't listen to kpop that he really liked mamamoo) he liked a lot semicolon album, specially Light a Flame and for my birthday he gifted me the new lightstick.

And what a wonderful time to dedicate this song to him because they're my two favorite people in the world. 💙

author: @hudafatima2564
text: Can we talk abt how realistic artists are svt. Like this song basically says that they are sorry for loving us only as their fans, "my love only amounts to this" and how they want to give so much to us than just a song and its lyrics... but also sends the mssg that they are so thankful for us to love them nonetheless, "it's alright, it's okay, I'm more thankful of you".i have never heard a more realistic song. Most songs that idols dedicate to their fans basically say that wanna stay with them forever and how they will do anything for them but we know those are really unrealistic things to say, but here we have svt giving us a song that defines our relationship with them which them being so thankful to us for our presence and words of encouragement that it's their biggest strength

author: @iulpeh_ss142
text: Baru kepoin seventeen beberapa hari yang lalu. Dan selalu kagun sama pembagian jatah lagu+screentime yang adill bangettttt enggak jomplang (bukan yang main vocal kebagian nyanyi hampir 50%) tapi semua adill. Dan mereka tuh bener2 berkembang bareng2, semua member ada credit nulis lagu+composing. Pas ada dance nya juga yg center bukan hanya main dance aja tp Semua kebagian center. Mgkn ini sebab nya juga carat gak kebagi bagi sama solo stan. Ahhh jatuh cinta sama grup+fandom nya. Aku telat banget tau seventeen 😭😭

author: @weminid
text:
다른 그룹 누군가가 멋있어 보이고, 나를 웃게 한다고 해도 나에겐 역시 너희가 제일 멋있다는 걸, 나의 가장 큰 웃음은 너희라는 걸 너희들은 알까. 
세븐틴은 나에게 가장 큰 선물이자 가장 큰 인물이야. 너희들의 사랑은 절대 작지 않아. 너희가 주는 큰 사랑에 너무나도 행복하고 고마워서 어쩔 줄 모르는 난 기어코 울게 돼. 나한텐 그런 너희밖에 없어. 사랑해.

author: @핑-w8j-h5n
text: ‘내 사랑은 겨우 이것밖에 안돼.’ 이렇게 사람의 마음을 절절 울리는 문구가 어디있을까… 우지의 감성은 항상 내 생각을 뛰어넘고 그걸 받쳐주는 모든 멤버들의 음색과 진심이 잘 어우러져서 더 큰 감동을 주는 것 같다… 세븐틴이라는 팀을 좋아하는 이유는 외모와 끼도 있겠지만 그걸 잊히게 만드는 실력과 서로가 주는 사랑인 것 같아. 우리가 앞으로도 함께할 수 많은 시간들에 행복이라는 색깔로 덧입히자 사랑해!

author: @형인생왜그렇게사-f1o
text:
지금까지 아이돌은 잘생겨서 이뻐서 팬이 되는 경우가 많다고 생각했는데
세븐틴은 정말 아티스트적으로 너무 멋지다 생각함. 저렇게 자기일을 사랑하고 열심히하는게 쉽지않은데 볼 때마다 감탄+존경 그리고 팬분들한테 고마워하는게 잘 보여서 더 응원해주고싶음. 
세븐틴은 성적에 연연하지않고 본인들이 원하는 무대를 하고싶고 보여줬으면 됐어 다들 언젠가 알아줄거야 하는 느낌이 더 눈물나게만듬
항상 잘 할 필요도 없으니 쉬어가면서 행복하게 활동했음 좋겠다!!! 항상 응원해 세븐틴 ❤️

author: @winwinsonlylinesinboss
text: i think the best part of being a carat is that seventeen don't try to ignore the relationship and they are perfectly ok if we leave. And all they want is to be a comforting presence in our lives. That making a positive impact, is what they strive for. And if we experienced that with them, they're proud that they were able to be this figure. And it makes me feel comforted that as much as I helped them, they helped me in return by doing their best and showing me amazing music. There's nothing I appreciate more. We all have our own lives to live, but for right now, all I really need is seventeen to comfort me right now.

For who want to learn about them through unit,
Pink mics = vocal unit
Silver mics = performance unit
White, gold, orange, blue = hiphop unit

Vocal and performance always got the same color mics for their unit, and hip hop unit with variety of color

author: @jacobpark1494
text:
Dear Carats,

*Happy 6th Anniversary! It hasn't been long since I've been a Carat, but it was my BEST decision knowing SEVENTEEN! I may not know you guys, but thanks for being a Carat with me! I appreciate ALL the hard work SEVENTEEN did! I still CAN'T believe it's already been 6 years. I'll be a Carat forever from now on, I will always remember SEVENTEEN EVEN when they disband! And again, thanks for being a Carat with me, ily! And to end it, everyone please stay safe and healthy, I hope!*

Edit: Sorry if I'm bad at English, English isn't my first language. I apologize.

author: @brightafterrain9953
text:
Tears in my eyes... I've lost count of how many times I've watched this now... 

Today, from the moment Jihoon began to sing, my eyes caught on the sunlight glowing against his hair.
The twinkling chimes before the bass comes in...
The clarity of Chan's voice, the confidence in Mingyu's. 
How Seungcheol pours out a feeling I'll never understand into his microphone. 

There are just... layers to this experience. Every time.

[English]
My love is only this

Hello my joy
Even in deep despair
Always make me laugh By my side
Let me forget everything for a moment

author: @hxxixx
text:
세븐틴 얼굴에 집중 되고 풍경에 집중 돼서 가사는 잘 못들었는데 세 번째 들었을 때 참 슬픈 가사라는 걸 깨달았다. 나의 사랑이 이것 밖에 안 되는데 곁에 있어줘서 고맙다는 말에 나도 모르게 울컥했다. 이렇게 보면 참 가사 잘 지었다 생각 됨... 끝에 baby 라고 하는게 더 슬프다... 가사대로 상황을 상상해보니 생각하는 것보다 더 슬픈 것 같음... 세븐틴 좋아한지 얼마 안 됐는데 대부분의 멤버들이 노래도 부르고 랩도 하는 모습에 얼마나 놀랐는지... 랩하고 노래 하는 것도 대단한데 이런 슬픈 노래에 감정을 실어주어서 너무 대단하다고 생각했다. 세븐틴 영상의 어느 한 댓글을 본 적이 있는데 세븐틴 노래는 마치 뮤지컬 같다는 댓글이었다. 이번에 나온 타이틀 곡 ready to love도 뮤지컬 같은 곡이어서 매일 아침마다 틀고 외출 준비하는 건 안 비밀😅 마음 같아선 평생 세븐틴으로 살아달라고 하고 싶다. 

세븐틴은 최애 차애 이런 걸 정할 수가 없을만큼 13명 모두 각자의 매력이 넘쳐흐른다. 인생을 길게 살진 않았지만 아마 내 인생에서 가장 최고의 아이돌이라고 생각한다. 내가 늙어서도 세븐틴은 꼭 기억하고 싶다.

I couldn't hear the lyrics well because I was focused on SEVENTEEN's face and focused on the scenery, but when I listened to it for the third time, I realized that the lyrics were really sad. This is the only love I have, but when I said thank you for being by my side, I cried without knowing it. Looking at it like this, I think the lyrics are really well written... It's sadder to say baby at the end... When I imagine the situation according to the lyrics, it's sadder than I thought... It's been a while since I've liked Seventeen, but most of the members also sing I was amazed at how much he rapping... It's great to rap and sing, but I thought it was great because he put emotion into such a sad song. I saw a comment on a Seventeen video, and it was a comment that Seventeen's song is like a musical. The title song "Ready to Love" released this time is also like a musical, so it's no secret to play it every morning and prepare to go out 😅 I think I want to live as Seventeen for the rest of my life. Seventeen is so overflowing with their own charms that it is impossible to decide on such a thing as a favorite Cha-ae. I didn't have a long life, but I think he's probably the best idol in my life. Even when I grow old, I want to remember Seventeen.

author: @aspxryn
text:
Funny how it's always: "Carats are spoiled from love. You guys are so lucky" because we receive gifts like these but little did they know that we're luckier to have seventeen because in every release that they do, it's dedicated fo us. I hope this will become another motivation for you when you're feeling discouraged. I believe in us, we believe in them, and they believe in us too. Let's break our own goals and records.

So much love to SEVENTEEN and CARATS

text:
thanks for everything, we carats are very grateful at seventeen. You bring me happiness, and for all carats, I am very proud of you. We are a team, a big family, Carat + Seventeen = family. Thank you very much for everything, you are very important to me, I love you very much and I am very grateful and happy to have you in my life. Seventeen, happy birthday. I love you.
Being carat was one of the best choices I made. You are very talented boys, we love you. Stay safe. Thank you and happy birthday💎✨

author: @mq6845
text:
Lovely version, but don't know what's happening with those instruments at the back, like I wanna say "are you okay? " HAHAHAHA, but anyways I REALLY LOVE THIS VERSION, I'm just smiling through the whole video, especially when I saw dino dunno why, and yes I love this song, but to be honest , I didn't like the mixing of their studio version, so I thought that maybe it was intentional for something coming, and here we are, just them, not dissapointing us, for all these years they are always like this, but yeah thank you for all, as always we love you, you love us, and as always we will support you.

I'm out of words but...

HAPPY 6TH YEAR IN THE INDUSTRY. 



But yeah I just wanna add this, because I don't want to waste this opportunity to say how much jisoo improved in singing, he was a good vocalist yeah it's given, but through years of improving, THIS IS HIS GLOW UP,  His voice got clearer and the control was on point, and now he got the full confidence on showing his abilities, I'm just proud, just me being teary, this is what he deserved, I'M JUST HAPPY FOR HIM, MAYBE JISOO YOU'LL READ THIS OR NOT, BUT CONGRATULATIONS TO YOUR IMPROVEMENT, I'M ALWAYS PROUD OF YOU, AND US CARATS WE WILL ALWAYS LOVE YOU, LIKE LOOK, YOU ARE REALLY SHINING IN THIS VIDEO, I LOVE YOU, AND TO ALL OF THE MEMBERS THANK YOU FOR THIS FOR THE ARRANGEMENT, BAND, AND EVERYONE BEHIND THIS, THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR MAKING THIS SONG ALIVE (NOT ALIKE FROMM STUDIO VER. HEHE) 


SHINING DIAMONDS, AGAIN, HAPPY ANNIVERSARRY!

author: @jennieslover13
text:
Ay, me gustó muchísimo este Special Video de la canción All My Love, estuvo bien bonita. Esta fue la primera vez que escuché esta canción, y, aunque no sepa coreano, la melodía de la canción se me hizo muy bonita y tranquilazadora de escuchar. Sentía que estaba en paz al escuchar esta canción, de en serio me gustó muchísimo All My Love. 

Me gustó muchísimo el vestuario de los chicos en este Special Video, el lugar donde se grabó fue muy bonita, el ambiente era como muy tranquilo y le daba como un toque mágico a la canción en sí. Y por último, los colores y la forma en la que se editó el Special Video me pareció muy bonita.

author: @vnree
text:
WAIT OMG GUYS, the dislike ratio compared to the likes & views on this video tho
as of rn it only has 204 dislikes & this has only been a week or so?? that's kinda amazing. I'm glad a lot of ppl rly did enjoy this. I hope you all feel comforted by this song

*edit: I just got back from checking other svt vids & I think the same kinda goes for all the other videos on the svt channel here?* *_Us, Again_* has 4.6M views, 263k likes, 300ish dislikes, *_Jun's SBG_* is 2M views, 239k likes, 300ish dislikes, *_GoSe "The Tag"_* (highest views for GoSe that I know of) has 7.4M views, 381k likes & only 1.2k dislikes. I wonder where the views are coming from? streaming? that or a lot of accs didn't rly interact w the video (like & comment) & only watched it ._.

this is just smth that I noticed, but anw it's just a reminder to please do interact by liking & commenting on the video as it helps w the yt algorithm if you haven't alr

author: @Jeongin3-j5p
text: no por favor me duele :(((( siento a mí corazón llenarse de sentimientos tan suaves, dulces, tiernos y tristes. son todo lo qué necesitó pa no deprimir me, vosotros hacen que tenga ganas de seguir esforzándome cada día por mis ideales, hacen qué con sólo recordar sus caritas bonitas me alegre en milisegundos. esperó con todo mí corazoncito qué siempre se dibujé una sonrisa en su rostro, qué no se ponga tristes por leer comentarios desagradables, qué sigan dándome alegría por mucho tiempo y lo más importante qué por favor no se sobrepasen al momento de ensayar o en cualquier otra actividad ligada con su increíble trabajo. les agradezco por todo lo qué hacen por y para carat, también por ser mí salvación en situaciones tan abrumadoras, por compartir su talento al mundo y por dejarme indirectamente decir qué son "mis chicos". wa llorar con esta canción :(((( pero sin duda será la forma más hermosa de amar esta obra de arte hecha por un encantador grupo cómo seventeen⁠. ¡te amo con todas mis fuerzas wen junhui uwu! ;3 ♡

author: @buonopomodoro3204
text: I imagine they texted through the group chat to go for “white” as the clothing coding. It’s kinda funny how all of their t-shirts kinda resemble themselves. Wonwoo’s “not from paris madame” in tiny, Joshua’s literal “t-shirt” printed shirt, Vernon’s shirt over the tee, Jeonghan’s medium sleeves for some reason, Minghao’s loosen button up with the pale bandana tied, Mingyu’s typography looking like those from a magazine, Hoshi’s “Move me” print, Jun’s opened up shirt with medium short sleeves, Woozi’s button up with the sleeves cuffed, Cheol’s front pocket attached with blue cursive writing, Seungkwan’s button up with an undone bowtie I believe, Dk ACTUALLY using a plain t-shirt and Dino with a sort of company logo? I don’t know if I’m the only one, but the shirts they chose make sense to who they are as a person. It’s funny.

author: @KennieKemala
text:
Hello seventeen and carat,

I know it's already passed May 26 and i guess it's never too late to pour my feelings toward our 6 year journey

It was not short, honestly it was long journey. I almost have seen all the ups and downs we've been through. Being each other strength for 6 years it was never been easy and it's overwhelming that our feeling towards each other still firmly stay the same, like i can't believe it you trust me as much as i do, you love me as much as i do.

Words never been enough to say everything that i feel towards you guys really..i just conclude all these feelings for you guys with my sincere gratitude, i hope you understand that i can't give you any materialistic things but i hope my gratitude could touch your heart so you guys could atleast feel ease and warm.

Once again, happy birthday :)

text: ahh sorry I'm late but I really have to show my ult group love!!!! this was so raw, beautiful, and precious. seventeen is very dear to our hearts. it's not just about being fans but genuinely loving and supporting and wanting the best for seventeen as a group of amazing individuals who are human & deserving of happiness in their everyday lives. thank you so much for inspiring us & working so SO damn hard. you all have something special together and we cherish that. always & forever in our hearts you will be cherished, and know you have successfully conveyed all the feelings and thoughts you've tried so hard to constantly show us. thank you thank you !!!!! we're so proud to be carats and we're so proud of you !!!!! ♡

author: @huangrenjunism
text:
forgive me for this cheesy and mildly cringe long essay comment in advance lol. but svt deserves it <3

so i was gonna write a really long comment of how much i'm proud of seventeen, how much i love and adore them, how much i want to support them, and how their journey to come where they are will never cease to impress me and make me emotional. but i can't even put it into words, which may sound a bit cheesy lol, so i'm just gonna wing it.
seventeen has always felt like a place to call home, even though they are just thirteen people across the world on the internet. but somehow they have succeeded into bringing so many different and beautiful types of people together and giving them a makeshift home. even when i don't watch svt content/music for awhile, i can always come back to them and immediately feel endless amounts of warmth and love that brings such a large amount of happiness. they love us so much and we love them back, but they have also taught us to not rely on them. they have taught us to love others and ourselves and to not make them the center of lives. they make me, and i'm sure many other people, appreciate the people and things around me, and i genuinely adore them for that. i don't think i could ever express how amazed i am by the endless amounts of love and talent they have. i guess you could say their power of love is truly astonishing *wink wink* (sorry to anyone who read that lmfao)
happy (3 days late) 6th anniversary loves, you deserve all the success and love in the world. thank you so much for everything <3

author: @blackplasticbagandgraytowe9169
text:
Seventeen,, 13 angels,, stanning them is the best decision in my life.

I have been stanning them since 2018, after they release 'Thanks' song. I really can't describe how precious that song bringing me into diamond life. 

After listening to that song ,, I start listen to their song since debut to learn all things about them.

Yeah, they songs really... I can't describe how much beautiful their song are.. Not just one, two or three of their songs,, I'm telling you the truth, *all of their songs* .

Since that time,, my life become happier than before. I really can't tell you how much I feel grateful to have them in my life. 

That year,, 2018,, I feel that year really worst year for me. Being compared to other student, being push to study hard for exam, I really feel down when I'm not doing my best in exam because I'm scared to make mistake. Really,, I really hate myself that time. 

But,, since I start stanning them,, I found my inspiration to be my own self and don't care to what other people are saying to me. Even my parents always comparing me to my classmate.

But, I'm glad, Seventeen was coming into my life.

They are everything for me since that time.

Trust me, you won't regret stanning them.

Choi Seungcheol
Yoon Jeonghan
Hong Jisoo
Wen Junhui
Kwon Soonyoung
Jeon Wonwoo
Lee Jihoon
Lee Seokmin
Kim Mingyu
Xu Minghao
Boo Seungkwan
Chwe Hansol
Lee Chan 

Thank you , SEVENTEEN💎💙

author: @hoshtete
text: I just joined the fandom this year. Since last December, I have been listening to your songs on repeat. I got addicted to you so bad and so damn fast. Your songs provide me so much strength and a sense of safety. Every video I have watched of you guys has given me so much laughter, so much joy, inspiration and soooooo much love. I have never fallen for any artist this fast before. It really is overwhelming. But you make me genuinely happy. I will never regret loving seventeen. I promise that I will be here for a very very long time to come. Till the last say the name, and even after that, all 13 members will forever have their own little place in my heart. Thank you so much, for just being you. Next year, for the 7th anniversary, I will be even for grateful for all the love you have given me, for all the times you made me laugh, for all the times you were there with me when i was crying, for every lesson I learnt from you. Thank you, thank you.

author: @Wonwoo_lovemycat
text: 너무 너무 이쁘다 풍경도 이쁘지만 노래 하는 너희 모습이 가장 이뻐 노래 불러줘서 고마워 딴게 아니라 이렇게 노래 불러주는게 진짜 고마운거 같아 작년에도 올해도 코로나라 가까이서 안 본지 너무 오래되서 너희가 노래 부르는 영상들이 정말 너무 너무 소중해 영상도 이쁘고 풍경도 이쁘고 노래부르는 세븐틴은 제일 이쁘고 고마워 좀 더 잘 전달하고 싶은데 고맙다는 말 밖에 할말이 없다.. 6주년 지난지 이틀밖에 안되서 뭔가 더 감동받은거 같아 나도 어느덧 캐럿이 된지 6년이 됐는데 세븐틴을 좋아했던 6년동안 너희를 좋아함에 있어 단 한순간도 후회해 본 적없어 6년동안 진짜 하루 하루 너무 좋았어 내 평범했던 하루를 자그마한 특별함으로 마무리 할 수 있게 만들어준 너희에게 고마워 앞으로도 잘 부탁해 애들아 10년이고 20년이고 쭈욱 오래 오래 함께 가자 우리

author: @deepmoon3189
text:
For Seventeen. I don't know maybe you woudln't see this comment but hear me please. 
It was November 2019, i found you and i was just ignoring Don't Wanna Cry and just love it as a song. It was my hard time as a teenager, I was about to giving up. I don't care anything about my life anymore.
But then your songs keep show up in my youtube, like it was a fate. I don't know why i clicked all of those vids, you guys slowly encourage me up, i also gradually get my smile back. 
I don't know what would happen to me if I didn't find seventeen that day. until now, December 24th 2019 has been a special day for me, you saved me Seventeen. 💎❤️

text:
De verdad me arrepiento no haberlos staneado antes , realmente TODOS son MUY TALENTOSOS amo sus personalidades únicas que desde que lo conozco me sacan un sonrisa , Hace unos meses no estaba pasando un buen momento y en ese momento los descubrí y pude refugiarme en sus hermosa voces , canciones , sonrisas y mucho mas .

a pesar de que no los staneo desde hace tiempo estoy feliz de estar en su 6to aniversario
y espero estar en todos los que faltan realmente espero que estén cuidando su salud a pesar de su agitadas agendas, ya que todo Carat espera que se encuentren bien.
Ustedes son unas de las mejores cosas me han pasado en la vida, gracias a ustedes quiero seguir mis sueños y no rendirme LOS AMO Y DESEO ESTAR CON USTEDES HASTA EL FIN DEL MUNDO

author: @Jiuscrochetcorner
text: I’ve been a fan of seventeen since pre debut and honestly they are one of the reasons I fell deep into kpop, their talent, their vocals, their hardwork and strength, and everything about their efforts and teamwork to create beautiful and meaningful music. I absolutely loved them when they debuted and it’s absolutely amazing to see how much they’ve grown musically. There were times over the years where I’d stray from Kpop but I’d always come back to seventeen whenever there was a comeback. Their music feels like home, that sweet nostalgia of youth and teenage dream. It’s incredible how music can move us. Thank you Seventeen!!! Happy 6th anniversary!!!!

author: @neubulla
text: Been knowing them since 2013 which means I already spent like third of my life to know them. My precious idol, Seventeen, who still stay humble though they already have the world on their hand, your road is still long. There would be more and more difficulties in the future but I'm sure you guys can get through of it. Other than you have each other, you have us, Carats, by your side. Just like us have you by our side. Happy 6th anniversary! It's not easy to stay this long but I still want us to have 7th, 8th, even 50th anniversary together. Your song and existence helped a lot of people during their hardest time, including me. Thank you for always giving your best for us, to make our day, to be our healing and family. I love you guys so much!♡

author: @jenrawlings1
text:
What an amazing group of people! Isn't it inspiring how 13 people can come together from within Korea, China and the USA to form a group like this. It really just goes to show no matter where you're from, what your mother language is, if you're an introvert or extrovert, if you believe within yourself and never give up on your dreams you can make it. 
Happy 6 years Seventeen!                                  To all Carats, no matter where we are from, what gender we identify as, if we are introverted or extroverted, our past and our struggles, we are here today.  We may not all know each other personally but every single one of us together makes our fandom what it is. I am so proud to say that i am a Carat and to be apart of this beautiful fandom. Thank you Carats and most importantly thank you Seventeen. With you till the end! <3

author: @cabs1504
text:
Hola... ha rondando un poco la información hacerca del cambio de seventeen en Japón, sus asociaciones y/o comunicaciones cambiaran, muchos culpan a hybe por esto... Pero el tema esta muy tapado por parte de pledis y hybe.... Se relaciona el caso con el de gfriend por su desactivacion como idols siguiendo cierto patrón, como la disminución de contenido en Japón 🇯🇵, sus comebacks, sus vlives, sus fancafes, al cumplir 6 años como grupo su contrato acaba pero no lo renuevan, el GoSe retrasado etc..... Algunxs carats llegaron a la conclusión de que seventeen esta siendo poco a poco desaparecido por estas dos empresas.... Ademas hybe vende sus productos y merch  casi obligando a carat a comprarlos.... Las el contenido de seventeen a venido cambiando dando a conocer que hybe le exige cambiarlo (sus colores oficiales en merch y la hora de GoSe) .... Esperamos que nuestros carats se hagan escuchar para que este tema no llegue a afectar futuramente a seventeen y solo sean pequeños cambios que hace hybe para "mejorar" a seventeen

Sigan staneando a seventeen y fuerza 💪 💗💎

author: @athenaaaa8235
text:
SEVENTEEN- all my love (eng. lyrics)

My love only amounts to this
 
Hello, my joy
Even in my deep despairs
You always make me smile by my side
It makes me momentarily forget about everything
 
Turn on a song we know and take one step
We hold hands and our feet move two step
Before I know it
You make today’s me look forward to tomorrow’s you
 
Baby it’s alright
Oh it’s okay
 
Because it’s only you who knows all my lies
O ah I’m more thankful
 
When I often see you tired with your head down
Me, who doesn’t know what to do
What can I possibly do?
I’m sincerely sorry
 
My love only amounts to this
But thank you for staying by my side my baby
Even if my love only amounts to this
I’ll be your spring during any winter
My heart can only say these words
 
Like a meteor shower
Be a light in the dark sky
I can do everything for you
I only have a big heart that wants to give you everything
 
Me, who has become pathetic
I’m a fool who only receives
At some point, I started hating myself
I’m even more apologetic towards you
 
Baby it’s alright
Oh it’s okay
 
Because it’s only you who knows all my lies
O ah I’m more thankful
 
When I often see you tired with your head down
Me, who doesn’t know what to do
What can I possibly do?
I’m sincerely sorry
 
My love only amounts to this
But thank you for staying by my side my baby
Even if my love only amounts to this
I’ll be your spring during any winter
My heart can only say these words
 
Although it’s just this song and lyrics,
Which contain my feelings that I wrote down with difficulty
For you, for you, for you, for you
 
I sing this song for you tonight
So that I can get closer to your love

My love only amounts to this
But my heart won’t change it’s only for you baby
Even if my love only amounts to this
I’ll be your umbrella when it rains
I’ll protect you throughout all your days

author: @dindaseptiara5393
text:
congratulations, we succeeded to reach 6 years together. looking back to old days, it feels like miracle how a "nugu" could top the big three. for a group that coming from almost bankrupt agency, that certainly wasn't a smooth journey at all--you guys poured tears and bloods into it, I know that.

I remember Seungcheol said that he lost his counts and always wonder when will the debut happen. I remember how Jeonghan stuttered when MC-ing a music show. I remember Jisoo used to be an underdog member and people barely recognize him. I remember Junhui and his confident ass left his hometown just to be a singer and gets only 2 lines in a song. I remember Soonyoung smiled towards the screen when you guys having a debut showcase and only some people stopped to watch you perform. I remember Wonwoo and his underground rapper hairstyle that I used to mock because you'd do as well if only you saw his pics. I remember the way Jihoon couldn't stop crying when you guys won the music champ for the first time. I remember Seokmin snotted his nose out because the judge said he wasn't really qualified for a main vocalist. I remember Mingyu came to the audition wearing a pair of slipper. I remember Minghao used to cry himself to sleep because he was a new kid and barely understand Korean. I remember Seungkwan promoted Jeju better than SK government ever did--he still does, though. I remember Hansol was shorter than Jisoo and also his gold quote. I remember Chan who's maknae but feels more like hyung than the rest of them. thirteen of you grew like big, nice sunflower. that damn green cubicle basement wasn't there to witness nothing.

thank you for all these years, you guys always accompany me in my ups and downs. your music made me realize that we can always see the beauty through the worst things, some of your lyrics made me grow as a human. thanks to those imaginary support when I feel like no one would understand.

happy 6th anniversary, let's stay together for longer💙

ps; 태어나 줘서 고마워.

#6YearsOfLoveWithSEVENTEEN

author: @drjeonwonwoo4996
text:
This 6 years feels so fast. At first, i got to know them bcus my bias was Cheollie when he's still Pledis Boys with Nuest. Knowing he not passing to debut with Nuest breaks my heart but I still follow him and discovers these gems. They were rough at first and now they're the shiniest diamonds. Following them since trainee days and crying when they announced their debut date (ancient carats knew the hard days they went through). Since I am the same age with 95 liners, feels their journey is also mine. They taught me loving myself, loving people around me and to give back what I've gained. Currently, my bias is Wonwoo and my bias list being wrecked so many times with no regrets. Crying when they won their first music show, crying when they announced our name is Carat, crying whenever they did something out of love for Carats. 
Till the last 'Say The Name'

author: @berrypeach1012
text:
Seventeen always feels like home. A wonderful place you can go back whenever you're feeling down. A place where you can share your laughter and tears... A place where you can feel that you can love yourself.

well, this is how I feel... I found them during the time I was very sad and confused back in 2013. It's nice to see how the young boys I was only watching on the green room is now one of the most respected groups in Kpop.
It's been so long, and they still feel like home... listening to their comforting words and songs...
I know seventeen will never know how much they helped me on my journey of loving myself. But I would like to say thank you for everything... It's been so long, and my feelings may not be as intense as when I started back then, but my love, trust, and respect for this men still remain the same.
I sometimes feel like a proud mom even tho I only have the same age as the 97line ㅋㅋ
But really... Thank you for always sharing such wonderful songs. Your songs keep me going everyday... Happy 6th Anniversary of your debut!

I hope the best for SEVENTEEN and to all CARATs who are supporting them in a positive way. New and Old fans, we are a family that love the same people.
Let's all continue to be the fans Seventeen can be proud of ♡

author: @anime03ish
text: Mahigit pa sa anim na taon nung nakilala ko kayo, Seventeen. Nasa highschool pa lang ako at trainees pa lang kayo noon, ngayon graduate na ako ng college at kayo naman nag-celebrate ng 6 years anniversary 😭 Hindi ko din alam pero iba kasi kayo sa lahat ng grupo na inistan ko. Sainyo ko lang kasi talaga na-feel yung genuine na pagpapahalaga talaga sa mga fans. At sobranggg solid niyo kasi. Iba yung samahan niyo sa lahat ng grupo na inistan ko. Sobrang totoo at sweet niyo sa isa't isa ang sarap niyo panuorin nakakawala ng lungkot, nakakataba pa ng puso. 😭 Iba din kasi talaga talento niyo, sobrang ang sarap ipagmalaki na kayo ang idols ko. Maraming salamat sa anim na taon ng pagpapasaya at pagbibigay ng magagandang kanta saakin, saamin. Maaasahan niyong hanggang dulo, kahit maputi na mga buhok niyo, natin. Carat niyo pa din ako at Seventeen ko pa din kayo. 🥺💓

author: @caratyooniverse4533
text:
The fact that they kept on saying that they'll improve so that no one can say anything bad about us and that we can proudly say that we are a carat hits so different. Like the love isnt one-sided at all. They love us as much as we love them but what makes it more beautiful is that there is still this boundary that they have set y'know? Just like what minghao kept on saying that we shouldn't supposed to be making them as a center of our lives and that instead of treating them as a significant other we can treat them as an inspiration. After all he accepts that not all of us will stay until thr very end. And that all of this might just be a phase but they are still thankful bc they were once part of our youth.

During in-complete concert cheol said something like it is their responsibility to overturn what other people could say about us being a fan. Because as we all know some people would really think that we are crazy or would think badly about us for being a fan. Sometimes calling us obsessed, immature. But hearing these kind of words from them and assuring us as if they 'got us' means so freaking special to me as a fan😭

You know, that's just so beautiful. The way they value the  people who loves and support them is just out of this world and too good to be true but it actually is!! And I'm so happy to have them as my idols.

author: @ゆゆ-i7v8n
text:
Woozi said on Saengil V LIVE last year,        
 🍚『There's a destiny in music.I can't make music today tomorrow.
 "Semicolon originally ended with a title song and a unit song.However, I felt like I wasn't satisfied, so I decided to make it again.』All my Love is ready,' but Acoustic Ver was born as a song that was made like that

우지 형이 작년 생일 V LIVE에서          
🍚"음악엔 운명 같은 게 있고 오늘 만들 음악은 내일이면 못 만들어
세미콜론은 원래 타이틀곡과 유닛곡으로 끝이었다.하지만 채워지지 않는 마음으로 다시 한번 만들어 보자고 했다.All my Love가 완성됐다고 했지만 그 운명처럼 완성된 곡은 Acoustic Ver도 탄생했어.

author: @chae_6991
text:
벌써 6년이라는 길다면 길고 짧으면 짧은 시간 동안 우리랑  항상 함께해줘서 너무 고맙고 항상 힘들때 해줄 수 있는게 없어서 너무 미안해요... 제가 세븐틴의 연습생 생활을 함께하지 않기도 했고 연습생을 해 본적도 없어서 세븐틴의 모든 아픔과 힘듦을 다 알줄 수 는 없고, 그리고 혹시 제가 그 힘듦을 다 알고있다고 해도 제가 생각하는것 보다 더 힘들거라는거 알고 있어요 ㅎㅎ 그래서 지금부터라도 세븐틴의 힘듦과 아픔을 다 알아주고 응원해주고 싶어요 ㅎㅎ 혹시나 힒든 일 슬픈 일 등등 그런 안 좋은 일들이 있다면 캐럿에게 언제나 말해줬면 좋겠어요!! 우리가 아니더라도 멤버들도 있으니까 멤버들한테라도 말해서 혼자 힘들어하지 않는 그런 세븐틴이 되줬으면 좋겠어요!!  제가 할 수 있는건 없지만 최대한 할 수있는거 없는게 다 해서 세븐틴에게 필요로하는 캐럿이 되도록 할게요!! 항상 고맙고 많이 못해줘서 너무 미안하고 사랑하고 그냥 그렇다는 거야!!!! 당신들이 있었기에 제가 성장할 수 있었고 더 노력할 수 있었어요! 항상 부끄럽지않은 케럿이 될게요!
세븐틴 6주년 축하해요!! (나는 세븐틴 없으면 지금까지 행복하지 못 했어)

author: @hoshihater3907
text:
En el transcurso del día vi el video 4 veces y esta última fue la única en que no tuve lágrimas en los ojos, sino una enorme sonrisa no de risa como me la suelen robar cada miércoles regular, no melancólica cada que veo videos predebut. No. Era una sonrisa de orgullo, alegría y agradecimiento.
SEVENTEEN ha luchado tanto para darnos todo de ellos no solo por 6 años, sino desde que iniciaron su entrenamiento y no puedo estar más orgullosa de la forma en que se muestran a nosotros, el cómo se hacen escuchar.
SEVENTEEN me hace feliz no solo por lo que me dan con su talento sino con su persona, el cómo son buenos hijos, hermanos, sunbaes y, sobre todo, amigos.
SEVENTEEN merece mucho y les agradezco sinceramente por ser un ejemplo a seguir y por no haberse rendido. 

Sí. Con la cabeza en alto confieso ser CARAT, seguidora de estas 13 maravillosas estrellas que hoy cumplen 6 años de su primer paso en el inmenso cielo !!!
Cada día los haremos brillar más.

author: @sittizaenab4048
text:
Pengen share ini,
Aku tahu mereka dari akhir 2018,
Awalnya iseng cari diyoutube, list lagu2 populer kpop dan yang muncul sebuah channel aku lupa apa dan muncul 1 lagu dari seventeen " thanks "
Denger lagunya itu keren kemudian aku cari lagunya digoogle dan ke dow nload. " thanks " selalu kuputar dan penasaran ini seventeen siapa2 aja dan gimana dancenya. Serius keren dan menyentuh banget padahal itu belum tahu artinya pertama nonton lagu ini di salah satu channel music show kpop. 

Nah penasaran lah saya sama mereka lagi dengan cari2 single mereka, download dan dengerin, smuanya keren.
Terus kuputuskan untuk mengenal lagi mereka dengan nonton idol room,reality show mereka yang dipulau yoesodo dan yg di Jepang. Jadi suka sama mereka. Ini ditahun 2019. Kemudian nonton video2 mereka yg going seventeen versi dulunya mereka sampe sekarang.
Itu berlanjut sampai tahun 2020. Ditahun ini,  aku mulai ngikutin mereka baik-baik dengan follow semua sosmednya seventeen. sampe download vlive hanya untuk lihat mereka. Follow akun fan Indonesia di telegram buat tahu info weverse mereka krn aku ngak bisa punya itu.
Hingga sekarang. Aku udah cinta sama mereka. Aku emang suka kpop tapi bukan tipe nge stan bucin gitu2, ngak.cm skdar suka. Dari semuanya, cuma SEVENTEEN yang buat hatiku nyaman dan memutuskan buat sayang, cinta dan respect sm mereka sampai sekarang.
Mereka adalah mood booster bangetttt... 
 
Lagu ini betul2 ngungkapin perasaan mereka ke carat. Dan aku ngerasain pesan mereka. Bersyukur banget. 
T

Terima kasih kalian,
Semoga kalian sehat2, tetap semangat, menjadi pribadi yg lebih baik untuk diri kaliam sendiri, keluarga, teman2, dan fans kalian, carat.
Kami, carat, selalu mendukung kalian, 
Kami bangga punya kalian, SEVENTEEN

#maaf panjang, curahan hati banget ini hehehe

author: @amethystcorsage8409
text:
Hello, this is my Love Letter for you. 

Here I want to tell you the story when I'm Falling for You guys. When the very first time you guys Come To Me, my life was so dark. I'm at the worst time (until now btw). I have to deal it with my Trauma. Fear is the one I should deal with every day. But since I know you guys for the past 7 months, whenever I'm tired I always Run to You. U guys such a Healing for me. Besides my 'dark' life whenever I see you I feel like I have a Second Life. 

My first era was Home;Run. I was clueless back then since you're 13 members and I was tired to remember all of you. So I tried again with your Q&A content on Youtube. I Don't Know why but the more I watch the more I want to know. So, since that day I became a CARAT and watch all your contents. 

From now on, I always Thinking About You for 247 in my life (I swear!). I really Adore U guys so much. The way you write your Hit Song (all of your songs is just a hit song for me), the way you build your relationship with everyone, the positive vibe that you always show us. Keep up Bring It. You're really Good to Me ay ay ay. 

Guys I really wanna say Thanks for being my Home. If I have a chance I really want to Hug all of you, showing how grateful I am for slipping into this diamond life. At this specific time  you're already become the Highlight of my life. I Wish we Can't See The End of our journey bcs we will always Together forever. If only the end is coming hopefully it would be a Happy Ending. 

I'm tearing up right now ㅠ but I Don't Wanna Cry
All My Love just for you
I do Crazy in Love with all of you
아주 Nice to know you 
I'm so lucky for having you
Once again, Let Me Hear You Say
SAY THE NAME! 


Thank you for being born SEVENTEEN ✨💎
생일 축해요 세븐틴 🎂
야하ㅏ, 박수 👏👏
#6YearsOfLoveWithSeventeen

author: @nurrizkaalfirahusna9647
text:
Sebagai penikmat lagu K-Pop sejak 2015, aku udah biasa denger lagu berbagai girl group atau boy grup. Awal tahu Seventeen dari lagu Mansae mereka, dan sejak itu selalu ngikutin comeback mereka tapi ga bener2 sesuka itu sama mereka. Sebatas menikmati semua lagu dan video dance mereka karena mereka sangat berbakat. Baru tahun kemarin, aku kayak bener2 sayang sama mereka bertiga belas. Rasanya agak menyesal kenapa ga dari dulu, dari awal dengar lagu mereka, aku mulai serius memperhatikan mereka.

Jujur. semua lagu seventeen ga ada yang gagal. Terima kasih atas lagu-lagu indahnya. Lagu-lagu Seventeen ini adalah teman yang menemaniku mengerjakan tugas selama ini. Dan kalau disuruh lagu apa yang membuat aku bisa menitikkan air mata sebelum tahu artinya, lagu ini adalah salah satunya. Apalagi pas tahu artinya, makin ambyar. 

Sekali lagi, Terima kasih banyak Seventeen.

author: @julicbo
text: I found Seventeen in 2017 in the lowest moment of my life. In that moment they became the only light i could see, the only source of happiness. With time I got better, became busy with life and there are times where i may not see a lot of them (thought i keep up with their comebacks and gose) but every now and then i watch videos and stuff and the feeling i get its just magical, not other artist ever made me feel like they do. I love seeing them grow, how they keep on getting better musically and still being the most amazing beautiful human beings. Thank you Jun, Hao, Jihoon, Vernon, Mingyu, Seungkwan, Jeonghan,  Wonwoo, Soonyoung, Seokmin, Josh, Dino and the best Leader Seungcheol. I am so happy you are in my life ❤❤❤

author: @ttssukki3836
text:
De verdad, nunca creí que un grupo me haría sentir tan feliz, mis días lluviosos terminan con un lindo arcoíris gracias a Seventeen.
Siempre fuí una persona perjuiciosa y no fue hasta que conocí a Seventeen que me dí cuenta de que estos artistas no solo nos dan música, sino todo una variada gama de felicidad.
Cuando estoy triste, un episodio de going seventeen me hará reír.
Cuando estoy enojada, una canción de seventeen me relajará.
Cuando me siento sola, sé que seventeen estará ahí.
Gracias por cambiar mi vida y perspectiva.
Por más años juntos, les deseo mucha salud y felicidad, a mis queridos sebongs y a mis queridxs carats.

author: @hmp2483
text:
Dear seventeen,
Mahal ko kayo sobrang mahal♡. Kayo ang nagpapasaya sa araw ko hinding hindi ko kayo makakalimutan. Okay, mabicol na lugod ako hahahahaha. Kamo ang nagtatao ning kaugmahan sakuya lalo na kapag nasstress ako sa buhay, madangog, madalan videos, madalan gose lang nindo okay na tulos ako. Thank you so much!! I do realllyyy love you seventeen and carats! There's no words to describe what i am feeling. I'm really grateful i meet you all! Thank you for being part of my life. I will never forget this moment, i will cherish this forever💎💖

author: @Septemberbabe
text: SEVENTEEN keeps thinking that they couldn’t do much for us Carats. But trust me that they have touched more lives that they have ever thought. Hearing your music is like coming into a place and just knowing that you belong 💖 thank you for the 6 years of tears, laughters, and heart fluttering moments. Although I am not able to buy all your albums and lightsticks, I have seen you all grow since Pretty U era and I cant wait to see what this world awaits for you ♥️ I’m also sorry that my love could only amount to this but I hope us, Carats could be a spark of your happiness when the world feels too cruel ♥️

author: @karinarenitaa
text:
안녕 세븐틴!^^

벌써 6년 데뷔 됐네요. 한국어 잘 못해도..... 이 편지를 진심으로 썻고 맨날 자랑스러운 세븐틴처럼 열심히 하겠습니다~ 시간이 진짜 빠르죠? 하지만 많은 일이 일언났는 것 같아요. 2년 전부터 너희들 좋아했고 그날부터 보낸 시간이 세봉 덕분에 매일이 너무나 소중했고. 뒤돌아보는 동안 ‘어떻게 보답해야 되는가’라는 많이 생각해요. 헤아릴수 없을 행복을 주셨어 정말 고마웠어요. 너를 만나는 날은 내 인생에서 가장 좋은 것 중의 한 가지다고 정말요. 세봉은 항상 건강하고 행복해야 돼요. 진심으로 기도할게요. 그리고 가족와 회사 스태프분들에게 좋은 일만 가득하길 바랍니다. 영원히 응원할게요 사랑하고 감사합니다. 앞으로 함께 같이 걸어가고 누구보다 더 밝게 빛나자! 케럿해❤세봉해

author: @tipaniii.s
text:
Dear Seventeen,

Thank you for being part of my teenage life. You definitely don't know how much you guys made my day even more brighter! There are lots of Kpop groups out there but I chose to stan you alone. For some, it might be boring but you never let us Carats feel bored at all. All your efforts, care, and love help us to be a better person. Your music and talent inspire us to never give up on life. To me, you may not be the best but you are the greatest gift I ever received. Thank you so much!

💎

author: @saskiaekklesia5551
text:
Happy 6th anniversary, my boys!

I might not always be there for you... But you guys... Your music, its always there to cheer me up when I'm sad, always comfort me when I need to be comforted, always filling me up when I feel empty, and of course you guys are always there when I'm happy. I would like to thank you guys for that.

This past 6 years must not be that easy, right?
But thank you, for not giving up on music.
Thank you, for standing tall through all the hard times you must've been.
Thank you, for not giving up to see us, CARATS. Especially to see us happy.
Thank you, for all of your hard work. You always nailed it, guys.
Thank you, for being the most amazing group that we all known: SEVENTEEN!

On this beautiful 6th anniversary, let's mark it with all of our love, joy, and happines!!
I will always look up to you, boys.
Always.

See you on your 7th, 8th, 9th, 10th, and infinity anniversary because we know... Even if our youth is over, even if we have to go on our own journey, but we will always have each other. 
We will always belong to each other. 
So don't worry, no one will get left behind and feel lonely, because we are always one <333

I love you guys so so so so so much.
THANK YOU SEVENTEEN!

author: @adlynnnn
text:
Bukan Carat, tapi akhir akhir ini aku mengalihkan pikiran dengan nonton Going Seventeen. Sejauh ini, cuma svt yang content nya beneran terlihat senatural itu. Friendship dan kekeluargaan svt dan staff bener bener bisa diliat disana. 

Sebagai self-producing idol, svt bener bener pantas memegang predikat itu dan itu menginspirasi aku untuk berubah jadi lebih produktif lagi. 

Aku mau sekalian apresiasi lagu 태어나줘서 고마워... nggak pernah sebelumnya aku dengar lagu yang se-pure ini. Perasaan svt bener bener nyampe ke hati pendengarnya. Bener bener merasa dihargai dan disayangi. 

After all, 진심으로 감사합니다, 세븐틴 <3

author: @aliasfrmdn
text:
aku gatau harus pake kata apalagi buat ngegambarin rasa terima kasihku ke kalian secara singkat, padat, dan jelas. orang orang mungkin ngeliatnya kalian hanya boygroup kpop. tp buatku, kalian lebih dari itu.

..penyelamat? ya, penyelamat mungkin adalah kata yang paling bisa menjelaskan secara singkat, meskipun aku masih belum puas sama kata itu.

aku pernah ngerasa hilang. kaya ngga ada tujuan hidup. ngga tau apa yang mau aku lakuin besok, minggu depan, bulan depan, tahun depan, lima, delapan, atau bahkan 10 tahun ke depan. bahkan sampe berdoa kalo tuhan akan ambil nyawaku tiap kali aku tidur, dan terbangun dengan rasa kesal karena ngga dikabulin doaku itu. iya, seperti cuma melayang-layang aja di semesta; gaada gunanya, nyampah doang malah.

people asked me to love myself, but i also need something to push me so i can love myself. and im proud to say you're one of the reasons.

semua lagu kalian yang dibuat dengan hati sampai dengan selamat dan apik di hatiku. cara kalian perlakukan carat, meskipun bukan aku secara spesifik, bener-bener buatku yang cuma bisa ngeliat ngerasa.. nyaman. kalian pun enjoy ngejalaninnya meskipun kalo kata orang orang "ini hanyalah pekerjaan mereka".

dan dengan lagu ini, kalian menyampaikan permintaan maaf kalian karena kalian "hanya bisa memberikan cinta sebesar ini". aku gatau untuk carat lain, tapi buatku pribadi ini udah jauh dari kata cukup.

meskipun aku masih belum tau aku mau ngapain di masa depan nanti, seengganya sekarang aku ngga ngerasa kalo aku cuma melayang-layang kaya sampah di alam semesta ini. seengganya doa doaku untuk dicabut nyawanya ngga keluar dari bibir dan hatiku lagi. seengganya aku udah ngga merasa "hilang" sepenuhnya.

karena kalian. iya, kalian bertiga belas. seungcheol, jeonghan, joshua, junhui, soonyoung, wonwoo, jihoon, myeongho, mingyu, seokmin, seungkwan, hansol, chan, dan seventeen yang menyatukan kalian sampe detik ini, dan semoga sampai nanti juga.

aku mungkin cuma satu dari sekian juta banyaknya carat di dunia ini. mungkin kalian juga engga bakal baca ini karena keterbatasan bahasa. tapi makasih, banget. aku bersyukur tuhan ngga mengabulkan doaku waktu itu.

makasih banyak. makasih. makasih. 🤍💎

author: @aqilastudio6848
text:
Aku baru stan Seventeen tahun ini,dulu MV DWC pernah muncul di beranda aku tapi aku ga nonton,karena dulu memang aku ga terlalu suka sama kpop,sampe waktu itu aku lagi scroll² instagram dan lihat video yang backsound nya lagu Hitorijanai,ternyata lagunya enaaaak bangeeet dari situ aku mulai suka sama Seventeen,tapi belum stan Seventeen,setelah itu aku dengerin lagu² Seventeen yang lainnya,kayak Fallin Flower,Oh My,dan Left & Right sebenarnya tahun lalu aku memang udah tau Seventeen,karena waktu itu aku nonton "Acara Spesial Perayaan 300K Subscribers KBS World Indonesia Bagian 2/3" lalu ada tebak²an lagu salah satu soalnya lagu Left & Right,karena aku penasaran aku cari aja di youtube lagu Left & Right,dari situ aku mulai tau Seventeen tapi waktu itu aku belum stan Seventeen,sekarang aku nyesel banget kenapa aku ga stan Seventeen dari dulu,sekarang aku dan adikku jadi carat,bias aku di Seventeen Wonwoo & Joshua klo adik aku S.Coups & Jun,sayang Seventeen banyak²❤️,semoga kedepannya kalian bisa lebih terkenal lagi karena lagu dan koreografi kalian sangat bagus dan memiliki arti yang bagus juga🤗❤️,kita akan selalu bersama walaupun nanti kalian menjalani wajib militer ataupun kontrak kalian selesai,aku berharap kalian akan memperpanjang kontrak kalian dengan pledis😁



Happy 6th Anniversary Seventeen💎❤️

author: @ElleCheu
text:
Dear, SEVENTEEN
Terima kasih karena telah membuat kami merasa di rumah. Meski rumahku bukan tempat yang hangat dan diidamkan. Terima kasih telah mengisi hari-hari keputusasaanku dengan kebahagiaan. Terima kasih telah membawaku termotivasi untuk menjadi produktif. Terima kasih telah memanjakan kami. Suara cantik itu, gerakan indah itu, senyuman kebahagiaan kalian, terima kasih untuk semuanya! Aku merasa sedih tidak bisa mengungkapkan perasaanku dengan baik. Aku merasa tidak layak mencintai kalian. Sungguh, aku minta maaf. Aku tidak mampu membalas perasaan kalian dengan baik. Kalian terlalu baik, sangat baik.

author: @ulltaez7830
text:
literally i've never loved artists before as much as i love Seventeen, i feel extremely grateful for being introduced to them 4 years ago through a carat friend. these 13 men indeed are such a big important part of my life that i don't know how to put it into words. i'm proud to be a fan of extremely talented and good people and i don't have ideia of what i would be without them. hope to celebrate more years together in the time coming 💞 love you all always.
and for my fellow carats, as the time passes this family grows bigger and stronger than ever, we went through highs and lows, excitement and hardships together, but above all i know we can rely on each other as well as on seventeen. thanks to seventeen's existence we can share those significant moments and be each other's strength source. in these years to come, i look forward to the beautiful moments that Seventeen and Carats will provide to each other! 💓💙

author: @maygomez6001
text:
Hi Seventeen,

I am one of those fans  that you've saved from frustration and exhaustion from the quarantine life. Thank you for sharing your music to me. For giving me amazing contents, for making me feel loved and comforting me with your words, letters, and lyrics. You don't know how much that means to me. 

Your loved is overwhelming. I sometimes ask myself if you can also feel our love too. Am I  reciprocating your love enough? Am I taking you for granted? Are my  efforts enough to show you that I care? If I can, i want to give everything you deserves. 

I take pride of being a Carat. Imagine I am a fan of 13 amazing, talented, all rounder and well rounded artists. I feel blessed. You are not just idols for me. You are artists. You are one of my comfort zones (mentally and emotionally). You are a family to me. Don't worry, I manage my time being a fan. Hehe. I still have life outside of the fandom. 

There's a possibility that you might not be a able to read this and that's okay. I just want to say how much grateful I am to all of you. 

All My Love, 
Mich

author: @rhinem8325
text: Dearest SEVENTEEN, hello. I am not very eloquent with my words but here goes. I want to thank you all for being such an inspiration. All of you work hard, passionately, devotedly, and for hours for this craft; never giving despite the odds. It inspires carats all over the world to work hard and devotedly. The sincerity you have is felt through every song you have produced. The songs that you work on as you think about the messages to carats, thank you so much for caring so deeply for carats and loving us. Thank you for deciding to share a part of your lives with us. There is so much that you give, we don't deserve you and can only give you so much of our love to you. All My Love is so beautifully written and sung. The message of this song is reciprocated by carats. Thank you for being the comfort from the fire, the solace from a hug, the refreshing breeze, the warmth of the sunlight, the energy and strength of a wave and much more for carats. Happy 6th and I'm sure this beginning of the 7th be full of accomplishments together hand in hand, seventeen and carats. Love, CARAT~

author: @jihooniejellybean8793
text:
T-T  It's our birthday but I'm grateful for their existence. I known and grown with the since debut,  maybe it's because we are close in age but  they are the only group I feel really connected to. I feel like I matured along with them and maybe that's why their songs always connect with the most.                                                 
They have been with me through happy and hard times, unknowingly making me laugh and  giving me words of encouragement/ comfort through their songs and simply talks. 
I don't know how to explain it but when I'm happy their songs make me happier, when I'm sad their songs feel like a hug  and when I'm suffocated/exhausted their songs feel like fresh air. Although some songs do make me feel like  someone just broke  my heart even though I'm single. 
They are are one of the few things that heal me from this fast paced life we live, that  to me often feels like more work than it's worth since it so fragile. 
I hope us(Carats) and Seventeen can continue to make memories with each other for years to come. I'm grateful to be part of this fandom.
THANK YOU CARATS WHO HAVE MADE THIS POSSIBLE!

Dear Seventeen,

This is my 4th year become a Carat. I'm so glad that I know you guys through Don't Wanna Cry. You are the only one group that can make me feel comforted when I cry and hyped up through your music. Dear Seventeen, Happy 6th anniversary, I myself joined this fandom almost a year ago and it has been really fun. I want to say that you guys have helped me a lot to feel better, by listening to y'alls music and watching y'alls videos. You guys make me really happy, I appreciate and love each one of y'all. Just know that y'all are shining diamonds, you guys help a lot of people by making them happy and by making them feel better, etc. I hope we have a good year and spend more amazing memories :).
-From a Carat 🤕💎

author: @gecarat
text:
Happy 6th anniversary Seventeen,
Ga kerasa udah 6 tahun juga bareng-bareng sama kalian..
inget banget dulu masa-masa susah nyelesaiin skripsi berjuang untuk lulus, disitu ku menemukan kalian yang lagi berjuang juga untuk debut..

Ngeliat kalian waktu itu buat aku mutusin dukung kalian terus, kayak aku ga akan biarin kalian ga ternotice orang-orang, semua orang harus tau ada kalian yang sangat-sangat berbakat, kalau ternyata kedepannya sulit aku bakal selalu ada disini ngedukung kalian, ga akan biarin kalian berjuang sendiri.. dan aku masih disini sampai hari ini dan Insya Allah dimasa yang akan datang sampai umur memisahkan..

Jadi kpopers dari 2008 tapi baru kalian yang buat aku tergerak pokoknya aku bakal dukung banget, harus beli album.Ketika aku berniat untuk support kalian saat itu aku bener-bener ngelakuin semua hal yang pertama kali selama aku jadi kpopers.. aku tau kalian sebenernya udah cukup lama, 2012/2013? jadi kpopers 2nd gen buat aku banyak tau grup-grup kpop dan itu yang buat aku kenal sama kakak2 kalian, after school, nuest, hello venus. terus denger kabar kalau akan debutin grup dengan member 17 orang, wow banget rasanya.. awalnya ngeliat kalian sekilas doang dari nontonin 17tv, liatin kalian di mv kakak2 kalian, belum belum tergerak untuk cari tau lebih lanjut saat itu, sampai awal tahun 2015 februari atau maret gitu aku denger kabar kalian bakal debut baru aku kepo dengan nontonin video-video latihan kalian, nontonin 17project,  ngeliat gimana usaha kalian ngeliat kepribadian kalian.. buat aku bener-bener jatuh hati sama kalian. 

Kalian adalah anak-anak yang pertama kali buat aku bela-belain cari tau gimana cara live streaming andromeda, live streaming debut plan kalian, gimana cara aku live streaming semua acara music show di korea yang kalian datengin buat perform, caranya live streaming radio di korea buat dengerin kalian kalau lagi ada schedule, gimana caranya aku voting buat kalian ketika masuk nominasi, semua schedule kalian aku ikutin satu-satu.. walaupin kita jauh aku pastikan aku selalu ada disini untuk support kalian, aku selalu ngedampingin kalian walau kalian ga liat aku, hehe..

Kalian beberapa kali masuk nominasi di music show, ga menang bukan berarti aku berhenti buat berusaha lebih keras untuk promosiin dan voting kalian, 4 Mei 2016 sehari setelah aku ulang tahun, kalian tau? salah satu doaku saat itu adalah semoga kalian bisa menang.. dan hari itu doaku dikabulkan.. Pretty U first Win.. nangis, nangis banget sampai gemeter saking senangnya, aku seneng bisa ngeliat kalian nangis bahagia, aku janji bakal ngasih kalian lebih banyak tangis bahagia kedepannya..

Shining Diamond fanmeeting 2016, aku bersyukur ada kesempatan bisa ketemu kalian langsung.. aku yang belum ada kesempatan ngeliat kalian di korea bisa liat kalian di Jakarta. salah satu kenangan bareng kalian yang ga akan aku lupain, bisa liat kalian sedeket itu sampai high touch sama kalian di akhir acara.. hehe udahannya aku gemeteran banget sampai nangis, makasih Seventeen udah dateng untuk ketemu kita-kita di Jakarta..

Perjuangan kita diawal emang berat, aku akuin.. tapi syukur alhamdulillah benar perkataan yang bilang usaha tidak akan mengkhianati hasil, melihat kalian sudah sebesar ini sekarang aku bener-bener senang dan lega.. we made it guys.. sekarang semua orang tau betapa berbakatnya, betapa luar biasanya kalian.. alhamdulillah.. dan aku yakin kalian akan tumbuh semakin besar kedepannya..

Seventeen.. Seungcheol, Jeonghan, Jisoo, Junhui, Soonyoung, Wonwoo, Jihoon, Minghao, Mingyu, Seokmin, Seungkwan, Hansol dan Chan.. adik-adik kesayangan kakak.. kakak tau kalian semua anak-anak yang baik, tetaplah jaga kekompakan kalian ya, selain kalian punya satu sama lain kalian juga punya Carat disini yang bakal selalu dukung kalian, jangan lupa untuk selalu pengertian satu sama lain, saling ngehargain satu sama lain, untuk selalu rendah hati, untuk selalu bersyukur, untuk selalu berjuang dan tidak menyerah, untuk istirahat yang cukup, inget untuk selalu jaga pola makan dan kesehatan kalian ya..
diusia grup kalian yang udah menginjak 6 tahun ini, kakak doain semoga kalian selalu sehat, panjang umur, semakin sukses karir dan percintaannya, semoga lancar dan dimudahkan semua urusan kalian ya, dan semoga kalian bahagia selalu.. aamiin

Sekali lagi, selamat ulang tahun yang ke-6 ya Seventeen.. 
*with so much love, your noona carat*

Happy Anniversary Sebonggg:)

Aku sayangg banget sama mereka, mereka itu ganteng, lucu, bermultitalend(maap gatau tulisannya:() segalanya lahh pokoknya, bangga banget dahh aku jadi Carat lope lopee, terimakasih juga buat sepupuku yang udah stan mereka hingga aku terbawa juga buat stan mereka

author: @Soreejillah
text:
Dear Seventeen,

Ever since I became a Carat just before Pretty U, I cannot even begin to explain the happiness you have provided me. Every album reminds me of different moments in my life, and so listening to you is like listening to the story of my young adult years. How do I write out just how much Seventeen means to me? I can feel it deep in my heart... it's like the same feeling you get when you hang out with your closest friends and you laugh and talk and forget about everything else for a while. It's a fuzzy feeling, a warm hug feeling. Seventeen's music gets me hyped on car rides, gets me in my feels when I'm sentimental, gets me comforted when I cry and gets me grinning from ear to ear when I'm happy. The sheer talent within Seventeen is bigger than Mt. Everest, it could fill up the whole ocean and there would still be some leftover. I am always, always proud to say I am a fan, a Carat. I wish I could say more, but the best words I can give to Seventeen is "thank you". I feel so blessed to be part of your journey. I support you and I care for you, I respect you and I love you. Thank you for shining bright for us, Seventeen. <3

author: @v_vLeri캐럿
text:
Querido Seventeen:
En tan poco tiempo se ganaron mi corazón, los sigo desde hace 1 año y medio, y no me arrepiento, es mi segundo aniversarios con ustedes, gracias por siempre darnos cariño, por cuidarnos desde lejos, por amarnos, por ser la razón de mis sonrisas, para mí ustedes son un diamante que brilla de manera resplandeciente y bella, amo y adoro a cada uno de los 13 miembros, mentiría si dijera que no puedo vivir sin ustedes, daría lo que fuera con tan de verlos felices, los amo demasiado.
Pareciera que fue ayer cuando decidí ser carat, pasa tan rápido el tiempo y no nos damos cuenta, Feliz 6to Aniversario Seventeen.
Sigan cumpliendo sus sueños y nunca se rindan, siempre estaremos para ustedes y daremos lo mejor de nosostros/as para apoyarlos y amarnos incondicionalmente.
Atte: una carat que los ama mucho♡.

author: @carrot17carat
text:
The things i learned after i slipped into the diamond life 💎

S.copus: "jangan jadi orang egois"
(Di setiap moment s.coups pasti ngasi member yang lain dulu untuk berpendapat atau apapun itu, selalu mengutamakan grup dibanding dirinya sendiri)
_Best Leader

Jeonghan: "berani tampil beda, yang penting bisa bikin senang diri sendiri"
(Dia selalu nyari hal-hal yang bisa bikin dia senang kayak main lego sampe pelihara batu, meskipun orang bilang itu aneh tapi dia gak peduli yang penting dia senang dengan hal itu + perhatian walaupun usil)

Joshua: "sangat baik dalam mengontrol diri sendiri"
(Bayangin dia bisa gak pegang hp berhari2 bahkan dia bilang bisa bulanan, rata2 kita pasti gak bisa begitu + penyabar & gak mudah marah)

Jun: "walau tingkah dibilang bocah tapi pemikirannya dewasa banget"
(Selalu heran kalo Jun udah ngasi komentar di berbagai acara kayak tertata rapi gitu setiap kata yang diucapkan, cocok jadi temen curhat disamping kita dibercandain tapi kalau dia sudah ngomong pasti nyampe ke hati)

Hoshi: "sangat mencintai diri sendiri"
(Hoshi bisa sangat Percaya Diri seperti yang kita lihat pasti karena dia percaya banget sama dirinya sendiri klo dia pasti bisa, karena itu dia selalu bekerja keras. Bisa bikin orang-orang disekitarnya senang sama dia terus selalu bikin member yg lain semangat)

Wonwoo: "selalu berfikir sebelum berbuat"
(Disaat fansign dia bilang benar-benar berhati-hati bicara sama carat supaya gak ada yang tersinggung dengan ucapannya pas bikin rap juga dia bilang gitu, sopan, bijaksana & puitis banget pokoknya. Diajak deeptalk pasti enak)

Woozi: "pekerja keras"
(Saking pekerja kerasnya dia, dia sampai menganggap pekerjaannya itu jadi hobinya, keren banget sih itu. Berharap bisa kayak woozi bisa mencintai pekerjaan kita disamping lelah yang kita dapat)

text: seventeen, thank you for these amazing six years. i've only been able to spend about a year with you all, but this year has been unlike any other one but do you know what was *always* consistant, always there for me when i needed it, cheering me up with their amazing songs and even more amazing personalities? seventeen. i remember feeling incredibly down and like everyone was against me, but as soon as i watched an episode of going seventeen- it felt like i was important to someone, i know it sounds silly but thank you for making my life better. i'm proud of you, hoshi, dino, seungkwan, vernon, woozi, jeonghan, wonwoo, minghao, junhui, mingyu, chan, joshua and seungcheol, i love you, i will always be a carat and i will always be rooting for you. 💎

author: @tyneola8137
text: i know everyone's comments here are their greetings and them reminiscing their memories. but id like to take this moment to say that SEVENTEEN NEVER FAILS to spoil their fans with songs either rare or have never been performed or if ever its been performed already, they always come up with a different version or put a twist to it. they dont repeat songs or latest title tracks over and over again not unless its for music show promotion and thats important, to listen and be aware of what your audience's lets say, "wishlists" or what the fan favorites are to keep them satisfied and keep them engaged and theyre doing that. also bc all of their discographies are worthy to be flexed and performed whether its for a special video, for a concert or whatever content it is. as long as theyre up for it and only probably a few artists (not that i know any other) are doing that cause mostly are just repeating their title tracks and some latest B-sides. also id like to point out how ALL of the members can sing so well despite, example, the hiphop unit, some of them probably prefer powerful rap or heavy music type of songs but theyre also good in ballads too. every member shined through and was able to showcase their individual range, character and color and the style of singing and when you put them together, it feels like a finished cake with icing and cherry on top. also i like how this sounds much better compared to their last performance of All My Love from SMA. their voices just kept improving and getting fuller. I already poured my heart so much in this one comment. nothing else to say here. I love SEVENTEEN so much and I knew I was going to be invested the moment I saw their Home Run performance from MAMA 2020. it was like love at first sight of that stage. If they indeed will still sign the contract. I hope I can stay as a carat til 2029. I would be almost in my 30s by that time.

author: @My-yg8hd
text:
i see a lot of carats writing thank you to seventeen here in their native languages, so that's what I'm going to do too.

Seventeen, jag tror aldrig riktigt jag kommer kunna förklara riktigt hur mycket jag uppskattar er och hur tacksam jag är för att ni existerar. Jag är extremt tacksam för att ni hjälper mig och så många andra carats världen över varje dag, bara med era videos eller era låtar. Ni har blivit som en säker plats för mig här på internet, som mitt hem. Hela seventeen som grupp och alla carats känns som en ända stor familj, och jag känner mig mer trygg än någonsin med er. Jag önskar verkligen att jag kunde finnas för er på samma sätt som ni funnits där för mig. Så jag säger stort tack, jag älskar er. Thank you, I love you. ❤❤

author: @catleaxmas5416
text:
Dear Seventeen, 
I have nothing else to say other than thank you. Thank you for existing, thank you for being here, thank you for all the laughs and the happiness, thank you for the warm words, thank you for the songs and the amazing performances, thank you for all your hardworks.
I was in a very very dark place and I know that I would not be here if I hadn't found you all those years ago. I owe you all my life. You are one of my home. There is no words can conveys how much you all mean to me.  
You taught me a lot in life and I am eternally grateful.
I hope we all will always be blesses with happiness, health, safety, and success. Let's walk on a flowery path together for a long time. Keep creating and keep inspiring like you do right now. 
I'll always love you very much 🍀🌼
