author: @apriliafe
text:
Hai, Seventeen
Aku salah satu Carats Indonesia

Selamat 6 tahunan cie dah bisa masuk sd xixixi

Ga ga ga ga kali ini serius

Hai, Seventeen
Aku salah satu Carats Indonesia

Awal aku kenal kalian tiba-tiba kalian nongol di twitter aku (Seventeen Tv), awalnya aku ga tertarik, tapi setelah itu kalian muncul lagi di beranda youtube aku lalu aku memutuskan nonton kalian. Dari masa trainee aku udah kagum sama kalian, tapi yg bikin paling suka adalah guyonan-guyonan, kehebohan dan moment-moment uwu kalian. Singkat cerita kalian udah debut dengan Adore U lalu Mansae dan tim dance coverku langsung coverin kalian, rasanya bangga banget. Beberapa tahun setelah kalian debut, kalian dateng buat konser ke Indonesia, aku udah beli tiket konser, udah beli tiket ke jakarta dan segala tetek bengeknya tapi aku gagal terbang ke jakarta karna ada prestasi yg harus aku kejar (lomba dance cover), maaf aku ga dateng hari itu tapi aku tau temen-temen caratku yg lain did a great job supporting u there at the venue. Proud of u Carats! Dan... ga kerasa udah 6 tahun aja umurnya, makin tua ya hahaha selamat menua bersama, Seventeen. Kalian semua ber-13 inspirasi aku, penyemangat aku, alasan aku bangkit dari keterpurukan, alasan aku lebih menghargai hidup, terima kasih banyak untuk kerja kerasnya, untuk pengorbanan kalian, untuk senyum dan tawa yg kalian lukis di wajah Carats, and thankyou for being Seventeen.

Happy 6th Anniversary.

author: @ayuannur9557
text:
The level of aesthetic in this video can't be ranked, really. 

I want to tell my own story about my journey as Carat too. 
The first time me and my sister met you guys was through a video Special stage] SEVENTEEN - girl group medley, 세븐틴 - 걸그룹 메들리 Show Music core 20160416 
Just because of you guys covered Gfriend's Rough in so manly ways that we started to feel curious.
We watched start from your predebut to debut stages, then watch the Weekly Idol and One Fine Day (though with OFD I feel sick and worried for you guys while watched all of it).
We slipped hardly into the diamond life after that. 
We first met at ICE BSD, Tangerang Selatan for you guys Diamond Edge's concert in 2017. My big brother and mother were there all the time. My mother and little sister fall so hard for DK and Joshua. I love Jun but always got wrecked by Dino (PLEDIS JUST RELEASE DINO'S SOLO PERFORMANCE ALREADY) and Woozi. and And since we saw you guys, my big brother always mentioned "THIS IS HOW MEN SUPPOSED TO PERFORM!" and always felt bitter if you guys got snatched in Award performances. We three siblings memorized all of your songs. My big brother who only loves games and computer the entire life would sulking if you guys are always the second. My little sister even printed out all of your best photos and spread it around her peers and friends, just to make you guys being much more popular. (Sssht, her friends all are NCTzen 😂😂😂😂) 
My mother poisoned our cousins and auntie too with the love for you guys, since my cousin worked on Shopee Indonesia and her boyfriend has a close relative who worked on Tokopedia, she got sick by frequently hearing (ahem sorry) BP and BTS. So even they got dragged and vocally active presented "How about SEVENTEEN?" to their superiors and supervisors 😂😂😂 especially since it was around from Thanks era to Getting Closer. 
But they said Seventeen animo in Indonesia though its large, but nowhere near level BP and BTS, nor if they want it to be down to earth, near the level of Got7 and Gfriend. So darn frustrating! 

While me myself save my winning money from some poems and Indonesian Sastra competitions to bought your albums, while my mother bought the album of our family. My father even cant think of anything else except saying "No wonder, these boys are so handsome." 
I tried to drag my own friends. But most of them mostly Cassiopeia, Exo-L and Elf, while my best friend stanning SNSD. They still after all the years. 
My best friends from writing community and research friends then got dragged and love both DK and Woozi! I even joking with my friends about how I wait for your dating news, since I want to brag and be happy for your love too. 

We're so proud that we make them drink the most  beatifully contagious poisons called Seventeen. 

I love how Carats community are so chills and never ever faking or forcing they themselves to love you guys. Fake streams? Nope. We watched it repetitively just because we love how amazing the music, choreography, and content are, not just because we want to present "number of views". 

One day when I feel so sad and lonely, I cried so hard after listening to your guys Smile Flower and Us Again. I got cried again after I heard you guys recommend these two songs. You guys are here with me when I go to college, when I'm on the bus, my Mama singing along to you when she proceeded with surgery to relax herself, you guys were there when my big brother screaming fanchants while playing his games, you guys here for my little sister and me so we screamed cried laughing along side you guys too. You guys were there when I failed my college exams and long after that when  received my scholarship. You guys are here when I had my heart broken or when our most beloved cat, Ciel, sleeping loudly after hearing your song being played in the laptop. You guys are here for my family in the time we lost our most beloved cat too. You guys are here when me and my siblings were sad in the meantime Fairy Tail played their last "Snow Fairy, don't say goodbye!" 

Our words and love alone cannot ever convey how much we love you guys. ❤❤❤😭😭😭 We are incredibly sad since the pandemic cut our chance to meet again. We cursed it out with all of our heart but also feel thankful since you guys can take a rest, rest and appreciation that all of you deserve so much. 

You guys posted this within my birthday (23rd May) and my sister's birthday (28th May). You guys are within us too. 

Thank you for being born and meeting us! The best encounter ever we won't ever change with anything.

I won't ask for forever, but let's be together for a very long time.

author: @charinaikayulianti3716
text:
Pengen cerita. Seventeen debut jaman aku kuliah. Dulu cuma tau mereka sekilas-sekilas aja. Sampe suatu siang temen ngenalin sama Dont wanna cry, aku bilang "ga ah ga suka Seventeen, kebanyakan orangnya, lagunya juga biasa aja, susah ngapalin wajahnya, kaga nemu yang cakep!". Orgil banget emang dulu, cakep banget mereka padahal :((
Keras kepala sekali bilang ga akan kena racun.

Tiba-tiba denger Check In di TV, kok enak. Penasaran denger lagi Pretty You, kok jadi semangat. Paling kepentok pas denger Home, kok berasa punya tempat, berasa disayang sekali. Ga keitung berapa kali muter Home. Mulai deh kucari tau mereka siapa. Aku jadi Carat jalur karma wkwkw.

Sampe akhirnya nemu clip Gose yang Mousebuster, aku yang ga suka nonton variety show, eh gara2 mereka sengklek aku jadi suka. Gose sekarang jadi tempat aku lari dari hari-hari yang kelam. Kalau sedih, kesepian rewatch Gose.

Terima kasih ya Seventeen. Kalian ga akan bisa kira sebesar apa dampak baik yang udah kalian beri buat aku di hari-hari yang panjang ini. Ayo kita bareng-bareng terus ya. Sehat-sehat 💕

author: @islandggal
text:
Dear Seventeen, 
from a Spanish carat



Estoy y siempre estaré orgullosa de ustedes, además de agradecida de todo el amor y cariño que nos entregan desde 2015, siempre se esfuerzan al máximo por nosotros/as carats, y por eso espero que sepan que los amamos con todo nuestro corazón y al igual que ustedes estuvieron con nosotros/as durante este tiempo, espero que todos podamos cumplir estando con ustedes por siempre.
HAPPY 6TH ANNIVERSARY!! 

And even though I wasn´t a carat since the beginning I will be one till the very end.
THANK YOU FOR EVERYTHING, FOR ALL THOSE SMILES, HAPPINESS, AND COURAGE YOU BROUGHT US.

Feliz 6to aniversario, siempre estaré feliz y orgullosa de decir que soy Carat , que los amo con todo mi corazón a cada uno de ustedes , recuerdo la primera vez que los conocí con dont wanna cry , de hecho pensé que solo sería only fan de un grupo , pero ustedes llegaron a mi vida y nunca pensé que se volverían tan importantes e indispensables para mi , nunca me alcanzarían todas las palabras para expresar todo mi amor hacia ustedes , simplemente gracias , gracias por ser mi apoyo, gracias absolutamente por todo, gracias por quedarse conmigo en los peores momentos , los amo mucho.

author: @lauramc.17
text: Time does really fly, huh? I can't believe it's been already 6 years since these wonderful boys were introduced to us under the name of "Seventeen". So many things have happened, so many memories, so many laughs and tears, but I've enjoyed every part of this journey without doubt and I wouldn't trade it nor change any of it, because this journey is what has made Seventeen and Carat what we are today. Words will never be enough to express all the love and gratitude I have for you guys but I will never get tired of repeating that meeting you has been are one of the best things that happened in my life, thank you for all your hard work, for showering us with your love and being by our side. I love you and will continue loving you unconditionally. Happy 6th anniversary, here is for many more! 🥂💖💙

author: @hannahtang1308
text:
Dear Seventeen,
Thank you for being there for me these past 6 years. When you first debuted, your energy, freshness, and passion invigorated me, and just as I have grown throughout the years since then (going through college, graduating, working, now in medical school), it has been such a joy to see you all grow and mature as well. Thank you for capturing my youth and all the emotions that come with it: the bittersweetness, the sadness - but also the happiness and the excitement of it all. I've seen you beat all the odds, growing steadily over time, never losing your initial humility. Let's go a long way, Seventeen! Love you all! <3

author: @h3abee49
text:
¿Cómo debería iniciar esto? Tal vez dando las gracias, gracias por todo lo que han hecho por mi, gracias por existir. 
Han pasado seis años desde que debutaron y cuatro desde que estoy con ustedes, cuatro años que tal vez para algunos serán pocos, pero para mi, para mi han sido tan especiales. Estoy muy orgullosa, ni siquiera puedo expresar todo lo que siento. Deseo que podamos seguir juntos por mucho mas tiempo, de igual forma, tengo la esperanza de que en el futuro podamos vernos cara a cara. 
Espero que hayan tenido un buen día, sigan esforzándose como lo han hecho hasta ahora. 
No se les olvide descansar y tomar agüita, tampoco se exijan demasiado y tómenlo con calma, saben que aquí estaremos pase lo que pase. 

Sigamos brillando hasta el final. 
- Annie.

author: @lywlyw3073
text:
HAPPY 6TH ANNIVERSARY SEBONG

Aku mau ikutan curhat jugaaa:(
Aku baru jadi kpopers 3 tahun ini dan grup pertama kali aku stan ya Seventeen. Aku mau ngucapin makasih buat temenku yang ngenalin kpop lagi? (Iya lagi soalnya pas SD sempet suka tapi pas smp aku udh stop) dan yang dikenalin itu sebong. Di akhir bulan Februari 2018 aku diajak nonton MV DWC, thanks, clap, boom boom, dll, trus variety show, sampe isac tentang sebong juga, di situ aku gapaham apa apa tapi pas denger lagunya enak, asik, pokoknya pulang pulang ngepoin lagi sebong lewat gugel trus nontonin mv, video-video sebong deh.. sampe memutuskan jadi carat walaupun di 2020 an sempet ga terlalu ngikutin karena berasa lg down, tapi pas lg down gini sebong lewat lagi di sosmed dan akhirnya ketarik lagi... sebong ini jadi salah satu support system buat aku<3 aku ngerasa aku bisa lebih hargai diri sendiri hihi..
Kadang suka ngerasa nyesel kenapa ga kenal keluarga ini dari zaman tembok ijo gtu hehe, tapi gapapa aku mau menjaga yang sekarang aja sampe seterusnyaaaa{} 

Aku bahagia dan bersyukur bisa jadi salah satu anggota keluarga Seventeen Carats<3
Makasih udah lahir.. Aku sayang Seventeen Carats{}<3

hai, aku carat sejak kalian memulai era adore u 2015. terima kasih kepada temanku yang saat itu mengenalkan kalian ke aku. mengenal kalian salah satu hal terbaik yang aku pilih. maafkan aku yang sempat sibuk dengan grup-grup lain, dan sedikit teralihkan dan tidak menemani penuh pertumbuhan kalian serta menemai luka kalian. tapi jujur, setiap comeback mendengarkan satu album kalian tidak pernah terlewatkan♡, karena aku tidak akan melewatkan karya luar biasa kalian. karena mau sejauh apapun aku melangkah, tetap aku baliknya ke kalian-kalian lagi. karena kalian rumahku, dan fandom ini fandom pertamaku. you've brought me here, k-pop world.

salah satu hal baik pandemi yang membawa aku kembali ke kalian, terima kasih. terima kasih sudah menemani aku dikala sibuk dan penat dari tugas-tugas kuliah. membuatku tertawa walaupun fisik rasanya lelah dan butuh tidur luar biasa. terima kasih, seventeen. kalian salah satu alasan aku bisa tersenyum sampai saat ini. semoga tahun ini kalian semakin tumbuh dengan baik bersama carat♡. reotranghae♡

author: @뚝딱-b8w
text: '내 사랑은 겨우 이거밖에 안돼' 라는 가사가 계속 곱씹어져. 세븐틴이 우리에게 주는 사랑은 절대 적지 않은 양이야. 6년 동안 내내 세븐틴의 팬이었던 것은 아니지만 그 기간동안의 세븐틴의 사랑이 얼마나 절절했고 진심이었는지는 알 수 있어. '지켜줄게 너의 모든날에" 라는 마지막이 참 믿음직스러워. 우리 앞으로 지나갈 많은 나날들을 서로서로 지켜주며 사랑하며 일으켜주며 보내자. 나의 자랑스러운 사람들아. 세븐틴이 나의 영역에 들어와줘서 얼마나 다행인지 몰라. 마냥 평범했던 날들이 세븐틴을 만나 제일 특별한 날로 변했어. 너무 고마워. 너무너무 사랑해. 우리의 미래를 예상하지 못하더라도 우리는 늘 함께니까, 많은 걱정은 하지 않았으면 좋겠어. 언제나 좋은 음악과 퍼포먼스를 가져와줘서 고마워. 언제나 기대 이상의 무대를 가져와줘서 고마워. 언제나 캐럿들을 생각해줘서 고마워. 그리고 언제나 캐럿들을 사랑한다고 표현해줘서 고마워. 사랑해. 고마워. 축하해.

author: @amishinta2065
text: Kenal kpop sekitar tahun 2010 waktu itu ditunjukin mv ring ding dong shinee sama temen dan saya jatuh cinta dan jadi kpopers ngak sehat -__- saya ngak suka boyband lain dan terkadang merendahkan sama seperti oknum kpopers jaman sekarang yg menghina semua group kecuali yg dia pilih maklum waktu itu saya masih kelas 7 smp. Tahun 2014 saya berusaha berhenti obsesi ke kpop demi kebaikan saya dan demi fokus menjalani SMA. Tapi tahun 2017 teman kuliah saya memperlihatkan dance practice seventeen nice ,yg waktu itu saya pikirkan adalah "gila penari latar nya kuat semua" dan "itu yg rambut panjang cakep :v" berawal dari ingin tahu jeonghan akhirnya saya terjatuh lagi ke dunia kpopers -__- dan menyukai seluruh member seventeen. Tapi alhamdulillah sekarang saya tidak membenci group lain bahkan sedih waktu got7 bubar

author: @Yasmin-ld8ev
text:
seventeen, nama yg selalu aku ikuti dari jaman2 seventeen project.
inget banget waktu itu lg bosen banget sama kpop. lagi fokus kelas 12 sma. fokus belajar terus tiap hari. temen dikit. kosong. terus kalian debut. menemani kelas 12ku yg semakin kesepian. membuat aku percaya gapapa buat fokus sama diri sendiri dulu biar bisa kuliah di tempat yg aku mau. aku selalu muter still lonely setiap hari menuju sbmptn. 4 jam belajar bener2 denger lagu itu aja biar tenang. selalu bilang gapapa kalau sendiri 

terus kuliah, gak dapet jurusan yg dimau. gak nyangka sampe drop mental di tahun pertama dan lagu kalian masih jadi penyelamat. terus sbmptn ulang, balik lagi bikin playlist lagu2 kalian dan tentu tetep balik ke still lonely. 

jaman2nya mencoba keluar dari toxic attachment di relationship, lagu fear keluar. aku jadi mikir. banyak sekali berfikir. dan akhirnya berdamai sama diri sendiri :)

sekarang lagi skripsian, aku udah jauh lebih baik dari dulu. walau capek harus magang di beberapa tempat sambil skripsi tapi selalu kehibur sama gose kalian tiap pekan. ngeliatin obrolan kalian di weverse aja udh bisa ngobatin rasa lelah kerja. apalagi puitisnya wonwoo atau peliharaannya jeonghan😂 oh iya, sekarang aku selalu dengerin together tiap skripsian loh! lagunya hangat banget. ngeyakinin aku bahwa aku akan terus bisa.

kita jalan terus bareng-bareng ya? meskipun nanti aku bakal lebih sibuk kerja, mungkin menikah, dan duniaku sendiri. meskipun nanti kalian bakal fokus individual project dan wajib militer. semoga kita selalu tetap bisa jalan beriringan. terima kasih sudah menolong aku di saat2 sulitku dengan musik kalian. selalu bersyukur bisa kenal kalian dan karya2nya☺❤

author: @simpingforgyu
text:
to Seventeen and Carats,

Yesterday morning, I remember counting down for when it would be May 26th 12 AM KST. One of the first things I did was reach out to my online carat friends and wish us a happy anniversary, reminiscing on my friendships with them and how svt had brought us together. Then we start reminiscing on the past six years with svt and how much y'all have grown. Thank you, and I feel like thank you will never be enough to encapsulate all that I mean. But thank you so much for allowing us in your lives, for letting us watch you grow and to grow with you. Svt is home. I have never found anything else, let alone another group that makes me feel so at home, so warm. Your music feels like a hug, wrapping me with the warmth of the sun setting. I got so emotional reading y'all's post on weverse, listening to Carat's version of thank you for being born, I was crying all morning. We are so so proud of y'all. Please remember that we are always here to support you. Don't forget that you have one another, please cherish one another and the bond y'all have. Remember to take breaks (running itself is tough enough, but not running is an option too) and know we will always be waiting patiently. Thank you for letting us cherish you.

Happy six years, my loves.

author: @ankitachoudhury4282
text:
I discovered these talented men last year during lockdown, and I immediately fell in love. They helped me find purpose in life when I was absolutely clueless. I will complete one year of being a Carat in a couple of months, and entering the Carat world has been one of the best decisions that I've ever made💜 💎 They made me believe in myself, in love, in strength, in life and all the good things that we are surrounded by :')
Thank you, Seventeen ❤️

text: so so many thoughts running through my mind watching this, but my most important thing to say is: thank you so much, seventeen, my family. please know that the love and gratitude you express for carats at any given opportunity is reflected back in equal (if not exponential) measure. thank you for 6 years of healing. watching you sing with your hearts, a new stripped back arrangement, in the beauty of nature…sing with voices and faces so full of love for your members and your carats, i’m struck by just how beautiful i find you all. and it’s not about your physical features (even though y’all are objectively gorgeous and getting more handsome every day smh)…it’s that feeling of looking at someone and they’re the most beautiful thing you’ve ever seen BECAUSE you love them. you’re beautiful because my heart loves you, and i love you because your hearts are beautiful. god, i’m going through it……

author: @danarii_
text:
Dear: Seventeen

El 18 de Julio del 2017 conocí a 13 chicos que a pesar de no haberlos conocido desde su debut se han convertido en algo especial para mi, que me han ayudado desde tan larga distancia y que quiero proteger desde de la misma forma.

Han sido tantos los momentos que he vivido a su lado, momentos en los que he estado y en los que no, pero eso no evita que me sienta orgullosa y que me hicieran llorar de la misma forma que a todas, como por ejemplo cuando ganaron su firts Win con Pretty U o cuando sus familias les devolvieron sus anillos en seventeen proyect.

Adoro cada una voces, de sus palabras, de sus canciones. Cada uno de ellos son la razón por la que quiero estar viva, por la que lucho y me esfuerzo cada día, y seguir apoyandolos con el hermoso nombre de carat es algo de lo que nunca me voy a arrepentir de por vida.

En algún momento de mi vida miraré hacia atrás, hacia mi pasado -que justo ahora es mi presente-, y cuando lo haga quiero estar orgullosa de haberme llamado Carat, estar feliz de haber crecido junto con ellos, de haber reído, disfrutado y adorado cada momento.

Happy 6th year anniversary! I just wanted to tell you how grateful I am  for being my comfort. Your music really inspired and help me a lot, especially this tough times. It's my 4 years with you and it's amazing how I saw your journey as a group. Every step of the way, you always made sure to let us feel loved. Thank you for being part of my life. Hope I see you again soon.

Dear : Seventeen
From : me
 Congratulations on your 6th birthday this year.
I feel the happiness that comes when I see them lovingly together. They grow and work together like siblings, I think I want to feel that too. My teenage years are very happy to know you learn from you I am very happy to know you, my inspiration my happiness and love that grows when seeing you. Your songs are very good appearance I always amazed. You are great for working hard today and yesterday. If you are in front of me I will cry, hug you to say many thanks for everything which is difficult to explain. Let's continue to be the one full of happiness for everyone. Wozi oppa I want to give lyrics to you for all of you. "If you guys go I can't walk to keep looking, realize that we are still one heart"

author: @Symphonyves
text:
My dearest Seventeen and Carats all over the world, 

Its been rough for me, especially recently, but i cant describe in words the amount of comfort and love i feel being in this fandom and supporting you. You all have matured so much and every time i think of how far you come, im moved to tears.

 You are all beautiful souls who have come to find a family with each other, i dont really have one so im very honoured and blessed to see all of you so close to each other. I love watching you guys and supporting you no matter what so please go at your own pace because i along with the many other carats out there will be waiting for you no matter what.

 We care for you and want you to be healthy as well as happy doing what you do. Im so happy to be a part of the carat fandom because watching you guys no matter what youre doing brings me so much happiness through such dark times. 

Thank you carats, thank you seventeen, all of you are special diamonds so lets keep supporting our boys together! ♡

text:
Hi there dear seventeen, 
I had the great opportunity to see you guys live once, it was the most beautiful experience of my life ever, the vocals, the energy, the looks, the styles, everything! It was sureal, i remember crying while singing my heart out, all my problems where gone in that night, it was just me, fellow carats and an amazing stage that i wished it never end. 
You guys are my source of energy, my safe place and my comfort place, its amazing how music has no limits, even if i can't understand all thats said, i can feel it and that is just amazing. I hope that only good things happen to you guys, the best of the best 'cus you deserve it, all this 6 years of hard work just show how incredible artists you are, I'm so proud of being part of this family and I hope that it will continue being like this for a looong time (❁´◡`❁) Love you forever～

Thanks for being my light (´▽`ʃ♡ƪ)
Seventeen fighting! (≧∇≦)ﾉ
From a chilean Carat 💙💗

author: @nadiarafifah2348
text:
Liat carat pada nulis ucapan-ucapan buat seventeen, aku juga mau ikutan, hehe. 

Kenalin, aku baby carat, baru banget jadi carat 3 bulan yang lalu. Aku udah kenal mereka dari 2019 sebenernya, tapi baru stan sekarang. Nyesel bgt, kenapa ga stan dari dulu aja..
Eum, oke, udah cukup perkenalannya, hehe. 

Kalo di inget-inget lagi, aku stan mereka karena lagu Hug dan Going Seventeen. Lagu itu bener-bener nenangin aku pake banget. Waktu itu, aku stan mereka pas aku lagi kacau-kacaunya, terus tiba-tiba aku nemu playlist soft lagunya seventeen. Dengerin lagu-lagu mereka di playlist itu bikin tenang banget. Smile Flower, pinhweel, sama don't listen in secret juga bikin nangis banget. Nangisnya tuh karena lagunya tuh bisa banget bikin aku tenang dan ngelupain masalah aku. Emang ya, lagu seventeen tuh ga ada yg ga bagus, apa lagi lagu balad nyaㅠㅠ 

Ah iya, Going seventeen. Aku pertama kali nonton gose itu gose 2020 yang eps hantu itu, aku lupa eps berapaㅠㅠ terus ketagihan. Eps fav aku itu don't lie 1 sama 2, TTT juga! Aku tiap nonton gose kaya langsung lupa sama masalah, dan langsung senyum, padahal baru intro doang. Ya.. walaupun lupa nya cuma sebentar, hehe. 
Udah, segitu aja ceritanya, udah panjang bgt, haha.

Terima kasih, Seventeen. Makasih karena udah bertahan sampai 6 tahun ini. Makasih karena udah nyiptain lagu-lagu yang bagus banget. Makasih, karena lagu-lagu kalian aku bisa bertahan sampe sekarang. Makasih banget udah bikin lagu-lagu yang selalu bisa bikin aku tenang. Makasih banget karena senyum kalian selalu bisa bikin suasana hati aku naik lagi. Dan juga, Terima kasih S.Coups karena udah jadi Leader yang sangat baik. Leader yang ga hanya sayang sama member, tapi juga sayang sama Carat. 

Aku gatau lagi harus nulis apa, karena rasa terima kasih dan rasa sayang aku ke kalian gabisa dijabarin satu-satu. 

Pokoknya Terima Kasih. Semoga kalian bisa bertahan sampe 10 tahun, atau 20 tahun kedepan. 

I really Love you guys❣

author: @reese7297
text:
Dear seventeen
A Carat somewhere in south east US
People say your home is where your heart is. if so, then seventeen is my home. I’ve only been a Carat for 5 months. Thinking about it, it’s a short but long time. In that time, i’ve listened to so many songs. and i’ve even attended their online concert in🤖com🤖plete🤖. Though i’ve only ever watched them through a screen, they’ve helped me more than i think they could even imagine. this is my first anniversary. Happy 6th anniversary Seventeen, we’ll continue to build memories during this time and in the future. we will be able to look back on this time and be like “yes we did that!” 💓💓💓

author: @mariaeduardachiarelli4508
text:
Hi, Seventeen... I’m a Brazilian Carat, and I have so much to say to you guys! Well, I’ll try my best to translate my feelings to English hahaha... Well, now it’s been like a year since I became a Carat (wow, it’s already been so long??), and don’t stan Seventeen earlier is one of my biggest regrets haha
You all came to my life in a really hard time and helped so much to go through it, and I fell so thankful that I can’t put in words... I don’t know if I would be here without you all :( 
I don’t usually say that, but I love you guys. 
I have so much respect and admiration for your job; you’re changing lives with your music! 
I just feel proud of everything Seventeen (and Carats! Haha) are reaching (?), please keep it up! I know that’s dark moments when you just wanna give up, and I say that by my own experience, but don’t do that... You’ll always have Carats and each others. You’re music save lives, but don’t risk yours for it.
Ok, sorry, it’s came emotional. What I’m trying to say is: thank you so much for your hard work, and happy 6th anniversary! I hope so much more’ll come.

author: @elokdarazulisma1291
text:
Hallo Seventeen, 
Pada tahun debut kalian 2015 aku sempat menjadi orang yang menyukai banyak grup dan memasuki fandomnya termasuk kalian, namun perlahan aku meninggalkannya sampai april 2016 aku memutuskan untuk menjadi seorang CARAT semata, entah apa yang membuat diri ini kagum ke kalian aku tidak bisa menjelaskannya secara spesifik yang jelas di awal saat menonton sebuah acara musik aku menemukan sebuah kehangatan dan ketulusan waktu itu dari senyuman seorang S.COUPS ketika menatap ke kamera disitulah aku yakin untuk mendukung SEVENTEEN lebih lagi, lambat laun semakin dalam aku menyelam menjadi seorang CARAT aku tidak bisa keluar dan meninggalkan kalian terlalu nyaman diri ini mejadi bagian dari SEVENTEEN & CARAT
Terima kasih sudah menemani diri ini sampai sekarang kurang lebih 5 tahun 11 bulan, meski aku sedikit menyesal diawal tidak mengetahui kalian sejak tembok hijau, namun penyesalan itu lambat laun mulai tidak aku pikirkan lagi karena terlalu banyak rasa kasih sayang yang kalian berikan kepada carat sehingga aku dapat melupakannya, terima kasih selalu menjadi peneman diri ini ketika sedih maupun senang terutama menjadi peneman diriku dimalam hari waktu belajar ataupun mencatat materi kuliah... Kalian sudah ku anggap sebagai rumah kedua ku.

Semangat kesayangan CARAT Choi Seungcheol, Yoon Jeonghan , Hong Jisoo, Wen Junhui, Kwon Soonyoung, Jeon Wonwoo, Lee Jihoon, Lee Dokyeom, Kim Mingyu,  Xu Minghao, Boo Seungkwan, Chwe Hansol, Lee Chan, tetap menjadi SEVENTEEN yang selalu dibanggakan oleh diriku dan CARAT. 
Terima Kasih kalian telah berusaha keras sampai detik ini, jaga kesehatan kalian mari berjalan bersama - sama dalam jangka panjang. I Love U SEVENTEEN🥰💎

semua ini berkat Coronce sih, kalo ga koronce mungkin Juni 2020 gue tidak menemukan Seventeen dan Gose.
I know SVT since 2017 with DWC (and last week i found my Line Post which i wrote for them, as i apreciate their Sync 2x dance on weekly idol).
But i dont stan them on that time, i just love their title song..
And then On June 2020, i watched Hit the Road, waited for their comeback, and still voted them on MAMA everyday...
And now, even i dont obsess again with them, i still waited for their gose.... every week...
Thankyou seventeen for being seventeen. If one of them missing, i think it will not be the same.
I hope they will go through the 7yearcurse... THANKYOU ONCE AGAIN SEVENTEEN AND ALSO MY CARAT FELLAS..

text:
Dear seventeen, i know the probability of them reading this is like tinyy very very tiny and even if they read it im not sure if they will understand but, 

thank you for existing and being there when i was hopeless when i needed comfort, thank you for enduring your hardships and enduring all the pain and thank you for sacrifices that you guys made just to become the group you guys are, you can choose a normal concept but you guys choose to inspire and made a safe place where everyone can go to when they needed and im sorry if i cant be there for you when you are having a hard time and i love you guys, 

thank you for being there  when i thought i was fighting alone and i thought everything is crumbling and everything seems so dark but you guys helped through your songs and honestly i didnt know what ill be if i didnt click that one lyric video of thanks on my youtube  recommendation, i know this is just one of the many letters that you recive but you guys helped us alot of stragers pass through our hard time and thank you for entertaining us and comforting us through your own ways, even just a single selca or good morning cheered ALOT of carats without you guys knowing and  yea 谢谢你们， 然后 我爱你们

author: @chaniehae
text:
Happy anniversary my happiness ❤
Ga terasa ya udah 6 tahun aja sekarang. Perasaan baru kemaren banget aku ngestan kalian. Baru kemaren banget jadi bagian dari carat. Eh tau taunya udah 4 kali aja aku ngerayain anniversary bareng kalian. ♡
Eh iya, makasih ya udah hadir di hidupku. Agak nyesal sih ga ngikutin kalian dari awal banget, paling nggak dari kalian debut. Kata mereka ga ada kata terlambat untuk mencintai kalian, karena semua akan mencintai kalian disaat yang tepat. Tapi ga tau kenapa tetep aja gitu nyesel ga ngestan dari awal. ◞‸◟ tapi yasudahlah. Yang penting aku sudah berada di tempat yang tepat, di fandom yang tepat dan mencintai orang yang tepat.
Oiya, makasih ya udah mengajarkan aku untuk lebih mencintai diriku sendiri meskipun aku belum bisa melakukannya dengan baik dan sempurna tapi makasih banget. Heheh.. Makasih udah buat aku merasa dicintai. Disaat aku merasa sendirian, kalian hadir dengan lagu lagu indah kalian. Disaat aku merasa tak ada seorangpun yang mencintaiku, kalian hadir dan membuatku merasa dicintai. Padahal kita belum pernah ketemu heheh.
Dan makasih juga udah ngebantuin aku keluar dari dunia yang gelap dengan karya karya kalian yang luar biasa. Dengan kekocakan kalian juga. Makasih udah nyuruh istirahat disaat lelah. Aku ga pernah menyadari pentingnya beristirahat sampai akhirnya kalian menyadari ku betapa pentingnya istirahat itu.
Tau ga sih kalian pernah nyelamatin hidupku cuma dengan lagu kalian? Wkwk. Lebay kan? Tapi emang bener. Aku masih disini karena kalian. Jadi teruslah berkarya dan menghibur banyak orang. Aku yakin ga cuma aku yang ngerasa kalau kalian itu penyelamat dan penyemangat setiap harinya. 

Sukses selalu dan mari sama sama melangkah ke depan dan meraih apa yang kita harapkan bersama.

Ga pinter ngerangkai kata kata aku tuh hiks. Tapi semoga ini nyampe di kalian meskipun bahasa yang ku pake ga kalian mengerti. Gapapa. Yang penting nyampe aja hehe.

author: @mywis1233
text:
我来加个中文评论吧hhh

致、SEVENTEEN
恭喜你们通关了第五级，并开启了第六级的挑战。
这非常的可喜可贺，也希望你们能平平安安、一路上顺顺利利。
粉丝们最害怕看到也最心疼的，就是你们传来受伤或是任何不好的消息。
所以希望你们能健健康康做你们想做的音乐，展现你们所要展现的舞台，带给我们欢乐与幸福，同时也希望你们能得到更多的尊重与支持。
无论如何，克拉们永远都会在你们身后守护着并支持着你们。
只要你们回头一看，就能看到成群结队的我们。

致、CARAT
无论你是多少年的粉丝，甚至是今天才刚成为克拉，都不算太晚。
成为粉丝没有分早或迟，你们能体会到SEVENTEEN的舞台与歌曲魅力，并且入坑，对于SEVENTEEN来说，已经是最欣慰且满足的事情了。
只希望大家能好好守护他们，外界的恶意太多太重，当他们都感到身心疲惫之时，希望我们当中不要再有人落井下石，如果没办法选择继续守护并支持他们，就请直接离开，别再给二次伤害。
他们好歹也是他们父母的宝贝儿子，二次伤害之前请换个立场想想，如果自己以后的孩子遭受这样的恶意，你还会选择这种做法吗？
粉丝圈就像个小社会，希望我们能在其中学会如何善意对待他人，强硬抵抗外来恶意，互相包容，互相了解，并不是互相攀比，互相嘲讽。

无论如何，我很感谢自己闯进了这个克拉圈子，也很感谢SEVENTEEN依旧初心地制作好音乐、创造好舞台，也感谢因为喜欢SEVENTEEN而遇到的克拉朋友们，能让我在充满压迫气息的现实生活里有个喘息的机会。

SEVENTEEN，六周年快乐，祝你们一帆风顺，前途持续似锦。

author: @aiyukahan5858
text:
Dear SEVENTEEN, 
You guys came when I least expected it.. Never in my life I thought I would attached to these wonderful 13 guys.. "Love will always find a way" I guess it's true tho.  I heard about you guys few times even I met you few times earlier in Nuest "Face" and Hello Venus mv but I never thought all of you would gonna to be this important in my life.. During one breaking point in my life, you guys kept appeared around my surrounding till I finally paid attention to you guys.. At first I thought I wont be interested to you guys again after I watched Mansae mv then few months later I heard about you guys again.. I suddenly became interested to see your new song and I watched it, I like it.. I slowly became a fan.. I slowly catching up with your content.. I became curious then I found out how I actually have met you guys before in your senior mv.. It was shocking to me how you guys kept on coming yet I never really paid attention to you until the right moment; where I finally became a fan.. I felt addicted to you guys more than your music.. I only heard few songs but since the addiction is overwhelming and making me wanting more and more from you guys, I finally opened my heart to hear all songs in your album (which I never did this to any groups) Guess what? I felt so much regret of how I wasted so much time before.. Why didnt I stan you guys from the start? Didnt know you guys are this great in making music.. You guys really on the next level idol.. I found so much happiness in you guys.. Every small gesture from you guys hit me to the heart.. I feel loved and appreciated by how much you guys love us.. I love how our bond is strong, our relationship between idol and fan is healthy.. I love your positiveness and passion to be better and do what you like and live your moment to the fullest.. Thank you so much for coming to my life.. My youth is wonderful because I'm with SEVENTEEN.. Let's walk on the flowery path together.. Seranghae~ 💖

dear seventeen, 
happy 6th anniversary!! i only spent 5 years with you but those years were not easy, i've been through a whole lot of stress from school and life in general but having you by my side, you guys creating music literally saved me from giving up. i have always used you as my inspiration, motivation, escape as you gave me so much comfort and love, you never once failed in those 5 years that we shared. you guys are the funniest, most down to earth people and the most charming group of people i ever supported and you guys will always make me proud with your successful career. i will always treasure the memories you shared with us. i love you seventeen! please continue making what you love as you give other people a chance to continue with their own lives. thank you for the best 5 years <3

author: @rainsnoww9958
text:
Dear Seventeen
From one of carats

Sebenernya terdorong buat ini karena lihat komen2 banyak yg mencurahkan isi hatinya terkait sebong wkwk. 
Oke. Seventeen terimakasih karena kalian ada dan hadir di hidup aku, semua lagu yang kalian buat dan nyanyikan itu benar2 punya aura tersendiri yang bukan hanya sekedar lagu ataupun musik, karena aku bisa merasakan setiap emosi dan pesan yg ingin kalian sampaikan disana.

Seventeen, sekali lagi terimakasih karena kalian lahir di dunia ini. Keberadaan kalian membuat aku mengerti bahwa setiap orang memiliki potensi dan bakatnya. Terimakasih dengan segala keceriaan dan tawa yg kalian berikan kepada kami, sungguh dengan hal itu di hari yang lelah, hari yang membuatku terpuruk dan menyesali semuanya suara kalian saja pun sudah membuatku bahagia, apalagi tawa kalian. Nonton gose benar2 seperti salah satu kegiatan yang tidak pernah ingin kulewatkan, yaa karena melihat kalian seperti mencharge kembali energi yg tadinya sudah menghilang.

Seventeen, sekali lagi terimakasih. Teruslah berkarya dan menjadi motivasi untuk semua orang. Kalian berharga, i'll stay with you as always i can!!

*terimakasih juga untuk semua carat, kalian hebatt. Salah satu fandom yg memberikan kenyamanan tersendiri. Tetap ingat kita jangan sampai war karena seventeen tidak perlu hal itu. Uri sebong hanya butuh dukungan dan cinta kalian.
Dan terimakasih teman SMA ku yg sudah membiarkan aku ngeliat laptopnya trus tanpa sengaja ngeliat mv sebong yg mansae dan langsung jatuh hati sama s.coups. sampe kepo nontonin semua ofd 1,2 , svt project dll. Sampai sekarang masih ttp bisa mendengarkan semua karya Seventeen, sebuah grup dengan talent dan kebaikan hati yang memikat. Sekali lagi terimakasih.

세븐틴 화이팅 <3

author: @jxlyjae
text:
I have been a carat since 2017. I've realized how much SEVENTEEN have grown as the years have gone by. I remember I was still really young when I first had heard about SEVENTEEN. I was about 8, turning 9 at that time. Now, four years later I am now 12, turning 13 in July. I remember my older sister showing me "Don't Wanna Cry" whilst we were playing Minecraft. 

Thank you SEVENTEEN for everything!

author: @sayamcsu6733
text:
Selamat ulang tahun keenam Seventeen..

Dah lama rupanya duk dalam fandom ni. Kalau anak ni dah masuk tadika dah.. heee

Semoga tahun ini lebih baik dari tahun lepas dan tahun depan lebih baik dari tahun-tahun sebelumnya. Tak tahu nak cakap apa tapi Sebongie mesti faham kan Carat nak cakap apa. Betapa kitorang ni sayang giler kat korang. Teruskan menuju ke hadapan, kitorang akan tetap berada di belakang sokong korang, jalan sama-sama, jatuh bangun kami tetap sayang korang sampai bila-bila, dengan izin-Nya. Terima kasih sebab sentiasa menjadi buah hati pengeran jantung kami. Lepastu tak jemu-jemu duk suap macam-macam tak pernah tinggal. Jaga kesihatan, jaga SOP, InshaaAllah kalau ada jodoh tahun depan boleh jumpa lagi ramai-ramai. Sumpah tak pernah rasa menyesal suka korang. Tujuh belas sampai Tujuh Puluh. Dan selamanya.

Kepada carat, terima kasih kerana tetap ada dengan Seventeen. Mungkin kita sibuk, takde masa untuk diorang. Tapi tak bermakna kita tak sayang, kan. Betul tak?

Salam sayang dari Malaysia.

P/S: Semoga covid cepat hilang dan keadaan kembali macam biasa. Rindu giler nak berfanchant ramai-ramai masa konsert. Jaga diri!


Edited: Trans (cuz i think i should):

Happy 6th anniversary Seventeen.

Been so long in this fandom. If It was a baby, it must be in kindergarten right now. Heee

I wish this year is better than past years and next year will be a better year than previous years. I don’t know what to say but Sebongie  must already know what we are going to say. How we love u so much. Keep going forward, we will always be there behind your back supporting you guys, walking together, either when you fall or rise, we will always love you forever, if He permits. Thank you for always became our sweethearts. And keep spoon feed us tirelessly with so many contents. Take care of your health, perhaps we will meet again soon. I swear I never regret love you guys. Seventeen till Seventy. And forever.

To Carats, thanks for always be there for them. We may be busy with our own life, sometimes no time to them. but it doesn’t mean we dont love them right?

Love, Susu from Malaysia.

P/S: i pray Covid will end soon and everything will be back to normal. Really miss to fanchant together during concert. Take care!

author: @carat_han6121
text:
banyak juga komen dari carat indonesia, kalo gitu aku ikutan.

dear seventeen, maaf baru kenal kalian tahun 2017 pas kalian comeback clap (karna baru suka kpop tahun 2017). maaf baru stan kalian tahun 2018 pas kalian comeback oh my!.
terima kasih udah ngisi hari-hari kita dengan cara ngasih kita banyak asupan konten (terutama masa pandemi ini). hari-hari aku yang tadinya sepi dan ga bermakna langsung berubah setelah tau dan nontonin kalian terus. setiap hari selalu rindu, setiap udh liat pengen liatin terus, kalo udh selesai liat langsung rindu lagi. walaupun aku belum pernah ketemu kalian langsung, tapi entah kenapa rasanya kita tuh deket bgt.
lagu-lagu kalian, lirik di lagu kalian, makna dari lagu kalian, kekeluargaan kalian, itu yang bikin aku mantap untuk stan 1 grup aja, SEVENTEEN. awal aku tau kalo kalian self-producing idol, aku langsung tertarik sama kalian, sekaligus bangga apalagi umur kalian masih 20an. wow.
udah sih, semoga sehat-sehat terus yaa sebong, biar bisa bareng-bareng terus dalam waktu yang lama. horanghae

author: @kosmossvt7794
text:
Hello Seventeen, happy 6th anniversary. I have big appreciation and love for you, you manage to make me smile everyday, I like how you communicating with Carats it doesn't feel like you're distant at all, I love the music you're making and the friendship you all have. Although I just discovered you last year I feel like I've followed you since the beginning, I feel relaxed watching your content and it always brightens up my mood. All of the members are so talented, every time you release new music, performance or dance, even though I know that it will be highest quality, because your content always is, you still manage to leave me in awe. Everything about you feels so authentic and honest, thank you for sharing with us part of your lives, thank you for being you and thank you for being born.
From the moment I've met you to everything that will happen in the future I'll always follow and support you. I'm so proud of you and I'm proud to be a Carat.

author: @Sailomnrk4738
text:
Muchas felicidades chicos! 🎉💞
Yo hace casi 3 meses que entre al fandom, pero no pude evitar que se robaran una gran parte de mi corazón en tan poco tiempo, los aprecio demasiado, sé que no estuve desde el inicio pero prometo estar aquí hasta el final, sean 1 año, 2 años, 10 años o incluso 100 años, y aquí estaré no lo haré por obligación sinó por el gran amor que les tengo a todos ustedes. 
Sean fuertes, el camino ha sido difícil pero aquí están, porfavor nunca se rindan.
Cuando se sientan tristes pienses en todas sus fans, en lxs Carat's que siempre los apoyaremos y siempre estaremos ahí para ustedes.
Finalmente muchas gracias, por formar parte de mi vida ya que con sus canciones y sus fantásticas personalidades de cada uno de ustedes alegran mis días tristes y me suben el ánimo.

author: @jadeuibnida
text:
Mahal kong Seventeen,
Salamat dahil isa kayo sa mga naging dahilan bakit ako masaya, sa lahat ng paghihirap nyo sa loob ng 6 na taon, lahat ng yon ay hindi namin makakalimutan. Hindi ako sigurado kung mababasa nyo to (kung mabasa nyo man, di nyo naman maiintindihan lols), gusto ko pa rin magpasalamat ng marami, sa lahat ng paghihirap, dedikasyon, mga awit at lahat ng nagawa nyo, isa kayo sa mga pinaka hinahangaan kong grupo, dahil kahit ang layo na ng narating nyo, 'di nyo pa rin kami kinakalimutang mga Carats at patuloy lang na nakalapat ang inyong mga paa sa lupa (ang lalim shet). Naririto kaming mga Carats hanggang sa huling "Say The Name, Seventeen!". Salamat muli.
                             Nagmamahal, Pinoy Carat <3

author: @nanivintin
text: Being four years together with you but it feels like we’ve been connected all my life, I met you when I needed you the most and I can only say how glad I am that you were born, I’m glad you made me look at the bright side of this life and everything made a change after you came to save me, you bring me a feeling of happiness and love no one will ever replace or even be close to give the same, you are the most talented, funny, beautiful, respectful, interesting, and I could say more, but I would never end describing you, you are the most special people and you’ve never left me alone no matter the situation I was in, and I couldn’t be more grateful than I already am for that. As you have said on your own, the rest of this precious family with you and carats get our energy from each other, you give me what I need to continue, and we give it back. We’ve made a bunch of memories in the past 6 years, and I’m already willing to see what’s coming to us next, I love you forever, and thank you 💛

Dear SEVENTEEN,

WE WILL BE HERE NO MATTER WHAT. THANK YOUU FOR BEING BORN!

ALL THE LOVE,
CARATS [sometimes carrots, sometimes charger and sometimes cabinets]

author: @jadev164
text:
My dear Seventeen,

I've been following your journey for 6 years already. It seems like yesterday when I first watched your debut MV for Adore U but 6 years have gone by already and both you and me have grown and changed so much since. 
I've seen you go from a rookie group with an uncertain future to one of the biggest, most popular and most respected group in the industry. Your creativity, your passion and resilience, your strong bond nurtured by consideration and respect for each other, all of those things have taught me a lot and helped navigate through the toughest moments of my life.
Through those 6 years you've given me comfort when I was tired, joy when I was sad and guidance when I was lost. Words are not enough to express how thankful I am for your existence. The only thing I can say is that, as long as there is a group called Seventeen, there will be me supporting and loving you.

Happy 6 years and cheers to many more years to come and even more success. I love you ❤️

Happy 6th Anniversary Seventeen

Kalian adalah 13 laki laki hebat yg slalu memberikan carat kebahagiaan. Gk bakal ada kata2 yg bisa deksripsiin rasa terima kasih carat ke kalian, gw mau kalian slalu inget ada carat disini, carat bakal didepan kalian utk melindungi kalian dari apapun. Makasih udh kasih karya2 yg hebat untuk carat, makasih udh bekerja keras demi kasih kita penampilan yg keren

Kalian jgn lupa istirahat ya, jaga kesehatan juga kita carat gk butuh penampilan yg hebat kita cuma butuh 13 laki laki hebat kita slalu sehat dn bahagia seperti carat yg slalu diberi kebahagiaan oleh kalian

Carat bakal terus berusaha untuk membalas apa yg kalian kasih ke kita, meskipun balasan kita mungkin tidak setimpal

Sekali lagi makasih ya udh slalu ada untuk carat, CARAT SAYANG SEBONG BANYAK BANYAK ❤️❤️❤️

author: @Sabrina-hz5dr
text:
hai carat selamat anniversarry 6 tahun, untuk carat yang masih bertahan sampai titik ini, masih bersama dan mendukung seventeen makasih banyak :), jangan tinggalin seventeen ya carat. 
untuk seventeen makasih udah temenin 5 tahun 5 bulan dari masih smp sampai kuliah, terimakasih udah datang disaat yang tepat, saat udah lelah hidup, saat gapunya temen, saat dimana masa sekolah itu rasanya kayak neraka, saat masih males-malesan, saat satu keluarga ga ada waktu untuk peduli, saat sakit keras, saat pengen ngakhirin idup karena udah ngerasa worthless banget.

dan makasih udah jadi motivasi untuk merubah kehidupan, untuk start a whole new page, i'm now not the old me, but a new happy me. i proudly say that i'm no longer unsatisfied with my life, i cherished life more since i know seventeen. terimakasih seventeen udah menempuh dan membantu mencari jalan baru. maaf gabisa ngedukung 100% kayak dulu. i love my family seventeen-carats

text:
Happy 6th anniversary SEVENTEEN !! Love from Vietnam!!!
Dù không biết đến và đi cùng với mọi người từ những ngày đầu tiên, nhưng từ khi trở thành Carat từ năm 2017 mình không hề hối hận chút nào. Tình yêu và tấm lòng cùng những tác phẩm của mọi người đã giúp mình vượt qua những tháng ngày buồn chán. Cho đến hiện tại, những gì mình đã làm cho mọi người không được nhiều và mình cảm thấy có lỗi một chút. Thêm một năm và thật nhiều năm nữa, hãy cùng nhau đi thật lâu nhé! Mọi người hãy giữ gìn sức khỏe và tiếp tục theo đuổi và thực hiện đam mê nhé! Mình sẽ cố gắng hơn nữa để có thể giúp mọi người nhận được những gì xứng đáng trong tương lai.

author: @ALMP-cn3zb
text:
Dear Seventeen, 

I really don’t know if you guys would ever see this comment but I just want to thank you all so much for everything you guys have done. From giving us hilarious content on Going Seventeen to making the most beautiful songs ever to just showering fans with so much love and support. You guys are truly amazing. Your songs have always given me strength to go through many things in life. Listening to Seventeen’s music is like getting a warm hug — no matter what genre of music it is. I love music, any and all types and genres but listening to your music feels a lot like coming home… warm and comforting, and full of love. I hope you all stay safe and healthy and always be happy! Please know that we carats are here for you too just as you have been here for all of us worldwide. Thank you for the love, Happy 6th Anniversary!! ♥️

author: @jadelu3548
text:
I don't know how to feel about this, I feel like this should be carats message for seventeen. Im sorry our love isn't enough, I'm sorry this is all we could do to support you. If we could just give you everything you guys deserve, there's no doubt we will. You have become our healing, our pillar, our home. Listening to your songs feels like being consoled by a loved one, though you guys may not know each of us personally, but I know that the connection that seventeen and carats have is unbreakable.
It feels cliché but there's no going back now, I will always be here to continue supporting you from afar. Let's reach new heights together, hand in hand in reaching our dreams.

All my love,
Carat

author: @nasywatsurayya9201
text:
ssup guys. aku juga mau ikutan cerita :D

awal tau seventeen gegara nonton mv mansae yang gak sengaja lewat dari yt, hapal banget sama warna rambut mingyu yg at first sight mirip ijo telor asin. gak lama, pas aku smp aku ketemu sama fina, my loafly bestie until now yang ngeracunin aku sama sebong sampai akhirnya aku diajak buat main ke tempat luar konser ode to you.

waktu itu aku baru aja abis di tinggal disband sama favorite boygroup ku yang dulu, istilahnya masih patah hati lah. dan begitu aku denger lagu hug, entah kenapa ada rasa bahwa seventeen itu bisa boygroup yang bisa bangkitin my happiness in kpop fangirling world. 

salah satu alasan utama aku nge stan mereka adalah karena vernon. pertama kali seumur hidup ku, aku nge fans dan jatuh cinta kepada idol ku gegara suaranya. vernon punya the way he rapping sendiri yang kalau di jelasin pake kata kata tuh susah banget. intinya dia berciri khas. dan setiap aku denge dia rapp atau nge vocal tuh selalu merding sendiri, kaya, suara dia semudah itu bikin orang jatuh cinta. dan pada akhirnya, di awal tahun kemarin aku mutusin buat stan mereka, slip into the diamond life, dan jadi carat sampai sekarang.

dulu, cita cita ku sendiri selalu di atur sama ortu. ortu pengen aku jadi apa, aku ikutin. ya namanya juga berkhidmat sih yaaa. tapi semenjak seventeen realease membership kit pilot and looked at them how gergeous theyre in pilot uniform, bikin aku kepikiran mau jadi pilot. aku pengen suatu saat bisa pake seragam yang sama kaya mereka. 

SEVENTEEN itu, selain kebahagiaan, juga alasan aku pengen punya masa depan yang cerah. i just want to tell you that, im glad to be a carat :D and, happy aniversarry my hapinnes~ lets being together for a long time, ya.

author: @leftandrightribbitribbit3988
text:
hi seventeen, 
happy 6th year anniversary! i’m so proud of everything that you’ve done and for all that you’ve done for us carats. it genuinely means the world to us. you make even wednesday, one of the worst days of the week the best days of the week simply by posting going seventeen. you never fail to make us laugh and smile daily. 

when i was struggling and didn’t know where to turn to during the start of quarantine, i found you guys. instantly, you made my time in quarantine so much more happier and cheerful. you made me forget all my regrets and worries for the future. in no way will i be able to repay you for all that you’ve done for me. thank you so much for everything. 

i love you all so so much.

author: @bintangeu
text:
The comment section is so beautiful.
I have much to say but suddenly my mind became blank.
Thank you isn't enough to describe how much grateful I am to be a carat. Seventeen is like home to me. Even though maybe I was too late to join this fandom but still I feel so welcomed. Seventeen really healed me thru the pandemic. Now it's been like a year(?) since I started stanning them. Honestly saying, I've been a kpop stan since 2010 but seventeen really is something else. Maybe it's because I am older and more matured to know what love is. And yes seventeen is love. They meant everything to me. Thinking that this year is the sixth anniversary, made me thinking that will there be the seventh? God , I hate thinking about that but yeah I do thought about it. But no matter what will happen, carats will always stay with seventeen, supporting you guys in everything you guys did.
Till then, thank you so much for being with me when I was at my lowest, when there's no one with me. Thank you so much.
I love you guys so much.♡

author: @annorawal5168
text:
since everyone is writing comments in their own language and showing the diversity of carats and how there are carats from different parts of the world, I'll write something in my language too

mai bri khush hu ki mene seventeen to follow(mai stan ki jghe follow use kr rhi hou kyuki stan sbd shi nhi lgta hai) krna suru kiya, yeh meri zindagi ka sbse bra step hai jo maine ek dm shi liya. mai seventeen ko 2016 se jnti hou pr kbhi follow nhi kiya kyuki mai dusri group ki fan thi aur mujhe lgta tha ki mujhe bs unhi ko stan krna chahiye aur kisi ko nhi, pr mai glt thi, kaash mene seventeen ko suru se support kiya hota itne sme ignore krne ki jagah, kaash mai itni bri buddhu fan nhi hoti, pr abh jo ho gya voh ho gya, mai use change nhi kr skti, uski bajai mai inhe aur saalo saal tk support kr skti hou. mujhe suru se seventeen ka music accha lgta tha pr mere andr ye soch thi ki agr mai kisi aur group ko follow krungi toh mai apne pehle group ko dokha de rhi hou, iske baadjud mai seventeen ke songs jo bhut sunti thi. Toh seventeen ko 2 saal tk dekhne ke baad mene unhe follow krne ka socha, ye mere second group hai jinko mene follow kiya. mujhe lgta tha ki koi baat nhi, mai chahe kitne bhi groups ko follow kru mera first group hmase top pr rhega, pr nhi, mujhe pata bhi nhi chala aur seventeen achanak se top pr aa gya. Mai unko bs dekhti gyi aur dekhti gyi aur eventually voh mere top group bn gye. mene kbhi nhi sochta tha ki koi aur group mere top group banege pr yeh ho gya. mera support seventeen ke liya brta gya aur brta gya. mere phle group ki baat kre toh voh mere first kpop group the isliye mai bhut inexperienced thi aur mujhe lgta tha ki voh best hai even though mene kbhi dusre groups ko suna nhi tha. abh mai sbse first group ko follow nhi krti hou, unka music mujhe suit nhi hota pr mai thankful hou kyuki agr mene unhe kbhi follow nhi kiya hota toh mujhe seventeen ke bre mai kbhi pta nhi chlta. Seventeen ko follow krte hue yeh mera 3rd saal hai, intne time mai mene bhut sre groups ko follow krna suru kr diya hai aur mai ek kpop group bn chuki hou, pr ktine bhi group ko follow kro seventeen mera hmase top pr rheta hai, koi aur group mukje inti appeal aur khushi nhi deta hai, seventeen sbse pehla aur ek he group hai jisne esa kiya hai. time brta jaa rha hai aur abh kpop ka 4th gen aa chuka hai, mai ek amid and true 3rd gen stan hou aur mujhe 4th gen itni appeal nhi deta, abh bhut hi km groups hai jo mere taste ka music bnate hai, sbke ek hi jese concepts hai aur music bhi jadatar same concept ke hai, saath ma sbh performance aur dance pr jaada focus krte hai toh phir mere liye 4th gen groups ko stan krna muskil hai, jse jse time brega vse vse mera interest kpop se kam ho skta hai, mai ek 3rd gen stan hou aur mere saare groups jo jaate hue dekh bra bura lgta hai, mai itna jaada pyaar aur attention aur kisi gen ko nhi de paungi, pr ek cheez hmse same rhegi, mera pyaar seventeen ke liye. kitna bhi time ho jye mai seventeen ko kbhi nhi chorungi, chahe kucch bhi ho jye seventeen mere fav rhenge, till the last say the name and even after the last say the name, mai inhe support dete rhungi aur kbhi nhi chorne vli, seventeen is my happiness, unhone mujhe bhut sri chize sikhyi, aur mai iskilye bhut thankful hou, mai jese bhi ho ske inhe hmase support dungi, physical merch ke saath bhi, but sadly because of corona i can't, they aren't even being delivered to india, but still I'll support them digitally.
All my love to seventeen, please continue what you are doing, we all hope we stay together for a long time,
thankfully, sincerely 
from carats

author: @moviesbooksandmusic9458
text:
I really want to write a letter like the rest of these comments but don't really have a lot of time so I will keep it short.
Dear Seventeen

    Though you don't know who I am and I don't know ya'll personally. You make me feel as if I am loved by this amazingly talented, and supportive family. We all have struggles, some different, some the same. I haven't experienced a lot of things, and the future is scary, but after listing to your songs and watching ya'll, it made me think that even though there are so many uncertain things now and in the future if I am able to continue listening to music from Seventeen and whoever else, it's certain that I will have something to lean on and help bring me up when nothing else can. So many people say that they do it to make the people listing to their music happy and comfortable, but very few actually get that emotion and feeling across to me.Seventeen never fail to do just that. Seventeen you made me a better person inside and out. I thank you with as much sinceraty possible, I hope one day when I'm older and can make a lot of money, Seventeen will still be around and I will get to shower you with love. Even if Seventeen does one day disband, I will support everyone and will forever stand up for these amazing men. Even though it seems impossible to love someone you never met, I love you Seventeen and will continue to love you till the day I die.
              
                                                                        Love,
                                                         A non creepy fan, I realized I sounded kinda weird with the last line but I don't mean it like romantic love.

Hai Seventeen, jujur aku sendiri sebagi carat susah banget nyampain apa yg aku rasain setelah gabung sebagai fandom svt, to be honest healing banget dan yes kalian rumah terakhir aku di dunia perkpop an, dulu aku sendiri dari fandom * 5 tahunan aku ngestan dan merasa udah gak cocok lagi ke aku the taste udh gak sama lagi bahkan udh gak cocok sm fandomnya, akhirnya aku berpaling ke boygroup bentukan produce X1, merasa cocok banget dan udh bakal yakinin bakal ngestan tapi kenyataan matahin aku lagi, X1 bubar dan jadi salah satu pth hati terbesar dan gabisa moveon. Disaat aku mutusin utk stop stan kpop disitu juga temanku ngerecokin mulu sama video video gose nya svt, jujur pertama risih dipaksa nnton mulu aku kalau pengen stan grup ya harus dari akunya sendiri. Yah bbrp hari aku gabut banget dan at least nyoba nnton video svt dan udah mutusin ngestan sejak nnton Seventeen di weekly idol, mereka berbakat banget, bobrok nggak jaim fandomnya damai, sering ngasi saran dan nasihat juga ke carat, pokokny ngga nyesal sekalipun udh ngestan seventeen, makasi udh nyembuhin luka aku sejak bubar nya X1, dan jadi the Last Home.

author: @yolaarindra1615
text:
I don't how to start this 'letter' to Seventeen. Should I start from when I stan them or why I love them? Well, I have known them from Home era. I was mesmerised by their triple barrel turn. I've been into K-pop from 2nd gen and it was the first time I see a group that can dance perfectly. From then on, I let them into my life. Even though I have been into k-pop for years, but it was the first time I wanted to stan a specific group.  I had always thought I was a multifan, but since I know them, I'm not. I never thought I want to buy an album or go to a concert, but now, I did, for Seventeen. It's really funny if I look back. 

They really change my life. I don't think I can remember how I was before I met Seventeen. . Now they are a part of my life. 

When I think about why I love them, I had already fallen for them. 
They are my youth.

Thank you. Let's be together from now on too. Love you.

text: Dear Seventeen, for the past 5 years. Thank you for making my days more beautiful, even though right now I'm not into kpop as much as before because I'm too busy living my life. author: @azkaarina7027
text:
Ini pertama kali banget komen di youtube. Liat carats indo pada rame ucap apresiasi buat cowo-cowo hebat ini. Selamat 6 tahunnya yaa my boys...
Tahun 2017, MV Pinwheel yg baru rilis menemukan jalannya di berandaku. Aku yg waktu itu lagi ngerasa berat tapi sok kuat gamau ngaku lagi susah. Meleleh air mata di part nya Woozi 
"먼 훗날 너에게
미안하지 않게
늘 난 기다릴래 그래
그게 더 맘 편해". 
Buat aku ngerasa bahwa ada yg nunggu aku melewati masa susah, mau seberapa banyak terjatuh. Dan kini aku bangga sama diriku yg bisa ngakuin overwhelming emotion kala itu. 
Beruntung banget dipertemukan kembali dengan Seventeen, yg buat aku nerima diriku sendiri dan gak nyerah hingga bisa sampai di saat ini.

Pinwheel, comfort song aku baik pas sedih, susah maupun bahagia. Pengingat kalo harus terus berjuang agar aku di masa depan gak menyesal dan kecewa pada diri sendiri. Belajar untuk nerima semua emosi yg aku rasakan baik positif atau negatif, apapun itu masih tetaplah aku. Penentram bahwa aku gak sendiri, pantas untuk bahagia dan semua akan baik-baik saja.

Buat temen2, ngakuin kalo kamu lagi gak apa2 itu juga salah satu bentuk self love. Jangan suka dipendem aja, you accept it and life will get better. 

Big love buat seventeen yg udh bersamaku di perjalanan self love ini.

Once again, happy anniversary!

author: @alya5708
text:
Hello Seventeen 
I'm Carat from Malaysia
I don't know if it's too late to tell...
Happy  6th Anniversary Seventeen 🎉🎉
Seventeen was the first group that made me into the Kpop world
I just want to thank you for making my day full of joy with your song🤗. To tell the truth I get to know about Seventeen because my sister forced me to stream Seventeen MV called BOOM BOOM😅. Honestly, at first, I feel annoyed because my sister forced me😑 to keep streaming then time passes I started to like them and their song and of course I want to know more about them🥰. It's funny, right? I got forced from my sister to sister to stream Seventeen's Mv then I started to love them. I want to thank you again for Seventeen, your song helps me a lot, and Of course, I did not forget to thank my fellow CARAT, you guys are kind and sporting. I hope you guys still do what you all do. We will still support you guys no matter where you are. We still love you. I'm crying now 😭😭😭it's been 5 years since I started to stan Seventeen...I'm getting older😅  I'm sorry for my grammar, I tried my best🙆‍♀️. LOVE YOU GUYS ❤.

author: @urgirl6042
text:
HELLO SEVENTEEN
HAPPY 6th ANNIVERSARY.
ini kali pertama aku ngerayain 6th anniversary nya seventeen sebagai carat❤️ pertama kali aku msk dunia kpop waktu tahun 2017 dan itu aku blm kenal svt. aku stop smua hal tentang kpop tahun 2019 awal. trus tahun 2020 baru mau stan svt karna liat GoSe episode yg THE TAG. Kesan pertama buat svt itu membernya asikkk parahh, kek blom pernah liat kpop boy grup yang sePURE asik nya kayak svt. So mulai dari situ aku ngestan svt. tiap hari denger smua lagunya. nyesel banget baru kenal svt sekarang :( pas tau svt, hidup ku kek berubah banget. jarang banget murung, stres karna tgs, dll karna buat aku svt itu kyk ‘my life’ nya aku. trus fandom nya humble bgtt. carats baikk bangett. fandom ter-calm sihh.
buat seventeen makasih banget uda nyiptain semua lagu yang bagusssss bangettt, content yg always bikin ketawa, pokoknya semuaaaa nyaa...
makasiiiii bangetttttt buat kerja keras kalian selama debut 6 tahun ini. semoga seventeen bisa tetep barengg buat waktu yang lama❤️🥰
i love u seventeen

author: @celestealday2321
text:
To Seventeen whom I loved since Love&Letter days,

how can I possibly return your love in full?

For the last 6 years, you have filled my world with your radiance.

Yes. You are my joy. My healing. My love.

Thank you for teaching me what love is and what it could be. Thank you for showing me what I could be by showing us who you are.

It's only been six years. Here's to plenty more flower-filled years to come. It will rain, but we'll sing and dance through it together. Seventeen and Carat, Carat and Seventeen.

All my love,
Your Carat.

text:
Happy 6th anniversary to the most dedicated, hardworking group I know. I literally can not put into words how thankful I am for all 13 of you guys, from your comforting music to your presence you guys make life so much easier & thank you for being a safe place for us CARATs. 
Your music has helped me through some of my hardest times and I’m extremely grateful to have stumbled across you guys if only I found out about you guys earlier :’) I haven’t been here since the beginning but I promise with my whole heart that I’ll be here til the end. 
I truly wish nothing but the best in life for each and every one of you guys. 
~I wish you all good health & happiness, always. <3

text: Annyeong, boys. Time flies, right? I remember the first time I saw you performing during Adore U era, well what can I say? It wasn't really love at the first sight but watching your live stages left a deep impression, because gosh who can resist a bunch of cute theater kids?! Not me because since then i began to do my own research, downloading your music to my drive then 20s got me hooked i kept playing it on repeat.. Though, i couldn't call myself a fan yet because it wasn't until Mansae that i realized no group made me feel the way you guys do, so yeah "In my eyes, it's only you, does anyone object?" [lyric from Mansae lol] and that pretty much sums up my discovery about your discography which becomes the beginning of this amazing delightful journey to better tomorrows with you. And it still amazes that All My Love for you since that moment never seems to lessen with each passing day, how is that possible? And whatever it is that you are doing to me,  for your comfort warmth and existence, I am grateful. Looking forward to more years with you, SVT 💎 Carats.

author: @lvndrlyn
text:
Terimakasih SEVENTEEN!!!

Sebelumnya aku ngga pernah sebahagia ini buat suka sama penyanyi. Selama jadi kepopers dan ngikutin beberapa grup tapi ngga pernah sebahagia ini buat suka sama penyanyi. Bahagia banget bisa jadi carat, dulu inget banget pertama kali nonton seventeen waktu itu aku nonton MV don't wanna cry, dan mulai kepoin seventeen, member pertama yang paling dikenal Vernon karena bule, vernon jd first love ku di seventeen suka bonon mungkin karna gaya bonon pas ngerap lebih santuy. mereka talent banget nyanyi, dance, rap, produksi musik, produksi merch, jadi komedian pokoknya paket komplit. mereka bikin mood naik, pas lagi ada masalah terus liat mereka nyanyi apalagi liat gose jd lupa sama masalah ku. Selama suka seventeen beberapa kali kepoin grup lain tapi tetep aja balik nya ke seventeen, sempet nyesel ga ngikutin mereka dari jaman tembok hijau, tapi gapapa aku bersyukur sekarang udah kenal seventeen. Berasa dapet keluarga baru sama seventeen carat. Pokoknya ga bakal nyesel deh stan seventeen.

Thankyou SEVENTEEN, love you all stay safe♡

SEVENTEEN & CARAT FIGHTING!!!!

author: @sunoowball7320
text:
✨Dear SEVENTEEN, 
     안녕하세요 !!! I want to tell you all for how much I've been better ever since you guys came into the journey of my life. I've been a carat for almost 4 years now !!! I first knew you guys when i first started in highschool, which i was still 14 that time. I was mostly okay with my other likings, and i was always into dancing new choreographies ever since i was a child. When you all came into my life, it's like when a single sandwich got its  final ingredient. Basically when i started stanning this group, i felt really open, happy and comfortable, especially the group and fandom itself. I felt safe and happy to the fact i got to know all the members and became a part of the family. You've all did well, and made all of us happy and proud. I really wanna thank you guys for being a glow stone in my life.

author: @nicoler7746
text:
Realmente no encuentro las mejores palabras para agradecerles por todo lo que han hecho, por todas las maravillas, por ser grandes personas, por todo.

No estuve los 6 años con ustedes pero estos 5años siendo CARAT lo he pasado maravilloso, más feliz y tambien puedo decir que tuve la suerte de conocer 13 grandiosas personas.

Estos meses he estado al punto de morir por una enfermedad, para ser sincera ya me sentía muy cansada para seguir aquí por todo lo que he y estoy pasando pero en unos de los momentos que me sentía tan desgastada, me puse a escuchar una y otra vez Don't Wanna Cry y Smile Flower lo que me dio mas fuerza para seguir luchando.

Ustedes me dan fuerza, felicidad, energía y yo simplemente se decir gracias, aunque ustedes se merecen más que un simple gracias, ustedes se merecen la felicidad, la tranquilidad y una buena salud por toda la vida.

Gracias por dejarme entrar y conocer a esta maravillosa familia "CARAT", GRACIAS POR TODO <3

FELICIDADES POR SU 6TH ANIVERSARIO!!!

text: Dear SEVENTEEN,  I don't know if you'll be reading this or not, but I still want to say thank you so much, thank you so much for being one of the reasons I stayed. 2019 was a really tough year for me and I almost gave up then, but you came to give me the strength to endure, yes you give the strength to me, strength I never had before. author: @hikmahm2221
text: Makasih diriku karena telah menemukan 13 bocil. Hee.... dulu nggak pernah kepikiran bakal nambah suka sama grup baru. Karena udah jenuh banget, nggak ada yg bisa dinikmati pas lama suka yg berbau kipop. Rasanya hambar aja sepi, yang diputer ya lagu-lagu lama. Belum lagi pas hektik-hektiknya kuliah. Udah yakin nggak bakal ada yg bikin diri ini suka sama grup baru lagi. Eh taunya, bisa-bisanya sekali liat 13 bocils udah hapal nama dalam satu hari. Bisa-bisanya masih bisa keterusan sampai sekarang. Nggak kerasa ikutan 6 tahun juga sekarang 😂 makasih ya bocils. Asam garam manis gula udah dilewatin, rasanya kaya ngebesarin anak. Sekarang, masa depan yg nggak akan pernah diketahui, raihlah. Sekarang, melihat dari belakang kalian pun, aku senang dan tenang. Langkah apapun di masa sana, lalui dengan baik dan bahagia. So do i. Thank you for everything and the healing. Thank you for being okay. Love you 🌼

author: @AjengIzari
text:
Hello seventeen,
Aku fans dari tembok hijau. 6 tahun Anniversary untuk seventeen, tapi untuk aku 8 tahun sudah terlewat. 
Bangga banget kalau inget bagaimana perjuangan kalian untuk debut. 
Tapi ga bakal bohong ada perasaan khawatir menyelimuti saat kalian debut. Aku takut kalian ga dikenal publik dan aku pengen publik tau kalau kalian itu jauh lebih hebat dari yang mereka pikirkan.
Sampai akhirnya kalian jadi grup Kpop pertama dimana aku rela nabung berbulan-bulan untuk beli album. Album 17carat yg masih terpajang di lemari, dan sekarang nunggu album keluaran kalian yg terbaru. 
Walaupun sempet rest karna kesibukan kuliah, pada akhirnya aku balik lagi ke fandom ini. 

Terima kasih untuk tetap menjadi seventeen. Terima kasih sudah menemani masa-masa muda ku dan sekali lagi terima kasih karna lagu kalian selalu menolong ku disaat yg susah.

author: @kyungsoossimp8350
text: I’m a very very new Carat but I can say this for sure, the feeling I have received watching and learning about these 13 boys feels exactly how I felt when I fell in love with my bias group for the first time almost 9 years ago. It really has been a while since a group has made me feel like a giddy teenager again and I love it. I love it as much as I’m growing to love all these 13 boys. They have made me laugh soo much for these past weeks and I’m so grateful for that. I have always been impressed by their talent but never took the chance, until this year to finally get to know the members, so I do know how talent each member but wow they’re personality did come as surprise. They have some of the best personalities in the industry and I hope they continue to be humble and shine brightly as they have been doing for this past 6 years. Happy Anniversary Seventeen! I love you guys so much.

Dan yg bikin paling suka ngestan svt ya itu karna sinkronisasi dance yang selalu bikin tercengang bikin kagum sendiri dan geleng geleng kepala!!! author: @esme_rivas.22
text:
Dear SEVENTEEN.
You've been together for more than 6 years, I've been with you for five years and these have been the best 5 years. I think I grew up with you, I believe it was my destiny to meet you; I met you in a difficult time in my teens.
Every time I see tour older stuff, I can't help but fesl nostalgic (even if I didn't take part since the beginning). You have made my daus better since I met you.
Thank you. The only words I can say whenever I see you. Thank you for all of the beautiful moments you gave me. Thank you for all of your music. Thank you for being my comfort. Thank you for being part of my life. Thank you SEVENTEEN.
I love you so much.
Happy 6th anniversary SEVENTEEN💖💙.

author: @sarirachas
text:
Dear Seventeen, Happy 6th Anniversary. I have gone on a roller coaster of emotions this year. Finding new emotions that I didn't even know existed in me. I can not express in words how much you've helped me this year. This one song helped me so much in my lowest time in life. It comforts me and I can not thank you enough for that. All the 13 of you made me laugh, cry, and... i dont know many emotions bare with me (^-^;) but you made me feel a lot.

Your music may not be in a language I understand but the emotions in them I do. And you're song made me cry (in a good way) when I thought I'd never cry for a song. It made me feel so many emotions and made me dance :]

You all deserve so much, so much more than the world could ever give, for the impact you've made on everyone.

All of seventeen brought me a new home, a beautiful home. Thank you seventeen for motivating me to live life again <3

Hi I'm Carat from Ina
Halo apa kabar? Jeonghan Wonwoo definitely remembers "Kasih Murah"

First, Happy 6th Anniversary 🎉
Second Thankyou so Much:))
Thank you for giving me happiness and sorry i came so late:(( Thank you for all your hard work towards all the carats in the world. Because of you we have our smiles when things get tough sometimes come our way. You guys must have had a tough day too, Thank you for holding on to everyone Especially Carat🥺 But you can also stop for a moment to rest, take a breath, and continue your steps again. You know, I never regret spending my time with you. I'm so thankful God brought you to me.

I just wanted to say that I really really love you guys. Seventeen has its own space in my heart💙 ONE MORE TIME 사랑해 ಥ‿ಥ I hope that you are also as happy as we are when we think of you❤️ 끝까지 함께!

Happy 6th anniversary my boys, Seventeen!!

Aku belum pernah sebahagia ini menjadi seorang fans. Kalian banyak merubah hidupku, memberi banyak inspirasi, kebahagiaan, juga cinta. Terimakasih, terimakasih, dan terimakasih..ingin ku sampaikan langsung pada kalian seberapa besar rasa terimakasih ku juga rasa cinta dan sayang ku pada kalian. Maaf jika kami belum bisa memberikan yang terbaik pada kalian. 

We'll always be together, hand in hand. Help each other when one of us is down, also complements each other. 

Hopefully we can pass all the obstacles in the future both happily and badly, together. Seventeen is there for Carats, Carats also there for Seventeen.

I love you with all my heart 💖💙

author: @lemonfestive
text:
to my dearest seventeen,
jujur aku baru pertama kali komen di video kalian pake b.indo (biasanya pake bhs inggris). Aku, yang hanya setitik dari ribuan carat di dunia. kalian mungkin gak kenal atau jg gak tau aku idup hahah. Tapi, aku selalu dukung kalian. gak terasa udah hampir 4 tahun aku jadi carat dan waktu yang udah aku lewatin selama di fandom ini penuh dengan warna. Lagu2 kalian selalu berhasil buat aku setidaknya berpikir kalau semua akan baik-baik saja. Aku inget banget lagu pertama yang aku dengerin itu very nice dan mv pertama yang aku tonton dont wanna cry. waktu itu aku belum nge stan tapi dari awal aku udh ngerasa kalau kalian ini gak biasa dan akhirnya jd hardcore fans sampe sekarang. Aku gak pernah berpartisipasi banyak dan merasa kalau apa yg aku kasih gak akan cukup. Sama kayak lagu ini :)) Tapi y'all know what? apa yang kalian kasih utk carat selama ini udah lebih dari cukup. Carat cuma pengen kalian bahagia dan sama-sama sampe tua. So, if something doesn't come out right or the world goes against you just remember that we will always be there for you all. Thank you seventeen Kita sama-sama, ya <3

happy 6th anniversary, seventeen
may you always shine :)

author: @diannur2104
text:
Selamat ulang tahun, terima kasih sudah datang dalam hidupku. Selamat ulang tahun, terima kasih sudah bertahan sampai sejauh ini. Selamat ulang tahun, terima kasih sudah menjadi salah satu alasan bagiku untuk tetap bertahan sejauh ini. Selamat ulang tahun, terima kasih sudah membuatku lupa akan luka dan kesedihan. Selamat ulang tahun, terima kasih sudah membantuku melewati masa-masa ketika aku jatuh. Selamat ulang tahun, terima kasih sudah menjadi 'rumah' ternyaman kedua untukku. 

Selamat ulang tahun, bintang yang menyinari malam dan siangku. 

Happy Anniversary, Seventeen. Thank you for being born. Thank you for being my youth, my querencia, my reason to smile, my medicine. Thank you for being 'seventeen'. Thank you for everything. 

Let's stay together until and after the last say the name. I love you.
