author: @sevesthetic
text:
Hai sebong, seventeen.

Jujur dari dulu saya ga pernah tertarik sama k-pop, saya prefer anime dan jejepangan. Tapi begitu masuk sma, semua temenku itu k-popers jadi seiring waktu saya kebawa. Saya bner bner gatau apa apa ttg k-pop jd semua yg saya lihat dr temen saya stan. Iya, saya sempet jadi multifandom tapi belum jadi carat. Jujur, saya gabisa hafal anggotanya waktu itu, karena nama korea susah susah. Saya baru jadi carat waktu mv DWC rilis, iya 2017 dan saya nyesel. Padahal sama temen udh dikenalin dr 2015 tapi gak saya gubris, saya nyesel bgt. Soalnya dalam 2tahun itu banyak hal yg saya lewatin dari kalian. Saya jadi multifandom sampe lulus sma dan karena makin kesini sibuk sama kerjaan, pelan pelan saya jd ninggalin k-pop dan kembali ke anime (karena udh lepas dr temen sma juga jd gaada temen hype k-pop lagi). Semua fandom berhasil saya lepas tapi ternyata buat seventeen ga berhasil. Hiburan saya sekarang cuma bner" dari kalian sama anime. Kalian, orang" yang saya sayang lebih dari diri sendiri. Kalo bisa saya mau berterimakasih sama temen SMA saya yg sudah ngenalin svt ke saya. 

Dari dulu, sekarang ataupun nanti saya ga mau lepas kalian. Seventeen ttep satu satunya yg saya stan dari k-pop. Walaupun bukan boygrup yg saya stan pertama kali, tapi saya bisa pastiin kalo kalian jadi yang terakhir.

Untill the last saythename, i'll be there stand for you all. Beside you and always with you. Even if the world against you, i'll be carat forever.

Terimakasih banyak karena sudah hadir dihidup saya. Sampai saya tua nanti, saya pengen ceritain kalian ke anak cucu. Biar mereka tau seberarti apa seventeen dihidup saya. Sekali lagi, terimakasih❤💎💎

author: @defitaj.a2881
text:
Halo Seventeen, aku Catat dari Indonesia.

Seventeen, Pertama kali suka kalian itu di era Mansae. Aku yang posisi masih bocah waktu itu, langsung suka sama kalian. Ya, walau ngga terlalu ngikutin kalian karena blm punya hp sendiri waktu itu wkwkwk, cuma bisa ngandelin streaming MV pake hp ibu sambil ngumpet2. 

Aku mau minta maaf dan terimakasih sama kalin. Maaf karena aku sempat ninggalin kalian sebentar dan sibuk sama rl aku sampe ngedenger lagu kalian pun ngga. Tapi saat aku lagi terpuruk, jatuh banget, mental aku lagi sakit, kyknya lagu kalian itu kayak obat tersendiri buat aku. 

Kalian yang bener2 jadi penghibur buat aku. Saat aku bener2 tertekan karena harus menjalankan tugas sebagai pemimpin organisasi di sekolah, aku kyk liat Seungcheol mimpin Seventeen. Seungcheol sama Seventeen bnr2 kyk penyelamat aku disaat aku udah mau nyerah sama 'jabatan' dan label pemimpin di nama aku.

Dan sekarang, kondisi aku sudah sangat baik. Salahsatunya berkat kalian yang selalu bikin aku ketawa sama tingkah kalian.

Seventeen, makasih buat semuanya. Ayo kita bersama selamanya. Sehat selalu. Kami bakal selalu ada buat kalian. 

-ddef

author: @daisyhcg
text:
•HAPPY 6TH ANNIVERSARY• 🎂💙

Today is one of the happiest days of my life because it was when SEVENTEEN started, I am not with you from the beginning but I am happy to know that I am part of this family now. That you can have many, many years together. I would like to thank each one of you for all the work you have done so far, each one of you contributed to making SEVENTEEN what it is today. You are humble, talented, cute, caring, funny, beautiful, precious, playful boys and I just have to thank God for making me know you. Thank you for every laugh and smile you have ever taken from me. You are very special and important to me, that God continues to bless your path and that more and more you are more successful 🎉✨💙

• I LOVE YOU SO MUCH <3
• BRAZILIAN CARAT <3

author: @llcvjngwon4432
text:
Dear Seventeen,

Happy 6th anniversary! I am very proud of you all and I love you all so much! I can’t be anymore happy than being part of your fandom, you guys sincerely made me very happy and feel loved. All you’re Gose episodes are lots of fun and I always enjoy watching them. We would love to remind you all that we love you very much and will support you till the very end!

I remember when I first stanned you guys, it was when Hoshi, Minghao, Dino, and Jun visited I-land. I really found you four fun and have such a nice personality. I started to know more about the group and started listening to all your songs. I love them all! I can really tell that you’re songs really has sentimental values and that there’s always a message in it that we all carats can understand and learn from it. You all made me happy and joyful, I seriously love all your laughs it is so cute and when you guys laugh you all make me laugh as well.

I will always be your supporter and I wish you all will succeed more in the future with all the hard work you all do. You are all very talented, so don’t let hate affect you because no matter how much haters there are, us carats are more and will always be by your side giving you positivity, strength, love, and encouragement.<3

다시 6 주년을 축하합니다 !!!

author: @Izipizilemonsquizi
text:
Aku juga mau cerita...
Dulu aku cuma suka kepoin boygroup doang ga sampe ngestan beli album printilan dll...
Trus temen aku ngenalin aku ke seventeen waktu itu dia liatin ke aku dwc sama home emang keren bgt tapi aku ga sampe ngestan langsung karna aku gabisa kalo dipaksa atau disuruhin org gitu, mau nya jalur mandiri, atas kemauan sendiri
Akhirnya setelah nonton knowing bross especially pas soonyoung ngegass pas ditanyain kenapa seventeen anggota nya 13 ga 17, boom waktu itu aku langsung “damn I’m gonna stan this group!!!” Emang aneh sih alasannya tapi yah setelah itu aku langsung terjun bebas jadi carat
Waah asli nyaman bgt, apalagi temen2 carat semuanya pada adem ayem, sabar2 bgt dan ga mudah tersulut, walopun fandom kita ga gede bgt tapi kita itu kompak bgt, apalagi sebongie juga rajin mengedukasi kita buat kalem dan santai aja jangan dengerin kata org luar, aah seneng bgt kaya kita itu cuma mikirin satu sama lain aja lo, mo terjadi badai diluar mo ada kehebohan apa diluar, ya bodo amat...
Btw happy anniv ayangie ayangie kuuu

author: @s.coupsislife3821
text:
I love you guys 💕
I found Seventeen after I lose someone I cherish the most on my whole life . Every single of them means a lot for me . They are the reason why I still alive after attempting suicide several times . They are the reason why I keep going . They are the main contributor of my achievements now . I know they see us the Carats as an ocean of  stars in dark night , untouchable but they know very well that we exist .
I'll stay untill the last 'Say The Name' . 
My dear Seventeen members , 
Thank you for debuting .
Thank you for comforting music .
Thank you for consoling us through your song .
Thank you for pretty words that you gather for the lyrics . 
Thank you for every little thing you do to make us happy .
Thank you for existing .
Thank you Seventeen .

author: @rxsequarts16
text:
Dear Seventeen. (Walaupun kalian gak akan baca ini ㅋㅋㅋ)
Aku kenal kalian dari temen aku, k-popers garis keras juga. Dia kenalin kalian ke aku dan teman-teman aku yang lain di tahun 2017. MV pertama yg aku nntn "Pretty U" mulai dari MV itu aku langsung nge-stan kalian,  bias aku Mingyu. Sampai sekarang. Aku belajar hafal nama-nama kalian, susah. Susah banget. Karena kalian 13 orang, ganteng, bertalenta, lucu, moodbooster. Seiring berjalannya waktu, aku jadi sayang sama kalian semua. Semuanya.

Terima kasih yah, sudah menjadi boygroup yang hebat. Dengan musik kalian yang luar biasa. Yang selalu menjadi diri kalian sendiri. Dengan warna kalian masing-masing. 
Aku bangga jadi salah satu CARAT.

Happy 6th Anniversary SEVENTEEN!
I LOVE YOU ❤🇮🇩

author: @rachelhernandez7158
text: I just wanted to say thank you. Thank you for every sacrifice, every sweat, every hard work you guys put into everything just for us Carat to be satisfied, for us to feel happy. Thank you for all this 6th years of putting amazing songs and performances into the world. Thank you for sharing your talent to other people. I hope that you guys are happy with every decision, with your carrier. Please have fun all you can! Don’t listen to others opinion because everything your are doing, writing and releasing describes you and only you. Your story, your lyrics became our comfort zone. We can relate to each other and not feel alone. I say this because yes, you guys are my comfort. Your music gave me comfort in the worst of days. That’s why as a carat I will always support your careers. I will always be waiting the day we can all reunite and have fun together. My love for you guys is bigger than this world. I will look forward for the many years that we will walk this path together. 🤍

author: @exokyungsoowifeu3879
text:
TO THE GROUP THAT IS CELEBRATING THEIR 6TH ANNIVERSARY
It hasn't been long since I started staning seventeen but for them 6 years must be a long time and it wasn’t an easy road either,through training days, debut, solo debut, hiatuses, injuries & many other things, 13 of them stuck together through thick and thin and I, as a fan, can’t be more thankful for that.
Thank you for showing me what love is, ,I'll always  cheer and support you guys,I wish that even in the future,we'll continue to be together.
HAPPY ANNIVERSARY SEVENTEEN,LET'S WALK ON TOGETHER FROM NOW ON, I LOVE YOU GUYS.

author: @blessdelrosario9147
text:
To our home, Seventeen 

Happy 6th Anniversary!!! Thank you for being there when no else was, thank you for the comfort you've always given to us. If I would be given the chance to know you and stan you once again I'll always do it know why? Because stanning you was one of the best decisions I've ever made and meeting you was a blessing. I'd never get tired to thank the universe for letting me know you. The moment I started stanning you I knew that I stanned the right group, I knew that I won't regret this and I was right. I hope someday we would see each other and no matter what happens let's continue loving each other, let's continue being there for each other. SEVENTEEN you are our home, our safe place, our happiness and strength so thank you for existing, thank you for being here. We love you and we always will.


EVEN AFTER THE LAST SAY THE NAME ✨✊🏻

author: @MinSuga-hi1he
text:
Thank you seventeen for everything youve done for us carats. I haven’t known this group for long but I immediately got pulled in when I watched one of your going episodes. You’ve become one of my people who lift me up when I’m sad or angry. Your songs are beautiful and have so much meaning and it’s just such a pleasure to hear them. Thank you for all the time you guys spend to make us happy. I’m proud of y’all and I can’t wait to be here till them end because I promise you I’ll be here until the end and even after the end I’ll never stop being a carat until the day I die. You’ve made such an impact in my life and taught me many things through music. And you each individual taught me different things. 

Scoups - taught me how to be a strong leader 
Jeonghan - how to break gender standards where I live
Joshua - taught me how to be kind 
Jun - how to have fun and be silly in the moment
Hoshi - to be passionate about what I love 
Wonwoo- to find people/friends who help you get out your shell and speak up 
Woozi- taught me how to put emotions in things like lyric writing 
Dk- taught me how to smile and have fun 
Mingyu - 
Minghao - taught me better fashion and to be passionate about whatever your doing small or big or something you love 
Seungkwan - taught me how to make people laugh and also how to be sassy but most importantly he taught me to love my family more 
Vernon - taught me it’s okay to be chill and relaxed and it’s okay to be that way 
Dino- taught me to never give up and try your best to go down in history and make a name for yourself 

All of these things have made a huge impact on my life and how I am. That’s it’s okay to be the way I am and to find people who love me and help me become a better person. Everyday it might not be easy but knowing I can go home and listen to seventeen or watch their videos it makes my day 100 percent better then it started. Also as a carat I want you to know that other carats and I only want the best for you and to be yourself that we love the way you are personally and individually. That don’t listen to the haters and stay strong don’t go on diet because you think you need to look better don’t change your person because you think you need to be better don’t force yourself to do something for us because who ever you are each individually we love you for that and the uniqueness you all bring to the group real carats love you for any way you look act and are. So please never change that. I love you guys so much and you mean a lot to me so please stay healthy and strong and I hope one day I can attentive down your concert in real life and met the people I look up to. Happy 6th anniversary I love you guys so much. Enjoy your anniversary ❤️❤️❤️

text: 열일곱 번째 생일 축하해! 정말 감사합니다. 네, 여러분은 지금까지 저를 격려해 주셨습니다. 당신의 노래, 당신의 모든 작품이 나를 위해 정말 치유됩니다. 다른 사람들은 당신이 나에게 얼마나 의미가 있는지 이해하지 못할 것입니다. 내 세상은 너뿐 아니라 동영상을 보거나 너의 노래를 듣는 것만으로도이 세상이 지겹다면 다시 흥분 될 수있다. 앞으로도 우리는 마지막 이름을 말할 때까지 계속 함께 할 수 있기를 바랍니다. 지금까지 여러분의 작업에 계속 감사 할 수있게되어 매우 기쁩니다. 태어나 줘서 고마워. 당신의 노력에 감사드립니다. 모든 것에 감사드립니다 💎💖.

text:
Thank you SEVENTEEN, I started to be Carat when I got up from my slump, to be honest I used to be overthinking a lot in all the problems in my life so that not only was my mental illness but also my physique for a week I couldn't go to college because of illness but when I heard the song don ' t wanna cry somehow I even cried for a long time, but after that I felt a little relieved and finally I got interested in seventeen so since then I've seen all of your videos, both interviews, behind the scenes, variety shows that you follow. author: @bubblyu7928
text:
Dear Seventeen, 
Terimakasih selama ini kalian udh buat hari-hari ku selalu semangatt. Cerita sedikit, jadi awal aku tau sebong di tahun 2015 waktu mereka awal debut. Tapi, di tahun itu aku belum tertarik sama sekali sama dunia kpop. Tibalah suatu hari, aku liat mv sebong 'oh my!' aku jadi penasaran dan mulai ngestalk sebong. Mv 'boom boom' buat aku jatuh cinta bgt sama sebong dan mulai dari situ aku mulai ngikutin perkembangan sebong. Mungkin aku bisa dibilang bukan carat dari tembok ijo, tapi aku akan jadi carat sampai 'the last say the name' dan bakal dukung sebong terus karena emg udh sesayang itu sama mereka. Berapa kalipun aku oleng ke grup lain, tapi ga pernah tahan lama kaya sebong. Emg ya pelet sebong kuat bgt:') Terimakasih juga carat yang selalu apresiasi semua karya" sebong dan selalu support sesama fandom. Sehat-sehat terus yaa sebong dan carat! 
Love, 
Me who sincerely adore and love u💎

author: @yustinaardena6477
text: Sebenernya SVT bukan grup kpop pertama yang aku kenal, tau, dan stan, tapi SVT grup kpop pertama yg bikin aku ngerasain seneng, sedih, asik, seru, heboh tiap nonton konten mereka(😂). Bener bener baru banget jadi Carat jalur PSBB grgr corona. Di rumah doang jd diracunin SVT sm temen. MV pertama yang ditonton DWC dan bener bener bikin fall in love (asik). Bener bener lgsg naksir, dari situ ngepoin varshownya mereka sampe semua lagu dan tingkah mereka. Bener bener jadi nggak bisa keluar dari fandom ini, carat asik banget, adem, damai, seru, baik baik semua. Dan karena ngestan SVT, online class dan PSBB di rumah aja jadi jauh lebih asik dan seru. Semenjak ngestan SVT juga jadi punya banyak temen carat baru yang baik baik dan asik semuaa. Walo skrg tergolong baby carat, tp nanti (bbrp tahun kedepan) aku bakal tetep jadi carat yg bertransformasi jadi old carat buat para baby carat nantinya. Maksud aku, walau aku telat banget tau, kenal, dan suka sama mereka tapi aku bakal terus sama mereka di masa depan bareng semua carat yang sama kayak aku dengan tujuan yang tulus buat SVT. Happy 6th Anniversary SEVENTEEN dan terima kasih untuk semua carat yang udah bareng bareng sama SVT dari jaman tembok ijo ataupun buat yg baby carat (kyk aku) sampe sekarang, ayo bareng bareng lagi di tahun tahun kedepan❤❤❤

SEVENTEEN. Kalian terlalu baik terlalu sempurna terlalu bikin nyaman carat terlalu sayang sama kita semua:') ini lagu favorite aku jujur, begitu lagu ini rilis langsung kepincut lengoleng aku:( rasanya kek dinyanyiin sama mereka sbg pacar, aku denger lagu ini kalo mikirku aku sbg carat malah sedih, kek ngrasanya aku ngasih segini doang tapi mereka ngasi semuanya buat aku huhuhu:( sebong jan mikir terlalu keras ya, sumpah si justru kita sbg carat yang pengennya kasih yang terbaik buat kalian sebagai balasannya, pengen berterimakasih banget banget sama kalian:((
Mungkin mereka ngerasa balasannya terlalu besar dan berlebih, tapi itu semua tu karena carat jumlahnya lebih banyak daripada kalian huhu, kalian jadi sampai saat ini juga sebelumnya udah kerja keras, kalo liat diriku yang masih muda kadang males aja suka malu sama kalian huhu:( 
Sebong, kalian sudah bekerja keras. guys you're amazing, you're so pretty with everything that is and happening in the world. Thanks for being SEVENTEEN for me and others. Happy 6th Anniversary my love💖💙💎

author: @lux_xing
text:
I always admired the relationship that certain groups have with their fans, it seemed a wonderful and encouraging union; I always wanted to know how that felts, until I met SEVENTEEN and they gave it all to me. 

You are my pride ❤️ Thanks for your hard work and effort, you have become world-class artists and this is the result of your nights without rest. 

You're really a gift to the world, I'm really glad to have idols like SEVENTEEN, You're not only my pride but they're also an example and an inspiration to me; SEVENTEEN has shown me a lot of things, you've inspired me and showed me a little light on the way, you will never see this, but thank you for being by my side all this time, you've filled the unbearable silence in my head with wonderful lyrics and warm sounds that were kept in my heart.

I love you with every inch of my heart.

Ps: is this heaven? This is what angels looks like?

author: @ohvivi3083
text:
To: Seventeen and Carat Deull
INI CERITA DARI SUDUT PANDANG GUA YAH GUYS.. DAN JUGA INI GUA SUSAH CARA NGASIH TAU KEKALIAN NYA GIMANA... MOGA KALIAN NGGAK KAYAK GUA YAH

kenalin aku Alfie... aku mau bagi cerita sama kayak carat lainnya.... aku kenal Sebong itu udah lama dan udah sering juga denger lagu lagu Seventeen dan first mv yang aku tonton itu  ''Thanks'' dan variety show yang aku tonton itu Weekly Idol yang era Thanks, yang jaman Ujik kita jadi peri lemon wkwkkwk.... dan di era itu aku mulai tertarik dengan Seventeen dan aku inget banget disitu aku suka sama 3 orang Ujik, Babeh dan Mingyu.... tapi buat Mingyu aku suka nya ikut ikut doang (karena Kakak aku suka Mingyu).... tapi serius disaat itu aku kagum banget sama Seventeen karena sukses Dance (lupa nama nya) pokok nya Dance yang cepet lambat itu sama Random Dance, sumpah keren banget, aku sampek mikir '' kok bisa mereka dance kompak padahal member nya banyak banget'', tapi waktu aku memang udah tertarik tapi belum memutuskan menjadi Carat... dan singkat cerita waktu aku kelas 10 semester awal (mian kalo salah ) dan diwaktu itu juga Pledis itu di akuisis (?) sama Bighit, aku bingung dan cari tau kenapa tiba tiba Bighit gitu, dan setelah aku tau Pledis itu ent nya Seventeen... disitu aku seneng dong kaget dan keinget waktu dulu aku sempet tertarik sama Seventeen, jadi aku gak sengaja liat MV MV seventeen lainnya, dan dalam beberapa hari aku mau jadi Carat jadi Di IG aku banyak banget Follow Akun  Fansbase Seventeen dan carat... dan gak sengaja aku dapet Link GC disalah satu akun Fanbase nya Seventeen (lupa nama akun fansbase nya) trs aku Join, awal awal aku belum begitu akrab sama mereka semua, karena waktu itu aku lagi asik banget sama RP jadi aku lebih suka main RP..... sampai dimana pas rp aku sepi, aku mulai cari kesibukan dan nggak sengaja aku kepencet sama Notifikasi GC itu yang udah 12K an, iya serius! 12 ribu pesan sari GC itu, asal kalian tau itu adalah Gc paling rame sejagat raya, kalian tau 5 menit kita ninggalin Hp, tanpa kalian sadari kalian udah nabung 1K pesan.... dan saat aku udah mulai bosen dengan Rp dan bener bener berhenti main RP, aku baru sadar kalau anak anak Di Gc itu satu Frekuensi dengan aku, yang bacot dan suka rada rada gitu.... kalian pernah gak ngebayangin di suatu Gc fandom kalian itu, kalian bisa ngomong random, pap foto random, main game mapiah, VN tiap malam dalam satu waktu??? bisa dibayangin betapa ramenya Gc itu kan??... aku masih inget banget kenangan indah sama sahabat sahabat online ku itu, Kadal, Kanu, Aca, Ipi, nida, ndil, ayu, acer,michel Dlll kita itu paling berisik di Gc, sampai suatu malam Kadal buat Gc dengan anak anak yang dia anggap udah kenal banget (termasuk gua) disitu perlahan Gc utama rada sepi karena orang orang bacot udah Pw di Gc giba itu... awal nya kadal buat karena buat kick orang aja, tapi anak anak yg dia kick itu bikin Gc juga buat kick dia, jadi inti nya kita buat Gc baru dan Kick satu sama lain, sampai dimana Gc itu tiba tiba jadi Gc giba... dan kalian tau nggak sangking akrabnya, mereka tau sesuatu rahasia hidup gua yang bahkan sahabat RL gua itu gak ada yang tau... Jadi waktu itu pas Era Heng: grae itu datang disitu Juga Era dimana gua bener bener harus berusaha buat nggak Stres dan depresi karena KDRT... jadi gua itu besar dan tinggal di dusun plosok di Sumsel dan gua ada kesempatan buat Tinggal sama Kakak pertama gua di Serang Banten.. yahhh kalian tau bulan awal itu pasti semua orang belum menunjukan sifat asli mereka dan sampai dimana gua udah di tahun pertama gua tinggal sama mereka, so udah wajar kan seseorang nunjukin sifat asli mereka kalau udah 1 tahun tinggal satu rumah... DISINI GUA BAKALAN CERITA DI SUDUT PANDANG GUA JADI GUA GAK TAU KALAU DARI SUDUT PANDANG DIA ITU BAGAIMANA. YANG PASTI BAKALAN BEDA...... jadi ditahun pertama itu yahhh menurut gua sih masih wajar, seorang Kakak Ipar memaki adik ipar nya didepan ibu mertua nya sekaligus ibu kandung dari adik ipar dan istri nya, kalian tau nggak apa yg dia maki didepan ibu gua? apa? ''kurang ajar?'' ahhh itu mah biasa, tapi kalau '' SETAN, JIN DAJJAL, BABI, ANJING'' gimana? udah biasa tau luar biasa untuk seorang menantu laki laki yang berumur lebih 30 tahun memaki adik ipar nya didepan ibu mertua nya?.... kata makian itu memang tertuju khusus untuk gua yang sedang main sama anak anak nya, bahkan waktu itu juga dia pernah ngajarin anak nya buat ngatain gua ''PEMALAS''.... kalian pasti nanya kenapa dia bisa gitu? pasti ada sebapnya? iya dong masa nggak.. jadi singkat ceita yah.. kakak gua itu ternyata hamil diluar rahim, jadi kek janin nya itu nggak dirahim gitu, jadi dia harus dirawat dirumah sakit, so singkat cerita lagi, waktu itu gua pulang dari sekolah dan dirumah itu ada adik? temen? eh gak tau pokok nya kek temen tapi udah dianggap adik sendiri ama dia karena satu daerah... kita panggil Kak S aja yah... jadi kak S itu bilang kegua yang baru balik sekolah kalo Kakak J ( nama kakak ipar yang sangat baik hati itu:).... dia bilang kalau gua disuruh kerumah sakit (BTW rumah sakit nya kagak jauh) nah jadi gua kerumah sakit tuh TANPA NYAPU DAN NGEPEL DULU ( BTW gua itu seharusnya nyapu ngepel 2 kali sehari, pagi sebelum sekolah dan sore setelah balik sekolah tapi kalau sore kakak cewek gua gak sering nyapu pel duluan, karena takut lakinya balik trs rumah blm dipel atau di sapu karena gua belum balik sekolah) yoo balik kecerita!!... dan gua mikir kan ada Kakak S dan istrinya toh, dan gua kira dia bakalan pengertian buat gantiin gua untuk nyapu pel rumah selagi gua di rumah sakit... jadi gua ke RS tuh yah gantian jagain kakak gua yang sakit dan Kakak J itu balik tuh kerumah dan cuman ada emak, gua sama kakak gua tuh, sampai emak gua bilang kalau gua disuruh jagain kakak gua malem itu... sumpah demi apa gua kaget banget, gua disuruh jagain kakak gua satu malem dan sedangkan besok ada ujian, gua bilang dong kagak mau, dan mikir ''kenapa harus gua?'' padahal suaminya ada dan suami nya itu berangkat kerja lebih telat daripada gua berangkat sekolah.... singkat cerita lagi jadi mak gua mulai pegi dan gua? gua mulai nangis karena nggak mau.. jadi gua itu  nangis yahhhh lumayan lama lah yah, tanpa gua sadari kakak gua itu lagi telponan sama laki dia yahhh dan gua kira laki dia denger gua lagi nagis... jadi gak lama gua nangis suster Rs itu dateng dan bilang kakak gua udh boleh balik (kebetulan kali bukan?) jadi gua sama kakak gua itu mulai ngeringkes barang barang sampai dimana laki dia sekligus kakak ipar paling lemah lembut itudatang sama si Kakak S jemput... nah ini  nih bagian menarik, jadi pas dimobil gua udah berasa kagak enak nih ama situasi itu, trs tiba tiba kakak Ipar the best itu nyeletuk ''' ngapo kau dak galak kawani ayuk kau?'' dia tannya tuh dan gua diem aja trs dia lanjut tuh '' kalau dak galak ngawani itu dak usah dateng ke Rs'' nah udah aneh nih kan yak... trs trs dia itu kek nyeritain kalau dia yang nyapu pel rumah karena gua blm nyapu pel rumah, dah tuh dia mulai marah ngatain gua senggaja kerumah sakit uat kagak ngepel nyapu, padahal nggak begono yang terjadi sebenarnya... disitu gua balik nangis yahhh kalian tau kan kalo orang palembang itu ngomong aja keke ngegas apalagi kalo lagi marah plus jengkel.... disitu gua nangis sampai pas mau bayar parkir dia minta uang 2 ribu buat bayar parkir sama si istrinya buttttt si istrinya itu nggak punya uang kecil dan gua mengingat saat siang tadi gua beli Mie ayam sama kakak gua goput total 48 ribu dan gua ngasih 50k dan kebalian 2 rebu (kebetulan lagi bukan?) nah jadi awalnya gua berniat baik hati dan memberinya 2 rebu itu dia minta lagi trs karena gua kira dia minta 2 rebu lagi dan dengan polos gua jawab ''' dak kate lagi, ini 10 ribu duit sokongan '' ( btw pas disekolah itu tadi siang gua ada jam olah raga jadi minggu kemaren ibu guru itu ada bilang kolo disuruh bawa bola kasti  nah berhubung karena banyak kejadian diluar dugaan, gua lupa dan terpaksa hrs minjem bolah kekelas sebelah sam temen gua yg kagak bawa juga nahhh singkat cerita karena keasikan mukul bola gua kagak sengaja bikin tuh bola pecah, pecahnya sih nggak kek pecah yg pecah parah gitu, cuman kek beda aja rasanya dan juga bola nya emang yang jelek gitu bola temen temen gua juga banyak yang pecah karena disatu toko beli nya tpi yg beda toko nggak kok aman aman aja, nah jadi gua ama temen gua itu merasa bersalah dan mau gantiin besok jadi kita patungan 5k 5k tuh dan kenapa bisa kebawa? karena gua ke RS pakek celana olah raga dan gua juga niat nya mau sekalian beli bola ehhhh ternyata kagak kebeli).... nah dia marah tuh karena gua bilang itu bukan duit gua trs selama perjalanan kerumah, dia ngatain gua perhitungan, kagak tau malu dan bahkan bilang kalau gua kagak boleh tidur dirumah eh dikamar dia bilang buat tidur di teras, singkat cerita setelah masukin barang barang gua kekamar gua tuh nennangin diri gua sambil nutupin muka gua ama bantal, disitu gua lupa ada emak gua apa nggak jadi intinya dia ngomong gini '' nah kan nah ku bilang, ngapoi kau dikamar, kan dah ku suruh dito di luar sano, di teras'' trs bla bla dan diakhiri dengan '' katek malu!'' (kaga ada malu itu katanya).. nangis dong gua dan dipagi hari seperti biasa gua bangun jam 4 menghindari bertemu dengan dia pas beres beres trs pas gua dikamar buat ganti baju sekolah, disitu posisi nya dia udah bangun tuh yah... gua tuh udah tau kalau situasi begini tuh biasanya dia bakalan

author: @AR-vh9pe
text:
Dear SEVENTEEN,
         Thank you for everything. You may not know I exist, still, thank you. You helped me a lot. From focusing on my study, encouraging me to do more and to go far, and you all helped me when I am stressed and battling with my anxiety. You helped me by your music and its message. 
         I've been a Carat since August 25/26 last year, but I felt like I was in this diamond world for so long. I'm a bit down this month since there are so many bad things happening to me. But, I guess, I were just too lucky that I have your songs downloaded in my gadget, and can atleast understand some of it. 
         So, thank you, really, for everything. I hope I could see you all up close and have a proper conversation where we can understand each other's feelings and emotions. Help me more on the future, I'll help you too to reach the goal, together. 
          Again, thank you for everything. And, goodnight


- ^_^

author: @mirandavanrossum1907
text:
Dearest Seventeen - Happiest 6th Anniversary!!! 
I am a proud Carat and have been supporting you guys for 5 years. And I gotta say Seventeen has never ceases to amaze me and fellow Carats with the fantastic Albums, Concerts, Mv's and all the funny and heart felt Content. I am truly bless to have these 13 guys in my life and carats let's keep supporting them no matter what!!!! I cant believe these talented, hilarious, good-looking, creative, hard-working, courageous and all round beautiful guys have been apart of my life and have changed my life so much for the better. Seventeen you have helped me through it all from good times to bad times, through happiness and sorrow you and your music has supported me. Seventeen you have always been there for me and my fellow Carats. Love you Seventeen to the moon and back, i'll always be grateful for you XX

Carats lets keep loving and supporting these 13 amazing men and see them grow and become more successful. 
SAY THE NAME, SEVENTEEN!!!!

Dearest Seventeen,
Thank you for being Seventeen. You have come so far and worked so hard to be where you are right now. You deserve everything you have now and more. author: @bajjj4056
text:
Honestly i was aware of them since seventeen tv era but didnt really pay much attention to them after debut. What finally made me slip and submerge right into the diamond life was, ironically, One Fine Day haha! From there i refamiliarized with them, and although sometimes i do pay more attention to other groups (being a multi is hard work lol), i dont think i'll ever stop being a carat. No matter what, I'll always come back to SVT because they're amazing, talented, genuine people. 

I dont think my adoration for SVT will ever fade away, even 20 years down the road. 20 years from now i'll still remember these 13 dorks or listen to their music and it'll put a smile on my face and a warmth in my heart.

So i guess i just wanted to say; Thank you for being such a big part of my youth, and thank you for being a part of all my love at this moment in my life.

Dear SVT, thank you for the last 6 years, and here's to many more to come!! 케럿해 💙💖💎

*Dear Seventeen*: solo puedo decir GRACIAS POR HABER NACIDO, cada uno de ustedes, todos sin excepción. author: @heyitsrenna
text:
Dear SEVENTEEN,
I really am grateful to you guys. My life has been a bless because of you. You are one of the reasons that i dont give up in life. I feel motivated, i feel enlightened, i feel happy watching you guys. I always feel that we are connected in some way or another and that makes me feel close to you guys. It makes me wonder about how much love and care are given to our relationship with each other. I feel like we went through so much together, even though i am a baby carat. But thats how lovable, caring, and open you guys are to me and all the other carats😭🖤 Thats why i felt like i've made a longtime friend already with you guys. Thanks a lot SEVENTEEN for existing, making us laugh, working hard for literally everything you do, and being that kind loving person you all are. Continue being the SEVENTEEN that we all are proud of! We, carats, will always remember you as a part of our life.

author: @sebongcarat1323
text:
Happy anniversary SEVENTEEN
Hei, happy anniversary yang ke-6 yaa. 
Makasih udah jadi SEVENTEEN, makasih udah jadi SEVENTEEN yang selalu menemani carat dihari hari baik dan buruknya,  makasih udah buat carat bahagia selama ini, thank you, thank you very much. Tetap jadi SEVENTEEN yang sekarang ya, yang lucu, apa adanya, kompak, suka jahilin carat, memperlakukan carat dengan sangat baik, layaknya carat itu segalanya bagi kalian, tetap seperti itu ya:) dan.... Jangan pergi cepat cepat ya:( carat masih butuh kalian, carat belum siap kalo kalian pergi, jadi ayoo kita bahagia kedepannya bersama sama dengan waktu yang lama. 

Semoga SEVENTEEN sukses terus ya, dihindari dari segala masalah, semoga SEVENTEEN makin sayang sama carat, hubungan SEVENTEEN dan carat makin dipererat kayak keluarga:) semoga comeback kali ini dan kedepannya sukses besar dan bikin SEVENTEEN makin dihargai.

author: @othsgdts
text: “They’re just a kpop group” “Why do these 13 men matter to you?” What gives you the right to talk about them like that? When I was at my lowest, when I was hurting, when I was thinking of jumping from high places where were you? Even though I couldn’t talk to SEVENTEEN and they probably don’t even know I exist, they saved me. Their songs, lyrics pulled me out of the pits of darkness but you? You just went with your day, even though u say that I matter to you. I “mattered” to you yet you did nothing to help, you didn’t even ask if I was okay when you saw how bad I was hurting. But SEVENTEEN, even though they don’t know who I am they saved me, helped me. So don’t you dare say anything about them when they literally saved me from suicide. Stanning SEVENTEEN was not really stanning, it was like having someone always there actually caring about me. They’re not just another kpop group. They are my saviors, people I owe my life to,my everything.

author: @seokmine2552

last year, we wanted to have fun. this quarantine was so exhausting that we needed something to lift our moods up and svt gave us the iconic "5th shining diamond anniv"

but now, it's still tiring and we still want to have fun but this special video was something we didn't expect. it's calming, perfect for our stressed out minds and bodies.

this is why i love svt. it's like they know every carat even if they don't see us personally anymore. like they know what they want and they're willing to do it and give it to us at the perfect time.

i met svt 4 years ago and there was never a boring day in caratland. it was full of laughters, smiles, and even tears but it's all worth it. with them, everything is worth it. happy 6th anniv uri sebongs! thank you so much for being our home.

author: @wonuminaries
text:
i became a carat in july 2020, to tell you the truth, i already know them before when my friend introduced me to them but i didn't manage to know each one of them nor stan them.

when the right time came which is left & right era, i didn't hesitate to look out for the song & play it all-day long & that made me look out for the group & it's because of mingyu 💙, since then when my friend ask me who i think would be my bias, i always answer it's mingyu & luckily, he was the one who made me stan them & know them furthermore & that's why i'm very very thankful for him.

i heard a lot about them before especially their songs & now, as day goes by, i'm slowly knowing them individually & now i can prove to myself that i'm really a carat 💎 there are a lot of times when i feel like i'm not belong to the fandom but to be honest, it's not important if you don't know them individually, what's more important is you are welcomed by carats & you know you are loved by seventeen ✨

i, thank seventeen for everything, they are one of my sources of inspiration, they make me smile whenever i'm having a hard time, & same goes as twice (my other ultimate group), it's impossible not to be carat, just by their music, you'll feel relaxed & they will help you overcome how hard you're experiencing.

thank you SEVENTEEN! it's been 6 years, i'm proud of all of you! 💝

author: @aparajeetasinha1859
text:
I don't know this song... Never heard it before as I'm a new CARAT... Still discovering many things... But this version along with their singing made me feel so emotional... I became a little teary!!😭😭😭 And today being their debut anniversary I felt even more emotional😪😪
But apart from that, I am thankful despite having so many members you guys never lost sight of your passion, vision, and most of all you all stayed together... Seuncheol had said this in TTT 2019, how you guys are together because no one understands you guys best than you yourself.. And that's how how you were able to come sp far!!! Congratulations and thank you also for being my new strength during this phase of my life!! stay safe and happy!! And also this version with that scenery and music!!!!!!!!!!!😚😚😚😚💜💜💙💙❤❤❤❣❣💖💖💖💖💟

author: @saleju8374
text: I've been carat for 5 years and i still don't believing that Seventeen debuted 6 years ago. The members are the same funny and adorable guys that make a bunch of people feel good and happy. Even if they are busy with hard schedules, they think and never forget us. Seventeen showed me that i can be who i want and always will have a person who likes me. Their music, laugh, words, existence are the reason why i growed up well. Together, we made memories that i will never forget and i really want to be here, making new memories, bad ones or good ones. I wanna say that i love you guys and thank you for the years that we passed and for the ones who are coming, because i will be here until and after the last  "say the name".  우리 세봉아, 고맙고 사랑해요!

author: @karennicolas7414
text:
Congratulations on your 6th Years Anniversary!

As of now, I can't believe, I mean that is as your loving CARAT, I don't know how to explain what I feel right now in knowing that you've been making music and preparing great choreography for almost (6) six years debuted the KPop Music Industry. I cannot imagine how many times you've been experiencing sleepless nights striving to create and prepare songs and performances a better one, a great one rather. From the moment I've heard your music, it was like a dimensional hole appeared, swept me up and slip me into the diamond life and never to return. I felt that everything inside me shift, in order for me to become part of your fandom. Also from that moment, I knew that you are the ones who gave a lot of happiness and inspirations to me. You were a sweet surprise I've never expected and the one I'll forever be grateful to know and to meet. Again HAPPY SEVENTEEN DAY!

author: @seventeenscharisma1589
text:
Mungkin ini bukan hanya sekedar pesan untuk anniversary kalian yang ke 6th, tapi pesan dari seorang Carat untuk Seventeen yang akan dia sayangi hingga kapanpun. Aku tidak bisa merangkai kata untuk mengungkapkan perasaanku kepada Sebong dengan singkat, karna rasa ini terlalu penuh akan kebahagiaan dan rasa syukur yang telah kalian berikan. Aku sangat mencintai kalian. Walau pesan ini akan sulit tersampaikan, namun diriku tak pernah lelah untuk mengungkapkannya.
Seventeen, terimakasih sudah hadir di hidupku, terimakasih telah memberiku banyak sekali kebahagiaan, terimakasih telah mengajariku banyak hal tentang menghargai orang lain, aku banyak belajar hal-hal yang tidak pernah aku dapatkan sebelum aku mencintai kalian. Jika orang bertanya padaku mengapa aku sangat mencintai kalian, aku akan menjawab, "Karna Seventeen benar-benar telah mengajariku tentang apa yang disebut dengan 'Cinta, Kebaikan, dan Ketulusan' ". Aku mencintai kalian.
Jangan pernah khawatir tentang hubungan kita, aku percaya kita pasti akan saling mencintai selamanya, kita akan tetap berada di keluarga Seventeen Carats selamanya, meskipun kita masih belum tahu jalan kita di masa depan.  Namun, percayalah, Kami akan melindungi kalian dari semua kesedihan dan jalan yang melelahkan ini karena kami Mencintaimu.
Aku berharap suatu hari nanti dapat bertemu kalian, aku ingin mengatakan secara langsung pada kalian bahwa aku mencintai kalian. Aku selalu berdoa yang terbaik untuk kalian. Aku sangat Mencintai Kalian!♡

author: @FAngelica
text:
I really wanna thank Seventeen for making such a great change in my life. Because of your friendship towards each other, I'm able to make a really good friendship with my besties. Because of your music, I feel the beauty of the world (friendship, loneliness, love, power, self-confidence, family, inner beauty, encouragement). Because of your encouragement, I'm able to express my emotions. I can say what I wanna say. I can tell people what I really feel. I can be happy by myself. I can encourage myself for doing a step forward for things I'm scared of. I'm afraid to be grateful for small things. Thanks for making my days better every single day. Thanks for encouraging me even though (maybe) you never realize this. Thanks for making me a carat and join with this beautiful fandom I ever know.
고마워요 세븐틴 오빠들 & 우리 개럿들 ♡♡♡
I'm falling deeper with you guys. Thanks for being my best friends (I hope it's not only me who feel this :"))

text:
Happy 6th Anniversary Seventeen!!

Aku sangat senang dpt mengenal bb yang hebat sprti kalian. Musik2 kalian selalu menjadi penyemangat dan inspirasiku. Padahal, aku baru jadi Carat selama 8 bulan, tpi kalian (SVT & Carat) udh berasa sprti keluarga kedua ku. 

Jujur, aku udh suka k-pop selama 10 tahun, tpi baru kali ini aku bener2 suka sama group sampe2 aku memutuskan utk gabung ke fandom nya. 

Seventeen.. 

Terima kasih, karena telah membuat lagu yang sangat bagus. Terima kasih, karena kalian telah membuatku tertawa. Terima kasih, karena kalian aku bisa menjalani hidup yg lebih baik. Terima kasih karena kalian selalu mencintai Carat. And thank you for being born :) 

Semoga kalian selalu sehat, bahagia dan lebih sukses lg ke depannya yaa. Let's together for a long time🖤🖤🖤

Sekali lagi, terima kasih!! Seranghae~
Carat Indonesia <3

author: @kwxnhooniee
text:
It's been 6 years already.... But most of us know them as much as all those years we've spent not knowing them.. SEVENTEEN, our home, our safe place. Someone who understands you more than anyone could... Someone we feel safe with. Someone we would love and support for our entire lives. Even if they don't remain as a grp somewhere in future, they'll all be the same 13 in our heart. Forever. They may not know that a person like you exist, but they know you as carats. They love you. A lot! They convey it to us thorough songs if words may not be possible..Let's  one proud to be carats and have our boys with us... I shouldnt be getting emotional on a day like this, but ik we can't resist it. Tears may fall off, but that's the tear of all those feelings, all those love you have for them. They've come all the way after the struggles they had to go through. For us... I couldn't include what all I wanted to say, but I want to end with a Thank you note...
To SEVENTEEN,
Thank you. Thank you for always bringing all those stupid smiles on our face. Thank you for always being by our side. Thank you for being our home, our safe place. Thank you for all those hard work you've done for us... Thank you for being our cute crackeheads. Hehe. Thank you for every single thing you've done for all of us carats... Always remebr that we WERE with you, IS with you and will ALWAYS be with you throughout, no matter what!
 We love you a lot.....
By, A carat

author: @chaniepcc8510
text:
HAPPY 6TH ANNIVERSARY SEVENTEEN
SEVENTEEN, THANK YOU FOR EVERYTHING, I WILL ALWAYS BE CARAT AND SUPPORT YOU, I PROMISE

Oke, mau ikutan juga bikin surat pendek utk SEVENTEEN..
Mungkin aku tidak mengikuti kalian dari awal dan baru-baru mengenal kalian sekitar 1,5 tahun terakhir ini tapi terima kasih untuk semuanya. Karena kalian, aku jadi kembali ke dunia kpop lagi. Karena kalian, seperti ada alasan dan harapan setiap bangun di pagi hari apalagi di masa-masa sekarang ketika bahkan sulit untuk bertemu teman di real life. Personally, banyak hal terjadi di 2020 dan SEVENTEEN adalah salah satu alasan kenapa aku masih bisa bertahan sampai sejauh ini. 
Percayalah, aku sudah mengenal kpop dari 2011 dan beberapa kali berganti fandom, tapi baru kali ini benar-benar merasa sayang banget dengan group kpop dan merasa sedekat itu dengan kalian, SEVENTEEN dan CARATS, walaupun sebenarnya kalian jauh. I believe that SEVENTEEN and CARATS will always be together, forever. Aamiin.

SEVENTEEN, once again THANK YOU for your music, your content, your personality, your smile and your everything. As Woozi said : "I want to do these forever with this people". Yes, please, do it forever and always be together as SEVENTEEN. We, CARATS, also want to do this forever with you, SEVENTEEN :)

author: @ciciokta
text:
Hai Seventeen, nggak kerasa udah 6th kalian debut dan udah 4th aku nge stan kalian. Sebelum "kenal" kalian, aku ga pernah yang namanya fall into a kpop group that much as much as I fall into you guys. Apa ya... kayak ngerasa klik aja gitu sama kalian. Meskipun kita jauh dan mungkin kalian ga pernah tau kalo ada aku yang ngedukung kalian, tapi aku ngerasanya kayak kita deket banget dan kita itu temen sekaligus keluarga.
Inget banget waktu pertama kali dengerin lagu clap di salah satu platform music secara ga sengaja pas lagi perjalanan mau bimbingan skripsi, terus ngerasa addicted sama partnya vernon, and then penasaran dan voilaaa jadilah aku yang sekarang gabisa jauh-jauh sama kalian. Terimakasih banyak karena kalian udah nemenin aku di masa-masa susah maupun senangku. 
Aku sadar, aku gabisa ngasih banyak ke kalian. Tapi satu hal yang aku bisa jamin, aku bakalan terus dukung kalian, sampai kapanpun.
Semoga kalian sehat dan bahagia, semoga kalian bisa mencapai apapun yang kalian inginkan, dan mari kita sama-sama dalam waktu yang lama. 
Aku sayang kalian.
I love you Seventeen, forever.

author: @sweetestthing6836
text:
Dear Seventeen ♥
Jujur aku baru ngikutin kalian, yang bener bener sampe akhirnya jadi Carat itu tahun 2020 kemarin. Awalnya aku nggak tertarik untuk nge stan grup manapun, but kalian lucu banget, kocak gitu, aku yang awalnya nonton gose cuma buat hiburan pas Corona ini berakhir jadi Carat. Makasih udah nemenin aku, makasih udah bikin aku ketawa, makasih banget udah ada sampe sekarang, langgeng ya. Aku nggak nyesel masuk fandom ini ya walau agak sayang sih baru ngikutin kalian kemarin, sempet mikir kenapa nggak dari dulu aja. But, dari kapanpun itu, i'll promise i'll stay in this Diamond life. Thank you Seventeen, sekali lagi makasih, aku cuma bisa ngomong itu, bcs rasa sayangku ke kalian tuh besar banget nggak bisa diungkapin dengan kata kata, mekipun aku baru, but aku sesayang itu. I love you. We love you. Happy annyversary boys! Please be happy, whenever wherever, let's meet someday!-♡
#SVT! If you read this and don't understand, just translate 😭🤣
I love you !!!

—Your love, Carat, Ayra ♡♡

author: @ScribblerinPanic
text:
i don't know with you, carats, but this video _(and song rendition)_ is definitely among the top videos of seventeen ever created and released for public consumption. *i am so in love with it!* _"all my love"_ is among my all-time favorite #SEVENTEEN tracks _(jihoon's soft attack in the beginning of the song always sets the mood)_ . and the way they performed it here, with all the natural background, damn! thank you, svt...!
and their looks, visuals, and presentations - i cannot ask for more. _seung cheol_ , _woozi_ , _seokmin_ , and _josh_ in black hair are to die for! them 4 are so gorgeous! the untamed hairstyle suits them so well, and the way their hair blows in the wind, lovely! _dino_ , damn, boy! why look so hot?! you're aging really manly and hot. _minghao_ and _seung kwan_ , you boys, look so immaculate! _vernon_ , _jun_ , _won woo_ , _mingyu_ , and _jeonghan_ , the five ever beautiful boys, always serving us a topnotch visual. and, of course, my _hoshi_ , i love you! and the last high note blending of dk, seungkwan, and jihoon that perfectly combines with jisoo and jun's singing, perfect! just perfect...
#6년째_웃음꽃_주는_세븐틴
#6YearsOfLoveWithSEVENTEEN

author: @cappuccinolatte21
text:
Hai Seventeen.. Aku Salsabilla, hari ini aku officially 1 tahun jd carat, ak nyesel ga nge stan kalian dr awal, padahal di thn 2017 (klo gasalah ya) ak sempet suka sama mv Don't Wanna Cry dan sering bgt nge streaming, tp ak blm memutuskan utk nge stan kalian, wktu itu ak cuma tau member yg pake "kemeja kotak²" di mv (ternyata dokyeom) hehee.. Wktu itu ak jg tau nya cuma Seungkwan, sama Hoshi. 

Singkat cerita, di pertengahan tahun 2020 waktu yg terberat bgt buat aku dn semua org, but guys.. You saving my days, Kalian bikin mood, semangat dn kebahagiaan ku balik, sederhana emang tp itu berarti bgt.. Dn ak memutuskan utk nge stan kalian bahkan tgl nya ak masih inget (250520) Thanks for everything, ak akan selalu mencintai kalian 'til the last "say the name", makasih udah hadir di hidupku, i'll Always remember you, my youth, my brothers, my family.. All my love is for you, I LOVE YOU..

author: @yuikorj96
text:
May 26, 2021

Dearest sebongies,

When I saw you guys for the first time - in that Manse Dance Practice Video a few years ago,  I thought you were just some other groups I could stan for a while and then leave, but no. Coincidentally, you were with me in the most stressful times of my life - my last three years in college, when I couldn't get my diploma on time, when i was losing and when i lost my dad and now, you are still with me during - probably - the most anxious chapter in my career.

Thank you so much from the bottom of my heart. You might not know there is a me that exists in the world but I know how much you love your carats and fortunately I am one of them. I haven't felt being loved and this strong of a connection towards an artist for a long time. Thank you. I feel like with you, I am always loved, heard and comforted.

I thank God for leading me to you in the most, darkest times in my life. You are one of the greatest gifts I have ever received. Thank you so much. I hope to be with you for more years to come and I pray that you guys find your own happiness as well. We love you. I love you, so, so, much.

xoxo,
Rej

Terimakasih SEVENTEEN, aku mulai jadi Carat disaat aku bangkit dari keterpurukanku, jujur dulu aku banyak overthingking dalam segala masalah dihidupku sampai-sampai tak hanya mentalku yang jatuh sakit tapi juga fisikku selama seminggu aku gak bisa masuk kuliah gara2 sakit tapi saat aku mendengar lagu don't wanna cry entah kenapa aku malah menangis lama sekali, tapi setelah itu perasaanku jadi agak lega dan akhirnya aku mulai tertarik dengan seventeen sehingga sejak itu  aku melihat semua video kalian baik interview, behind the scene, variety show yang kalian ikuti. Sejak saat itu aku mulai bisa tersenyum bahkan tertawa terbahak-bahak karena tingkah laku kalian. Dan, puji Tuhan aku sembuh dari sakitku dan bisa mengikuti aktivitasku lagi. Maaf panjang lebar tapi intinya 
"AKU SANGAT BERTERIMAKASIH KEPADA SEVENTEEN YANG MEMBERI KAN KU SEDIKIT HARAPAN UNTUK MULAI BISA TERSENYUM DAN BERJALAN MAJU, BERANI MENGHADAPI HIDUP INI"

author: @blueskyyy13
text:
Annyeong seventeen. From carat indonesia.
Awal aku kenal kalian mungkin sekitar tahun 2018 . Awalnya karena waktu itu aku mmg pengen STAN suatu grup. MV pertama ku very nice , mulai tertarik karena lagu clap. awalnya ngak tau kalo itu lagu CLAP soalnya sering denger gegara dibikin misherad lyric. Lalu yg bikin aku fall in love to sebong adalah lagu left and right dan don't wanna cry. Jujur kirain lagu kalian itu biasa aja . Tapi setelah aku kepoin kalian itu semakin bikin aku senang.dari liriknya banyak hal yg dapat diambil. Bisa didengarkan kapan pun. Terutama ketika aku sedang murung. Awalnya juga ngak yakin jadi carat soalnya disekitar ku jarang ada carat yg bener² carat. Tapi karena Corona , jadi aku lebih banyak punya teman carat walaupun itu online tapi aku ngak kesepian lagi. 
Dulu pas bosan aku bisa stres.semenjak STAN svt aku bisa nonton gose, streaming MV. Bukan cmn ketenangan , bisa bikin ketawa, buat motivasi tapi itu juga biar bantu svt . Wish moga kalian sehat selalu dan makin sukses. Walaupun aku baru kepoin kalian tahun 2020 tapi aku senang!. Ngak tau mau hilang apa lagi. 
Thanks seventeen .thanks  can make things that make me excited. Good luck always.
Thanks!
SAY THE NAME SEVENTEEN

author: @louvreism
text:
TO : SEVENTEEN (13 wonderful boys)
Hello there! Happy Anniversary and Thank you for these rollercoaster years there's so many things happened. The first time i stanned you was truly an amazing choice in my life, you truly make me like a special girl, made me feel laugh love and beautiful sadness. author: @febeg1073
text:
Terimakasih kalian udah debut 13 cowo ku yang bertalenta+tamvan hehe 
Jujur baru kali ini aku sayang banget sama idol grup terutama boygrup,aku sudah 10 taun jadi kpopers ga pernah mau masuk fandom mana pun dan ga ngestan mana pun apalagi grup cowok susah banget aku suka grup cowok tapi kalian satu² nya grup yang bikin aku masuk ke dunia fandom taun lalu,satu² nya grup yang bikin aku dengerin bside track sampe semua lagu kalian aku afal ,nontonin semua mv,konten yang selama ini aku ga pernah lakuin ke grup manapun apalagi dengerin bside track suatu grup ga pernah sampe ketemu seventeen,playlist spotify ku isinya cuma seventeen doang,nyesel banget baru nge stan kalian 2020 kemarin padahal aku udah tau kalian sejak awal debut akinda bias pertama ku bonon tapi ujungnya oleng ke semua member wkwkwk,terimakasih sudah bikin ribuan carat termasuk aku terhibur lewat tingkah laku kalian,terimakasih sudah buat lagu² yang bikin carat semangat menjalani hidup dan ga ngerasa sendiri lagi,betul² nguatin banget lagu² kalian,kalian juga ngajarin carat jadi mandiri kreatif lewat fanchant + ngerakit album sendiri,ngajarin buat merenima mencintai diri kita sendiri aku sampe gabisa berkata² kek rasanya kata ga cukup buat menyampaikan rasa cinta ku dan banggaku ke kalian :'),aku bangga jadi Carat and i'll stay untill the 13+3+1 = 17 = 1 Say The Name Seventeen ,semoga kalian selalu sehat + bahagia 
Happy Anniv yang ke 6 SEVENTEEN i love you 💖
Maaf kalo kepanjangan :*

author: @10daniyahmarsha98
text:
Untuk Seventeen di tempat.

Apa Kabar Seventeen? Akhir-akhiran ini sudah mau musim panas, jangan keseringan minum es.

Seventeen, kalian sangat penting seperti huruf p dalam kata raspberry, sangat dinantikan seperti sidang saat akhir semester, dan sangat menenangkan seperti lagu Smile Flower.

Ketahuilah, diatas lara masih ada harsa, saat tidak ada kupu-kupu yang membantu bunga untuk penyerbukan masih ada angin, saat tak ada yang bisa jadi sandaran masih ada CARAT yang dapat kamu andalkan.

Terima kasih sudah menemani sampai sekarang, terima kasih karena sudah mengisi masa mudaku. Mari bertemu di atas bianglala tanpa nestapa. 

Say The Name, Seventeen! Terima Kasih

Dari Daniyah, ditulis di atas meja sambil memegang pena (Indonesia, 2021.05.26)

author: @Sti.aoijau
text: I am thankful to SEVENTEEN members for being the star of my life, for being my favourite group members of all time, for being a friend-like idol, for being yourselves, for working hard on everything you all do, for debuting as 13 precious members, and most importantly, for being born. Please know that you have become light in someone's life, especially for me, many Carats, and others who enjoyed your songs, contents, or maybe just by knowing that SEVENTEEN is always there for them. I hope you know that you are loved, respected, and appreciated by a lot of people, and I hope that could bring you to love and take care of yourself. Thank you so much, and I give much love to SEVENTEEN members. Happy 6th Anniversary! ❤

text: Hi Seventeen! I'm a Carat from the Philippines. I just wanna say that your music saved me from my boring and repetitive way of life. It's like I found a ray of light in my darkest phase. author: @meanieclub
text:
I still remember accidentally clicking Adore U and directly falling in love. I've been a K-Pop fan since 2010, and out of all fandoms I've been in, I've been a Carat for the longest time (almost 6 years now). It's crazy how I spend almost my entire youth with them and their songs; roughly from high school to my twenties. No matter when I feel up or down, they're always there with me. They are one of the reasons I live my life happily and gratefully. Time flies so fast. Happy sixth anniversary. Let's be together until the last 'Say the name'!

Serius. Terima kasih, SEVENTEEN.

Selamat malam Seventeen!!!
Bersyukur banget bisa kenal kalian. Di masa sulit yang aku hadapi, Tuhan kirim kalian buat jadi alasan kebahagiaanku.

Sempat terpikir, "Gimana bisa mereka, 13 orang, bisa tetep kompak dan bertahan selama ini tanpa ada satu yang mundur?". Sedangkan hubungan pertemananku ga pernah bisa bertahan lama.

Tetapi sekarang, aku merasa benar-benar ada dalam hubungan pertemanan yang menyenangkan.
Bahkan lebih dari teman... kalian menganggap kami (Carat) sebagai keluarga.

Terimakasih Seventeen,
Mari terus bersama untul waktu yang lebih lama.

text:
dan terima kasih banyak. untuk tetap utuh hingga hari ini. utuh dalam artian, segalanya masih bisa memberikan kalian banyak memori, untuk dikenang, dipeluk, dan disayang bersama benang tak kasat mata, yang dinamai dengan cinta.

yang kuyakini, satu-satunya yang tak terlihat, hanyalah soal ketidakberadaan fisik untuk aku genggam. selebihnya daripada itu. senyum kalian, perasaan hangat itu, kebersamaan yang sering kali aku impikan, telah berada di sini. dalam sekat-sekat jantungku, membentuk tempat ternyaman untuk aku pulang, dan akan selalu jadi seperti itu. barangkali tak akan kubuat padam, dan gersang, karena ia akan kupupuk sepenuh hati.

selamat untuk jadi 6 tahun, sayang. jika benar segala doa bisa terwujud dalam kesungguhan. harapku akan tetap sama. jadilah utuh, sebagai seventeen dan diri kalian sendiri. yang tak takut tumbuh, dan terus mengukir lembaran kenangan tak terlupakan. yang akan mengabadi di setiap denyut nadi, tak jadi sia-sia, dengan bahagia.

aku, mencintaimu. 
hingga waktu berhenti menjalankan tugasnya untuk di sisimu.

author: @penguinroyal
text:
Seventeen, thank you so so much from the bottom of my heart.
I hope this message reaches you. Your songs have given me hope, happiness, and most of all, comfort during some of my lonely days. I feel blessed for having a chance to listen and watch your performances. I may just be an ordinary fan among the crowd but I want to express that I will never regret being a Carat. Believe me when I say Seventeen is life-changing. I feel at home whenever I watch you all perform and enjoy each moment together. I wish all Carats a wonderful friendship like Seventeen's. I hope I get a chance to see you all perform soon. This is my first anniversary with you and I'm looking forward to many more! 
Happy 6th Anniversary, Seventeen. <3 Thank you for being born. 

- A forever Carat from the Philippines :)

author: @ipahjodohnyamasmimgyu9179
text:
Dear seventeen♡


Hi, it's your 6th year. It's great, so far you have entertained us, have struggled from all obstacles and obstacles. We will always be with you, will always support you, will comfort you when you are lonely. There are so many ways to make their short videos, if you are not busy you can watch them in various media. We love sebong, we want to always try to make him proud. We really enjoy your music, your work, which makes me happy to be able to experience this beautiful work. Pray for me that I can meet Sebong in good health so that I can see you in a happy state. Take care of your health, yes, the following years will be the day of your success. Aamiin

Love you sebong♡

Ipah♡

author: @cristiny378
text:
Carat Br aqui 🇧🇷
Querido Seventeen, acompanho vocês a apenas 9 meses e 21 dias (hoje 26/05/2021) mas quero que saibam que conhecer vocês foi a melhor decisão que tomei. Vocês me trazem muito conforto, alegria, felicidade e fazem com que eu me sinta amada (mesmo estando do outro lado do mundo), obrigada por tudo e tenho orgulho de vocês, de tudo o que conseguiram e por não terem desistido dos seus sonhos, me orgulho de dizer que sou Carat, um fandom que pra mim não é só um fandom, mas uma família, meu lar. Seventeen e Carat são meu lar.
Obrigada por me inspirar, me acolher e me amar:
Choi Seungcheol
Yoon Jeonghan
Hong Joshua
Wen Junhui
Kwon Soonyoung
Jeon Wonwoo
Lee Jihoon
Lee Seokmin
Kim Mingyu
Xu Minghao
Boo Seungkwan
Choi Vernon Hansol
Lee Chan

Brazilian Carat here 🇧🇷
Dear Seventeen, I have been with you for only 9 months and 21 days (today 05/26/2021) but I want you to know that meeting you was the best decision I made. You bring me a lot of comfort, joy, happiness and make me feel loved (even though I'm in the other side of the world), thank you for everything and I am proud of you, of everything you have achieved and for not giving up on your dreams, I am proud to say that I am Carat, a fandom which for me isn't just a fandom, but a family, my home. Seventeen and Carat are my home.
Thank you for inspiring me, welcoming me and loving me:
Choi Seungcheol
Yoon Jeonghan
Hong Joshua
Wen Junhui
Kwon Soonyoung
Jeon Wonwoo
Lee Jihoon
Lee Seokmin
Kim Mingyu
Xu Minghao
Boo Seungkwan
Choi Vernon Hansol
Lee Chan

I'll be here till the last Say The Name and even after that. SAY THE NAME SEVENTEEN!

author: @_k.ahyeon_
text: I can't believe it has been 6 years since you guys debuted. Even though this is my first anniversary with Seventeen, I have some things I would like to say. For the past year, I really started to get into Seventeen and now they are my ult group. I got to learn the personalities and special talents of individual members. I was exposed to kind words and beautiful songs and beautiful, synchronized choreographies. I was blessed with music videos and group pictures and selcas. I did not think I would come so far being a Carat. Thank you Seventeen. You helped me at my lowest, made me feel happiness and cared for us Carats as a whole. You gave us all your efforts and showed us all of your amazing talents that we can never forget. You showed us love. In the future, let's continue to support one another and become stronger by each other's side. I love you so much. Happy 6th Anniversary <3

author: @zacchariahwisco9594
text:
Every anniversary, i'm always so grateful and emotional that I met them but damn, this year hits different coz I'm going 2nd year in college and the hyung line will soon go and serve in the military...

I'm a little bit fearful for the future, had thoughts that what if SVT disbands when they reach the end of their contract?! What if they won't renew it? I've literally aged together with them and i'm really thankful that they helped me go through hard times in highschool.

But ya know, i've come up into a realization. We don't know what the future holds, that's for a fact but what we do know is no matter what happens...

*CARATS WILL ALWAYS HAVE SEVENTEEN AND SEVENTEEN WILL AWALYS HAVE CARATS* !!!! 

so since we all have this time left, we should really cherish each moment, support them and  help them in promoting their songs.

I aged together with Seventeen and i'm 100% sure that i'm going to stan them beyond my youth, hell imma be a carat till im 70!!! That's my story!!!
#6yearswithSeventeen #AllmyLove

author: @gezellight3814
text:
Aku memang enggak kenal sama sebong dari jaman tembok hijau. 
Aku kenal sebong dari masih pake rok biru, kayaknya waktu itu sekitar tahun 2016, awal" diracunin K-Pop sama temen. Awalnya dikenalin sama grup lain, cuma akhirnya nemu sebong, dan aku mulai dari nonton mv mansae sama nonton OFD yeosodo.
Lanjut ke masa putih abu, aku mulai sering oleng ke grup lain. Sampe bingung aku tuh sebenernya masuk fandom mana, lol bgt. Tapi, setiap kali ditanya "kamu suka grup ap? Fandom mana?" Aku selalu PD bilang, "aku Carat, fansnya Seventeen" padahal sebenernya waktu itu aku banyak banget ninggalin update sebong, dan lebih condong ke grup lain, lol. Ngerasa jadi carat KTP, ngerasa berkhianat gitu.
Tapi, biarpun sering oleng ke grup lain, ujung"nya aku bakal bosen, jujur cepet bosen, bukan berarti grup lain ngebosenin ya, cuma... kebanyakan lagu" grup lain itu enggak sesuai sama selera musik aku. Konten"nya juga, cara ngelawaknya juga, kayak kurang konek, nggak sefrekuensi.
Ujung"nya aku balik lagi ke sebong. Always. Mereka bener" kayak rumah buat aku.
Sampe lulus masa putih abu aku masih sering oleng, balik, oleng, balik.
Nah, pas 2020, mulai pandemi. Makin bosen lh aku sama dunia K-Pop. 
Tapi sebong selalu dateng lagi, fresh, dan bikin aku senyaman dan sebahagia itu. 
Tahun 2020, aku selalu ikut update sebong, dan bener" ngerasa di-spoil. Enggak bosen lagi, bener" SVT saved my 2020. Dan akhirnya aku sadar, bisa"nya aku oleng ke grup lain dan gak setia sama sebong... padahal aku sadar bgt kalo mereka itu my  home, aku seneng sama lagu"nya mvnya, kekeluargaan mereka. 
2020, aku mutusin buat stan sebong only, they're my ultimate. My best. Grup lain cuma lirik bentar doang, respect keberadaannya, udah. My heart will always be with SVT & carat.
And guess what, i feel like being loyal to only SVT is the best desicion ever. 
Rasanya dunia cuma milik kita (carat) sama sebong doang, udah, bahagia bgt.
Makasih banyak buat sebong & carat, udah jadi rumah buat aku. Selalu bikin aku nyaman, dan motivated. You guys, really radiating youthful energy, being with this family make me always feel like i'm forever 17 y.o. 
Aku seneng dan terinspirasi bgt sama S.coups yg makin tua makin cheerful, sama jeonghan yg selalu iseng sama org" tersayangnya, sama joshua yg selalu gentle, sama jun yg selalu sweet, sama hoshi yg selalu bisa bangkit, sama wonu yg gk berubah" lol, sama uji yg selalu hardworking, sama the8 yg makin bijak dan estetik, sama mingyu yg selalu think positively, yg sering bilang ke carat buat mencoba apapun yg kita mau, sama dk yg selalu improve and  put his best effort on everything, sama uri boo yg selalu semangat ceria, ramah, sama vernon yg selalu stay cool dan selalu bilang ke kita buat jgn peduli sama standar org lain, dan buat dino yg ngebuktiin kalau selama kita terus berusaha, kita bakalan jadi lebih baik dari sebelumnya. 
Thank you so so much.

author: @hasnamahitsa9519
text:
Kalo gue ngga kenal svt pasti hidup gue bakal tambah datar dan suram. Tambah jarang ketawa, tambah sering stress, dll. Tapi gara gara kalian, hidup gue jadi berwarna. Ngakak mulu, mood banget pokoknya. Hp gue jadi ada gunanya, gpp walau memori penuh, kuota habis, yg penting ada tujuan dari penuh dan habisnya memori dan kuota gue. 

Sayang bgt sama kalian, bukan jenis sayang ke pacar, keluarga atau sahabat. Beda, ngga bisa dijelasin rasa sayang gue ke kalian tuh kaya gimana. Pokoknya kalian punya tempat sendiri di hati gue. Svt adalah bagian dari hidup yg ngga bakal gue lupain sampai tua nanti. Meski kalian udh ngga aktif, meski suatu saat gue udh ngga bisa ngefangirl, kalian bakal gue inget sebagai salah satu kenangan paling membahagiakan. 

Janji.

author: @evieinayah8178
text: Aku bisa dibilang "orang baru" dalam dunia percaratan ini. Awal2 aku cuman tau sebagian lagu2 seventeen. Cuman hafal sebagian nama member seventeen. Sekarang aku ga nyangka bakal sebucin ini sama seventeen. Semakin menggali informasi tentang seventeen malah bikin aku semakin sayang sama mereka. Dari lagu2 mereka yang keren, talent mereka yang luar biasa, kekeluargaan mereka, sinkronisasi dance, harmonisasi nyanyian mereka bener2  bikin aku speachless ini grup bukan grup biasa. Terimakasih karena sudah debut. Terimakasih karena sudah hadir menemani hari2ku. Dan yaa Selamat ulangtahun buat SEVENTEEN yang ke 6 tahun ♡♡♡

text:
Happy 6th anniversary seventeen💕💕
I wished I had  known and Adore u from the start. Let’s shout Mansae as a symbol of happiness! You’ve shown us a version of the most Pretty u. All 13 members are Very nice and humble too. Every time I look at you my heart goes Boom Boom. It’s already been 6 years, my tears are falling down but I Don’t wanna cry at this special day. They deserve a Clap from all of us! Thanks for everything that you all do. You encourage carats and say Just do it and be confident. Can you Call us 3 times every day? We just want to hear you say Moshi moshi. You got us saying Oh My! Every comeback with new concepts. Thank you for being carats Home and comfort whenever were lonely and sad. I hope Seventeen gets the Happy ending they deserve, don’t worry no matter what we will support you. Not every masterpiece needs 1b views to prove it, take Seventeen for example every song is a Hit!
We don’t have no Fear! We feel safe with you. Let’s collect the Falling flowers and make a wish. Every time there is a group photo carats always look Left&Right to see if the 13 boys are complete. Thinking of you 24H. You showed us how to hit a Homerun and Don’t be afraid Your not alone were here with you.

author: @sophea3595
text: When 13 SHINING DIAMONDS first debuted into the world, I never thought I would ADORE U. I kept FRONTING and didn’t MANSAE to your comeback just yet. Until a PRETTY U LOVE LETTER came and I realized how AJU VERY NICE you were. Then it just came in a BOOM BOOM and I DON’T WANNA CRY but I CHECK-IN every single time I got a notification. I had a CHANGE UP and would CLAP and say THANKS everytime I see you. CALL CALL CALL me crazy but would say Oh My!, and when OUR DAWN IS HOTTER THAN DAY, I would RUN TO YOU back HOME. When things are GETTING CLOSER and reality HITs, I don’t FEAR. Each SNAP SHOOT makes me FEARLESS and all FALLIN FLOWERS remind me that you are GOOD TO ME. So no need to choose between LEFT AND RIGHT anymore because I've now become a CARAT 24H, 247 and MY MY! It all happened just as quick as a HOME;RUN. Thanks to you, I'm NOT ALONE and I will forever feel the POWER OF LOVE. SARANGHAE SEVENTEEN. Happy 6th Anniversary. 💖💖💖💖💖💖💖💖💖💖💖💖💖

Hai Kebahagiaanku, keluarga keduaku, sahabatku

Makasih ya sudah menjadi penghiburku, penyemangatku, dan pengisi hatiku. Suka duka kalian juga suka dukaku. Ga berasa kalian udah bareng-bareng sama carat 6 tahun., dan aku baru bareng sama kalian dari 2017 era dwc. Bukan hanya Seventeen aku juga sayang sama kalian semua Carat... Seventeen❤Carat. Mari kita bergadengan tangan untuk waktu yang lama.

author: @putrialfiana1004
text:
Gue terharu banyak banget komentar bahasa indonya.. 😭😂

Ikutan cerita ah,
Aku kenal seventeen beneran waktu mereka baru debut shinning diamond. Pas itu jujur aja sih aku masih ngestan sama exo dan bts. Tapi begitu kenal seventeen, aku merasa ada hawa yang berbeda. Dan pas tahu kalau leadernya seumuran sama aku, jadi makin exited buat ganti ngestan seventeen. Bukan berarti aku jadi benci exo dan bts. Hanya saja aku jadi fokus aja ke seventeen. Lagu-lagu seventeen itu bisa ngisi setiap mood aku. Semua reality show mereka juga bener-bener menghibur aku. Padahal aku bukan carat yang dukung mereka misal beli album dll. Ga, aku carat ga modal. Cuma bisa streaming dan ngelike in mereka. Kadang aku merasa berdosa banget kek gue itu harusnya ngasih bukti nyata buat dukung idol lu. But, I know who I am. Aku tahu bisa ku sebatas mana. Dan kenyataan mereka sampai saat ini masih utuh seperti awal mereka muncul adalah hadiah terindah aku selama ngestan mereka 😭❤️ makasih ya seventeen.. kalian beneran jadiin masa muda aku berwarna ❤️ love banget sama kalian 🎉🎉🎉🎉🙏🏻 happy aniv 6th sayangnya carat sedunia !

author: @Margareta_Wulandari
text:
Dear SEVENTEEN
Mulai suka 13 manusia absurd ini sejak kalian tampil di weekly idol era "Thanks" Pertama liat ga tau gimana langsung suka banget sama kalian.
Tarian kalian yang keren banget, suara kalian yang unik banget, bahkan kalian juga lawak banget. 
Aku cuman mau bilang terimakasih banyak. Untuk semua yang kalian kasih ke Carat. Gak pernah ada dibayanganku hubungan idol dengan fans sedekat ini. Bahkan aku belum berkesempatan bertemu kalian, tapi aku bisa merasakan kedekatan kalian. 
Kalau liat macan aku ingat Hoshi, kalo liat nasi inget Woozi, kalo liat cherry inget S.Coups, dan masih banyak lagi. Terimakasih sekali lagi untuk selalu memberikan yang terbaik untuk kita para Carats
We love you guys so much:)))

author: @alsawidyad9982
text:
Untuk kamu, 13 pria yg berjuang dari 0.
Terimakasih atas kerja keras kalian, dan semua waktu, tenaga, pikiran yang kalian curahkan sampai saat ini
Terimakasih untuk tidak pernah menyerah dan terus berjuang bersama
Pasti hal yang sangat sulit untuk meninggalkan kampung halaman, keluarga, teman dan semua kenangan untuk mengejar mimpi kalian
Aku hanya ingin mengatakan kepada kalian, selamat kamu sudah melewati banyak hak yang tentu saja tidak mudah.
Aku percaya semua yang kalian korbankan  selama ini bukan hal yang sia-sua
Aku percaya bahwa mereka akan bangga dengan kerja keras dan pencapaian kalian, kalian semua sudah bekerja keras lebih dari apapun
Kami, carat, berjanji untuk selalu berjalan mendampingi kalian agar kalian tidak pernah merasa sendiri dan kesepian
kami berjanji tidak akan pernah meninggaljan kalian, meskipun harus melalui hujan dan badai, kerikil dan batu, atau apapun itu
Mari selalu bergandengan tangan untuk kedepannya, 
Mari mengejar mimpi kita bersama sama
Mari terus bersama sampai rambut kita berubah warna menjadi abus
Kami berjanji bahwa kamibjuga akan bekerja keras untuk menjadi carats yg bisa SVT banggakan, sama seperti SVT yang selalu dengan bangganya mengatakan bahwa kalian sangat senang memiliki kami.
Terimakasih kami rasanya tidak cukup untuk membalas cinta dan kerja keras kalian, tapi tetap, aku ingin menyampaikan rasa syukur dan terimakasih kepada kalian yg sudah hadir dalam hidup kami dengan membawa kebahagiaan, tawa, dan kenangan indah. Terimakasih sudah menjadi penyembuh kami dengan semua canda tawa, musik, dan dan kata kata hangat kalian kepada kami. Mari selalu bersama untuk menciptakan kenangan indah lainnya untuk masa muda kita. Happy Anniversary SEVENTEEN, selalu bahagia dan sehat selalu!

author: @fahraazzahra3754
text:
I'm so proud of u.
never I have ever regretted, even once, stanning the thirteen of you since predebut.
we've come so far, we've been through so much.
all of u have been constantly giving me happiness, strength, and warmth, and I'm so thankful for that.
u guys have been giving me so much, but I'm sorry I couldn't give u as much as I take from u. I'll try better.
I'm sure we all have grown so much in these past 6 years. I hope that all of us could learn from our past, from all the joyful moments, from all the sad times, and from all the hard times.
let's thrive to continue doing our best and be a more better person.
thanks for the love and trust u guys have put in me. I'll try to do the same to you guys.

thanks for being a crucial part of my youth.
from now on, let's grow up together!
I love u so so much.
seventeen carat, let's go <3

author: @deinlevinjuarez7731
text:
To SEVENTEEN with love,

You've come through a long way! I'm so proud of you! Just so you know, I'm more than proud being Carat! No beautiful words can describe how much I'm thankful being part of Seventeen's life even tho we're thousands of miles apart. 

Happy 6th Anniversary! Thank you so much, I love you so much. Tbh, I'm so proud and happy that I don't know what to say anymore. All I know is I love you so much guys and I'm so grateful of you. Please, keep walking. No need for us to rush, we just need to stay, support and be happy with each for lifetime. I promise I'll be there through ups and downs. You saved me, so, I will always be thankful of you and will love you 'til no end, my life long idols. 

Loving you 'til no end,

Rgn

Happy anniversary to our beloved SEVENTEEN.

author: @etikaard
text:
Hi, SEVENTEEN! Glad to know you, boys!
Banyak hal yang ingin ku sampaikan pada kalian, tapi karena aku tak pandai merangkai kata-kata, jadi aku akan menyampaikan secukupnya saja. 
1. TERIMA KASIH telah hadir menemani hidupku dan hidup CARATS disana. 
2. TERIMA KASIH telah membuatku merasa menjadi orang yang special, mungkin CARATS lain juga begitu.
3. TERIMA KASIH telah menyadarkanku untuk menjadi seseorang yang lebih dewasa dalam menghadapi permasalahan di dunia ini.
4. TERIMA KASIH telah menyemangati hari-hariku dan CARATS dengan karya-karya yang begitu luar biasa.
5. TERIMA KASIH telah menganggap CARATS sebagai teman, keluarga, atau pendengar. Hal itu sangat bermakna bagi kita.
6. TERIMA KASIH telah menyebarkan positive vibes terutama di era pandemi ini.
7. TERIMA KASIH telah menciptakan sesuatu yang luar biasa dan unik.
8. TERIMA KASIH selalu menampilkan sesuatu yang berbeda di tiap penampilan kalian.
9. TERIMA KASIH telah berjuang dan bertahan sejak awal hingga saat ini.
10. TERIMA KASIH karena selalu bersama-sama.
Aku harap kalian selalu bahagia seperti bahagia CARATS ketika kalian hibur. Aku harap kedepannya kalian akan menemukan seseorang yang mengerti kalian dengan baik. INTINYA KALIAN HARUS BAHAGIA, CARATS JUGA HARUS BAHAGIA YA. 

HAPPY 6TH ANNIVERSARY, SEVENTEEN! 

Astaga seperti menulis essay. Semoga ga keciduk temen real life.

Aku bahagia dan bersyukur banget jadi carat dan bisa kenal seventeen 13 anak laki-laki hebat dan baik. Maaf aku ga nemenin kalian dari awal, tapi aku janji bakal nemenin kalian sampai akhir. Dear Seventeen,
    Thank you for everything, I might only know you in 2017, but those 4 years being with you is worth it. I feel like I have some special angel that will always be at my back when I'm feeling low.. you've become my reason to somehow continue to strive in life.. so TO SEVENTEEN THAT IS SO SPECIAL TO ME, I ACTUALLY MADE A POEM 2 YEARS AGO AND HERE'S SOME LINE TO IT

"I'LL PROMISE I'LL STAY WITH YOU THROUGH FAME, THROUGH SHAME..
I'LL PROMISE I'LL STAY WITH YOU UNTIL THE LAST SAY THE NAME!"

Lastly, I want to thank you for just being born.

author: @letshavefun2270
text:
Haloooo ganteng-gantenganya Noona, 
Happy 6th anniversary yaaaa. 

Gak berasa udah 6 taun jalan bareng kalian. Mungkin Noona gak ngikutin kalian dari awal debut bangeet. Tapi seneng bisa jalan sama kalian dari mulai dapet 1st win, mulai di recognize di dunia musik Korea, disandingin sama grup2 besar lainnya, mulai go internasional. Pencapaian kalian selama 6 tahun debut itu luar biasa bangeeeeet. I'm so proud of you all.. 

Semakin tinggi kalian terbang, ptasti akan makin kenceng "tekanan" yang akan kalian dapet. But please don't worry, carats will always have your back. Jadi terbang yang tinggi, lakuin apa yang mau kalian lakuin. Kita akan support terus, no matter what. 

Yang penting, kalian bahagia, kalian senang ngelakuin semuanya. Karena itu yang Carat mau liat. Kalian bahagia, kalian sehat. 

To a my fellow Carats, please standby them till the end. We need to support each other back. No matter what. 

Note: seneng banget liat komen isinya banyak Carat Indonesia. Luv. 

I'll be back with english comment soon. Kekeke.

author: @fatmanuragustin
text:
Dear seventeen
Makasih udah datang diwaktu yang tepat walau sedikit terlambat. Jujur aku awalnya ga pernah minat sama kpop, cuma ngikutin kdrama. Aku masuk kefandom carat setelah nonton Knowing Brother eps. 252, tau eps itu juga dari akun fanbase nya suju. Dan jujur lagi, aku  ngefans karena kalian ga pernah gagal bikin ketawa (re:lawak:v) sampai akhirnya aku kepoin semua lagu" kalian. Pertama aku tertarik ke jeonghan, aku search di google agak kaget yang muncul jeonghan jaman longhair sempet ngira seventeen ada member cewek (mian jeonghan). Dan bias aku sekarang mingyu wonwoo mungkin bentar lagi oleng karna liat video uji kibas" rambut:(( sejauh ini aku liat gada yg toxic fans, jujur senyaman ini difandom carat. Semoga bisa ketemu lagi di anniversary tahun depan yaa.
Yang udah baca ini makasih
SEVENTEEN SERANGHAE
