author: @ambrcm
text: Seeing this makes me teared up a bit, seriously. Can't believe that in yours 6 years journey, I've been there with you for 5 years, it still make me amazed how long yet short the time is. I still remember when I'm just a 14 year old girl, watching all of your amazing content, watching how each member becoming adult until now I've become an adult myself. I still remember all the laughs and tears I've let out for you guys, you guys are literally one of the reason I grow up well and I really want to thank you guys for it, I really appreciate it. There's so much experiences we've been through together for the past years, the good one and the bad one, but I still enjoyed it because we can get through it together. I know there's only a small percentage of you guys seeing this comment of mine, but I just want to say that I love you guys so much and thank you so much for the past years, I hope there'll be more things to wait in the future, because I'll definitely be there until the last say the name. 세봉아 사랑해!

author: @acquaintxnce
text:
내 사랑이 겨우 이것 밖에 안되어서 너무 미안해 연습생 생활 적응하는 것부터 힘들었을텐데 지금까지 잘 버텨줘서 고마워 벌써 데뷔한지 6년이나 지났다는게 정말 믿기지 않는다 내가 입덕했을 때가 2018년 9월이었는데 조금더 빨리 입덕할걸 후회가 되네 내가 입덕한게 엊그제 같은데 벌써 나도 입덕한지 횟수로 4년째고 이렇게 내가 시간이 빨리 간다고 느낀 이유는 너희를 열정적으로 사랑했기 때문이라고 생각해 예전에도 사랑했고, 지금도 사랑하고 있지만, 앞으로 10년, 20년이 되어도 내 맘 변치 않아 누가 뭐래도 우리는 흉내낼 수 없는 세븐틴 캐럿 사이잖아 정말 세븐틴이라는 그룹을 알아서 행복하고, 세븐틴이라는 그룹의 팬이라는게 너무 자랑스러워 내가 정말 슬럼프에 빠져서 모든게 하기 싫었던 적이 있었는데 그때 너희가 포옹이라는 곡의 가사로 나를 위로해줬고, 덕분의 난 극단적인 선택까지 가지 않았어 너희는 가수이자 한 사람의 생명을 살린 사람들이야 너희 덕분에 춤이라는 취미를 가지게 되었고 스트레스 푸는 방법을 몰라서 그냥 계속 몇십년동안 쌓아뒀던 스트레스를 고잉세븐틴을 보는 방법과, 세븐틴의 춤을 추는 방법으로 스트레스를 풀 수 있다는 것을 알았어 덕분에 지금은 정말 행복한 삶을 살고 있는 것 같아 이런 말 꺼내봤자 내 댓글을 보는 사람이 있을까라는 생각과 내가 이런 말 꺼내봤자 뭐해라는 생각 때문에 한번도 꺼내본 적 없는 말인데 오늘 6주년이니까, 오늘은 정말 특별한 날이니까 한번 이 이야기를 꺼내보게 되었어 너희가 한 사람의 생명을 살렸다는 것만 알았으면 좋겠다 데뷔 6주년 축하하고 앞으로 10주년, 20주년까지 축하해주고 좋아해줄 자신 있으니까 오래오래 함께 서로만 믿고 가자 세븐틴 사랑한다

우리 총괄리더님 제일 마음고생 심했을텐데 지금까지 버텨줘서 고마워
우리 천사님, 예쁘다 단발로 내가 캐럿이 되게 해줘서 고마워
우리 밤비님, 연습생 시절에 천사님이랑 같이 나가려고 했었는데 끝까지 버텨줘서 고마워
우리 고구마 하나로 웃기는 준잘님, 타지에 와서 적응이 힘들었을텐데 세븐틴으로 데뷔해줘서 고마워
우리 권수장님, 세븐틴의 멋진 퍼포먼스를 책임쳐줘서 고마워
우리 전애옹님, 때론 과묵하게, 때론 유식하게 세븐틴의 멤버가 되어줘서 너무 고마워
우리 천재작곡가님, 명곡 만들어줘서 고마워
우리 패셔니스타님, 타국에 와서 말도 잘 안 통해서 답답하기도 하고 문화가 달라서 적응하기 힘들었을텐데 버텨줘서 고마워
우리 밍주부님, 가끔씩 의도치 않은 허당미로 캐럿들 미소 짓게 해줘서 고마워
우리 확성기님, 내 귀를 호강시켜 줘서 고맙고 내 최애가 되어줘서 고마워
우리 예능천재님, 내가 우리 반에서 케이팝 고인물이 되게 해줘서 고마워 케이팝 강의 더 열심히 들을게
우리 버카프리오님, 4차원적이어서 너무 매력 넘치고 배울 점이 많은 것 같아서 고마워
우리 형만 12명인 사람님, 항상 집 안에서 맏이였는데 갑자기 막내 되어서 적응하기 힘들었을 것 같은데 세븐틴의 막내가 되어줘서 고마워

이렇게 댓글 길게 써본거 처음인 것 같아
항상 고맙고 더 좋은 성과 못 내줘서 미안해
언제나 서로만 믿고 가자 우린 흉내낼 수 없는 세븐틴 캐럿이잖아


세븐틴에 진심인 캐럿이..

author: @nvnchi5048
text:
I became a carat or a “sm17e” back in 2015. I was a freshman in high school then, and I was having a rough time, nearly slipping into depression from just being overwhelmed by schoolwork and my social life. Thankfully these 13 wonderful men came into my life and brought me so much joy and hope. As i got more into the kpop world, i discovered other groups and fell in love with other groups, but i’ve always had a special spot in my heart for seventeen. Back then when I started stanning svt, I didn’t really think much about if they would make it big in the industry or not; I just knew that I really loved their music and their personalities, and that’s what drew me to them. I wish other people can see them as how I see them. Growing up with svt, I’ve watched them go from these boys who had to use earphones as in-ear monitors and recycled clothes for performances to these 13 successful yet humble men who are still gaining more popularity each day. I am now almost a junior in college and I’d just like to say thank you to seventeen for being with me this entire journey, and I promise I will be with them on their journey until the end. I seriously can’t imagine my life without seventeen. My love throughout the years has only grown especially throughout this pandemic.
SEVENTEEN, thank you for everything that you do for us carats (and cubics haha). I know you guys know how influential you are being well known kpop idols, but I seriously cannot describe how much you’ve impacted so many lives and how much of a blessing you all are. From your music, your bright personalities, and just your presence — you all are just truly heaven-sent. Thank you for staying with us all these years. Thank you for working so hard even though you’re tired. Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to just simply send messages on weverse. I wish everyone in the world can see how amazing you all are. I wish you more success in the future, and I know you all will get what you truly deserve in due time. If I could give you the universe, I would.
We love you so much, SEVENTEEN! We promise we’ll be with you until the last say the name. Happy 6th year anniversary 💖💙💎

Happy Anniversary untuk 13 bujang Seventeen 💕 selamat untuk kita (Sebong + Carat) udah sejauh ini pencapaian kita bersama,udah berbagai rintangan kita lalui bersama,walaupun aku gak stan dari awal,baru stan tahun 2017,but aku bener" tau gimana perjuangan kalian hingga saat ini seperti apa,sukses selalu untuk kalian,dan apapun yang terjadi ke depannya aku akan selalu mendukung kalian 🥰 emang gak ngerti lagi sayang banget sama semua member Sebong, aku multifandom but aku bener" lebih sayang sebong daripada yang lain,gak tau lagi kekeluarga mereka yang buat aku bener" sesayang itu sama Sebong,kekeluarga kita memang hanya Sebong dan carat yang tau bagaimana,gak pernah nyesel sekalipun udah stan dan sayang banget ke Sebong karena mereka bener" yang terbaik dan akan selalu menjadi yang terbaik 💕🥰

author: @rina4089
text:
Hai Seventeen, Aku salah satu dari jutaan Carat di dunia ini yang jatuh cinta dengan kalian

Tiada hari tanpa rasa terima kasih dan bersyukur telah mengenal kalian. Jujur setelah mengenal kalian dari 6 tahun yang lalu, kalian telah merubah hidupku, kalian membuatku bertahan dari kerasnya dunia ini. Terima kasih Seventeen telah hadir ke dalam hidupku, baru kali ini aku merasakan rasanya cinta dua arah, semua ketulusan yang kalian berikan untukku, semua kerja keras yang kalian lakukan untuk Carat. Aku rasa berucap Terima Kasih saja tidak cukup untuk membalas apa yang sudah kalian berikan. Tapi aku benar-benar berterima kasih atas semuanya (dan aku rasa beberapa Carat pun berfikir demikian).

Seventeen mari kita terus bersama selamanya, bahagia selamanya bersama-sama sampai kalian benar-benar mewujudkan konser diumur 60 tahun kan? Mari kita bertemu pada saat itu

Maaf aku tidak terlalu pandai mengungkapkan perasaanku apalagi merangkai kata kata indah. Tapi dari apa yang aku katakan diatas, aku hanya ingin kalian tahu bahwa aku benar benar bersyukur dan berterima kasih pada kalian (entah sudah berapa kali kata Terima Kasih ini terucap)

I really love you so much Seventeen, We love you so much and let's meet together in the future

Happy 6th Anniversary Seventeen

author: @lena_nguyen17
text:
Dear Seventeen,
I remembered the very first time I stumbled upon One Fine Day season 1 where Dino was ranking the members. I found it funny to see the chaos. Then I started to get into your music after seeing your performance in the KPOP Music Festival for 2016. Your performance was first. My first reaction was, “Wow how are they so talented?” Then I noticed that even when performing, you all had your fun even though on stage. Then Don’t Wanna Cry era came in and I was obsessed the with MV and the song itself, it’s still my favorite song this day. During this time, from December of 2016 to June of 2018, I felt lonely. In middle school a lot of people were bad influences and usually talked badly about me because of my smartness, even though they used me for it. But it didn’t feel all that lonely, because I had Seventeen there. Seventeen felt like a nice comfort in school. In high school, my first two years were horrible. I kept going through an in and out relationship with someone. In 2019-2020, I was thinking of suicide because I couldn’t handle the pain anymore. The person had hurt me so much I lost it. But your music and voices and the funny content in Going Seventeen really helped me cope. Thank you Seventeen for being a place I can run away to. For being a second home. Thank you for helping me realize I am more than just someone to be used. Thank you for giving me confidence to be me again. Happy 6 Years!

author: @biancanooraini744
text:
Dearest seventeen, my precious diamonds💎💖

Makasih banyak udah bertahan dan berkembang, melambung semakin tinggi, seiring berjalannya waktu gak berasa udah 6 tahun kita bersama. 

Mungkin aku belum bisa jadi carat yang terbaik, tapi fandom inilah rumah aku. Meskipun beberapa kali aku pergi menjauh tapi tetap pulangnya kesini. Cuma 13 manusia hebat nan kuat inilah yang bilang ke aku "terimakasih telah terlahir di dunia". Cuma dirumah inilah aku merasa seakan aku manusia yang sangat berharga untuk mereka.

Untuk keluargaku, carats. Semoga kita bisa terus bertahan, bersama sama kita bisa terbang lebih tinggi lagi. Tetaplah jadi carat yang terlalu sibuk mencintai seventeen untuk terlibat dalam konflik apapun. Kita fokus untuk saling menyayangi satu sama lain. 

Terimakasih banyak Seventeen dan semua orang yang terlibat dalam kelahirannya 13 berlian ini.

Let's make more beautiful memories in the future💖

author: @원-p2j
text:
누군가를 무조건적으로 6년이라는 시간 동안 좋아한다는 것은 결코 쉬운 일이 아니지만, 저는 6년이라는 시간 동안 단 한 순간도 세븐틴을 좋아한다는 것에 후회도, 부끄러움도 없었어요. 오히려 늘 자랑스러움과 감동, 깊은 유대감으로 하루하루 행복했답니다😊
지난 6년을 돌아보니 정말 이유 없이 벅찬 마음에 눈물이 나며 울컥하네요. 함께 하며 말로 다 표현하지 못할 만큼 행복했었던 순간, 함께 아파하며 성장했던 순간들 모두 돌이켜 보면 찬란했고 지금의 우리를 만들어주었다고 생각해요.
코로나로 인해 서로 마주본지 너무 오래되어 정말 표현할 수 없을 정도로 보고싶고 보고싶고 또 보고싶지만 자주 소통해주고 관객석이 빈 무대에서도 최선을 다하는 모습들에 지치지 않을 수 있는 것 같아요.
저는 세븐틴에게 원하는 모습이 없어요.
세븐틴이 하고 싶은 음악을 하고, 하고 싶은 퍼포먼스를 보여 주고, 하고 싶은 이야기를 한다면 그 모습이 정말 눈이 부시게 빛나니까요! 
많은 캐럿들이 그 모습들을 많이 사랑하고 있을 거라고 생각해요. 
그러니까 세븐틴은 세븐틴으로써 행복한 음악을 해주세요! 캐럿들은 늘 그 자리에서 응원하겠습니다!
언제 돌아봐도 그 자리에서 노래하던 세븐틴을 보았으니까요. 
말로 표현하지 못할 만큼 사랑하고 응원합니다.
2021년도 건강하게 활동합시다! 

자랑스러운 13명에게

author: @deboradeby2679
text:
Dear Seventeen 
from one of Carats Indonesia

Aku kenal kalian dari twitter pas tahun 2013 waktu tembok hijau dan kepoin kalian di SEVENTEEN TV haha udh lama bgt kan?  terus aku merasa bahwa aku harus STAN grup ini. Setelah 2 tahun berlalu, 2015 akhirnya kalian debut "ADORE U"  and immediately i'm adore them. Tapi karena kesibukan aku dan fokus ke terhadap yang lain tahun 2017 aku mulai rest dari kpop dan Seventeen. Setelah tidak terlalu addict dgn kpop dan lanjutkan kehidupanku sampai tahun 2020 saat Covid19 menyerang dan kebosanan menghadang, kalian dengan Going Seventeen  dan konten lainnya berhasil membuat ku semangat dan tertawa lepas tdk sperti sebelumnya,  kalian menarik aku KEMBALI kemana aku berada. 
SEVENTEEN THANK YOU FOR EVERY THING , YOU BRINGS A SMILE, HAPPINESS AND COURAGE FOR ME. 

HAPPY 6TH ANNIVERSARY.

author: @ihatereigen
text: Happiest 6th anniversary, angels :) You're truly something out of this world. Thank you for being each others family, thank you for being more family to me than anything else, ever. I hope you don't experience exhausting things you can't do anything about, and that no matter what happens, the thought of leaving each other will always be pushed far, far back and away. And I also hope, that if you do experience things you can't do anything about, you may overcome it. As Seventeen, or not as Seventeen, you deserve to be happy together. I hope that when you look at yourself, you see the person you've always wanted to become when you were a kid. And if not, I hope you see a person that you like right now, someone you're happy to be. No matter how difficult it gets, it's always going to be the thirteen of you. I just know it will.

author: @jazylgorembalem1591
text:
Time goes by so quickly. You've been making music for the past six years. I'm grateful that I was able to spend my youth with you and I'm thankful that I got to meet you all. From the moment I first became a carat until now, your music and performances have never failed to astonish me. You've spent many sleepless nights striving to become better at what you do. You guys are incredible.You are the most wonderful thing that has ever happened to me. You all helped me a lot, and a simple thank you isn't enough. Even after the last say the name seventeen, I will continue to back you and cheer you on. Thank you for bringing light and joy into my life. You guys are my lifelines.You guys grew up so well. It's been my happiest journey seeing you come so far. I hope we will be able to spend a long time together. We've been holding each other's hands for the past six years! Let's keep walking together, believing only in one another. 그리고 나는 너를 모두 너무 사랑해❤️.

HAPPY 6 YEARS MY BESTEST BOYS❤️!

author: @jiedeguzman9591
text:
Dear 세븐틴,

I honestly couldn't believe I would slip to diamond life.  So here's my story on how I even loved you more. It was November 2020 that time. As I was scrolling through my youtube, I discovered one of the episodes of GOSE and watched it out of curiousity. I find it interesting and fun until I started to watch every episodes, got to know your names, followed your social media accounts and even listened one of your songs. And then in a blink of an eye, I fell in love deeper and deeper. Listening to your songs makes me calm, relaxed, excite, lonely, nostalgic, and happy. All my life, I've never felt so amazed and captivated like that every time I think of you. I am so glad that I entered such a wonderful family-like-fandom and met 13 talented, handsome, humble, charismatic, funny, lovely and amazing boys. Although I'm just a new carat, I will do my best to support and love you.

Thank you for debuting, thank you for making songs and performances that inspired so many people around the world. Thank you so much and Happy 6th Anniversary.
 
Love, CARAT

text:
Mau bilang makasih sama seventeen, sebanyak banyak nya, kalo ditanya sama orang kalo ketemu seventeen mau ngomong apa pasti jawabnya makasih, makasih karena udah jadi suport sistem nya aku selama 3 tahun ini, kenapa tiga tahun aku ga nemenin seventeen dari awal mereka debut baru ikut nemenin seventeen sama carat yang lain pas tahun 2019, tapi baru 3 tahun stan kerasa banget rasa kasih sayang yang seventeen dan carat bagi, dimana hal ini bisa bikin aku nyaman untuk terus dukung seventeen, aku bener bener ngerasain kekeluargaan diantara seventeen dan carat, sampai aku mikir hubungan kita tuh antara idol dan fans atau keluarga.

Untuk seventeen, thank you for being born, terimakasih sudah menjadi seventeen, terimakasih sudah membuat banyak lagu yang memotivasi, yang bisa jadi suport sistem untuk ku, lagu lagu yang bisa menyemangati aku, terimakasih atas pengalaman, pelajaran yang kalian beri, terimakasih atas cinta yang selalu kalian beri untuk kami, carat

Seventeen, carat ayo kita terus berjalan bersama, ayo terus berkembang, terus berusaha menjadi lebih baik lagi, ayo terus saling menyayangi sampai waktu yang tak ditentukan

author: @caratdeul5234
text: Dear SEVENTEEN, thank you for being born. Thank you for existing. Even you didn't know that I'm existing on the universe, I hope you know that lot of people love you, and that includes me (a nobody in this universe). Thank you for saving me, thank you for being my support, thank you for making me smile, thank you for making me cry, thank you for letting me know how beautiful our life is. I love you, forever. Let's walk different paths together. We might be physically away from each other, I know that we're connected by love, and that's enough for me. I love you, not only seventeen times. As long as I'm existing, I will love you. ♡

author: @cintialantiraaragani6285
text:
Hi, ini aku Cintia Lantira. Makasih ya yang udah baca komenan ini, aku seneng banget dan bersyukur juga Allah SWT ngenalin aku SEVENTEEN. Aku sebelumnya ngalamin krisis, aku sempet down karena gak daftar ke SMA impian aku karena terhalang nilai, orang tua aku marah dan kecewa sama aku karena sebelumnya aku sering masuk top 10 seangkatan dan sewaktu nilai UN diumumin aku gak masuk top 10. Aku terpaksa masuk SMK. 

Untungnya setelah sebulan masuk SMK, aku tertarik SEVENTEEN dengan MV Hit yang muncul di beranda YouTube, setelah itu aku penasaran sama mereka. Akhirnya aku memutuskan untuk menjadi penggemar mereka. Banyak banget positif vibes selama aku suka mereka, aku jadi belajar mencintai diri sendiri, belajar tanggung jawab, perlahan pemikiran aku terbuka dan masih banyak lagi kok perubahan yang aku dapat.

Makasih ya SEVENTEEN udah jadi temen di masa remaja aku.

Makasih buat SEVENTEEN jadi penghibur dikala aku sedih dan terpuruk.

Makasih  buat SEVENTEEN bikin aku sembuh perlahan-lahan dari trauma-trauma yang aku alami.

Makasih buat SEVENTEEN jadi penyemangat aku ketika aku down karena ortu aku yang strict.

Makasih buat SEVENTEEN udah bikin aku jadi salah satu alasan untuk percaya diri.

Makasih juga buat CARAT, kalian juga sama halnya seperti SEVENTEEN.
Kalian itu berharga buat aku.

Dear Mingyu, makasih ya udah jadi support system aku. Moodbooster aku, cukup liat wajah kamu aja udah bangkitin semangat aku.

Aku udah suka SEVENTEEN dari Agustus 2019, sekarang Mei 2021.
Harapan aku, aku pengen banget nemenin kalian sampai kalian mencapai tujuan kalian.
Aku pengen tahu, sejauh mana aku masih seneng kalian.
Seandainya aku udah gak lagi ngefans kalian. Aku pengen kenangan kalian akan selalu aku ingat, karena kalian berharga buat aku.


Thanks for ur exictense, i love u so much. 

Dear S.COUPS, Jeonghan, Joshua, Jun, Hoshi, Wonwoo, Woozi, DK, Mingyu, The8, Seungkwan, Vernon, Dino. Kuharap kalian baik baik saja, lakukan yang terbaik bagi kalian, asalkan kalian tau, aku bangga sama kalian. Buat karya yang terbaik ya, kalian harus selalu ingat kalo ada CARAT yang selalu ada disisi kalian.

author: @3riiBerrii
text:
Oh gosh, where do I start? This is divine - so divine that I almost started crying with the amount of gratitude, love and appreciation I feel for both Seventeen and Carats. ;w;

Thank you for being my home and comfort for the last six years, and hopefully in a lifetime to come. You have helped me - and I'm sure many other Carats - through ups and downs. You inspire so many with your talents, artistry, personalities and collectiveness.

I'm so blessed to be part of Seventeen's journey amongst the Carat fandom; you're all super sweet and amazing! :D

Keep up the great work and shining like diamonds. We love you! 💕💖💗💞💝💓💌💎

text:
tumben bgt carat indo menuhin komentar dan semuanya bikin terharu. aku juga mau cerita sedikit, ini anniv sebong ke 2 buat aku sejak tahun lalu aku memutuskan menjadi carat jalur pandemi, aku mulai kenal sebong bulan april dan sebulannya lagi mereka anniv. disitu aku ngerasa kalo aku ngerasa nyaman sama SEVENTEEN dan juga CARAT. dilihat dari perbedaan anniv tahun lalu sm tahun ini sangat terasa berbeda, tahun lalu kita tertawa ngakak sama kelakuan mereka dan makin banyak inside jokes yg aku tau. tapi sekarang entah kenapa rasanya pengen mewek terus seharian, walaupun hari ini aku juga agak sibuk buat launching bisnis kecil ku, jdi gak bisa ikut hype di twitter tiap menit, tapi mereka lah yg bikin aku semangat di masa2 sulit seperti saat ini. 
maaf karena belum mengenal kalian jauh sebelum kalian masih di tembok hijau, maaf karena belum mengenal kalian di saat kalian berjuang di masa setelah debut hingga bisa seperti sekarang, tapi semoga aku bisa selamanya mengenal kalian dan menjadi rumah untukku hingga hari tua.

사랑해 세븐틴, 사랑해 캐럿들,  태어나 줘서 고마워🤍🤍🤍

author: @neclipsa8634
text:
to seventeen: 
son una parte importante en mi vida, sin ustedes no hubiera podido encontrar quien soy realmente, me guiaron y me motivaron a hacer cosas que no me atrevia, me hiceron ver que no me tiene que importar la opinión de los demás, me llenaron de alegría y estuvieron para mi en mis momentos mas oscuros, me sacan una sonrisa con solo verlos, escucharlos en tan solo un segundo.

estoy muy orgullosa de ustedes por todo lo que han tenido que pasar y sacrificar para llegar a donde estan ahora, han crecido demasiado, su música a tendido muchos cambios pero sin dejar ese estilo que le ponen a su música, estoy feliz de que estan cumpliendo sus sueños y todos sus logros, espero que esten felices y espero que sepan que el impacto de su música a salvado a muchas personas.
estoy agradecida de existir en la misma línea del tiempo que ustedes y espero que el destino nos cruce de nuevo en otra vida, gracias por existir.

author: @imcarathohoho6894
text:
Bagai bunga di ladang kering. 
Kalian hadir sebagai setangkai harapan yang dengan ajaibnya bisa ngebuat aku terbius percaya, bahwa kesuksesan itu selalu hadir bersama orang-orang yang selalu bekerja keras. 
Kalian yang buat aku yakin bahwa cinta selalu berjalan bersama tuannya, melewati segala cuaca mendung duka dan terang suka. 
Kalian yang dengan sederhana menunjukkan definisi dari keluarga dan sahabat adalah mereka yang selalu bersama entah di saat kalian jatuh, dan bergerak bangun untuk melanjutkan langkah. 
Kalian udah menjadikan guyonan ku yang awalnya tidak tercapai menjadi sangat receh. 
Kalian, SEVENTEEN, 13 orang bertalenta, 13 orang yang paling bersinar, 13 orang hebat yang bisa membuktikan bahwa menjadi idol bukan sekedar mencapai tonggak prestasi yang dibikin standar orang banyak, tetapi idol adalah siapa yang bisa menyampaikan pesan dan rasa lewat musik yang kalian buat. 
Makasi, udah berhasil membuat ruang kosong hati dan hariku menjadi penuh dengan kesedihan dan kegembiraan. 
Makasi, udah ngasi warna di hatiku yang sudah lama kosong tak berperasa. 

Happy 6th anniversary sebongieee, sehat sehat yaa, semoga tetap jadi setangkai bunga harapan buat carats<3

author: @kiwatheexplorer1537
text: Mau ikutan cerita juga dong hahaha. Waktu itu, gue lagi di kelas akhir dan mulai bingung harus lanjut kemana. Gue ikut tes dua kali dan gagal semua, sedih banget intinya, udah stress banget mau kaya gimana gue kedepannya nanti mau kaya apa, udahnya waktu itu keadaan ekonomi keluarga gue lagi anjlok-anjloknya ditambah ngebayar pendaftaran gue buat lanjut sekolah belum lagi adek gue yang masuk sekolah barengan. Kebiasaan lama gue buat nyakitin diri sendiri hampir aja keulang lagi kalau gue gak iseng buka youtube lihat mv Seventeen seliweran, akhirnya seharian itu gue puas-puasin nangis sambil nontonin video kalian. Energi gue berasa kaya balik lagi, ajaib banget gak sih? Wkwkwk, akhirnya gue nyoba buat gabung jadi carat dan gue ngerasa dapet support sistem yang bisa mendorong gue buat berjuang dikit lagi. Intinya sih, gue gak tau gue sekarang bakal kaya apa dan gimana kalau dulu gak iseng lihat kalian sih hahaha. Seventeen dan carat, gue mau ngucapin banyak terimakasih karena udah nyelamatin hidup gue dan ngewarnain hidup gue walaupun cuma dengan hal sekecil dan sesederhana itu. Sayang banget gue sama kalian, janji deh bakal bareng-bareng sampe akhir.

author: @バレンズエラメアリーグレース
text:
I've gotten to know Seventeen in 2016. My long time friend have already recommended SVT to me months prior but i didn't really checked them out bc i was already a long time fan of another group. 
One time I was in a bad headspace and was really down and confused about a lot of things (fandom related included). I wanted to  take all the negativity off and told myself I need a change. Then I remember my friend recommending Seventeen. So i listened to their 1st album 17carat and have enjoyed the songs. I remember I was on my commute home then. I have already enjoyed the first few songs from that album, then the last song "20" played... and I was just really overwhelmed  with feelings. I can't believe how a song can easily uplift my mood like that and it was my first time listening to it too. Since then, i started searching about them and watching their stuff. It is easier to catch up then bc they only had like one full album and 2 singles but it never mattered to me even if i just kept repeating the same 20+ songs. I love listening to them and I love the feeling of joy and comfort they are giving me thru their songs. Eventually they released more songs and contents and I ended up being a full blown Carat. I started with 2nd gen official membership, I still am a Carat to this day. And seeing them accomplish more things thru their passion and hardwork, it makes me so so proud of them. I hope they can achieve even bigger dreams in the future. And I promise to be a Carat helping in their journey then. 💓 happy anniversary my loves.

author: @ShavinaPutriFronatics
text: to my dearest, my home, my seventeen, my never-ending crush, my comfortable place, my everything. your existence is nothing less than a miracle itself, and i am most grateful for it. it strenghten me, even when my life is full of atrociousness in it. i've never felt this in love towards someone else, indeed this kind of feeling was scarcely general for me to feel towards someone. and once again i'm so thankful that this kind of feelings of course towards you guys, kept me alive. no one in the world would know how to describe in words, how thankful i am to know your presence. we may not in the same place, but i bet our hearts are. i hope this pandemic will end soon, and hoping to get the opportunities to meet you in the same place eventually. i'm still waiting, and i'm not tired, not ever. please do be healthy and take good care and give yourselves lots of love and encouragement because you guys deserve it so much. thank you for everything, i couldn't write enough of how much i am grateful, but let's walk on this flowery paths together, intertwine our fingers and never let go. last but not least, thank you for making me the happiest woman alive. most ardently, i love you💖

author: @raflinadenis8230
text:
Dear seventeen, makasih buat nemenin masa remaja aku, sekarang, atau nanti dan dalam hitungan bulan lagi aku udah dewasa. Dan moga aja bisa nemenin sampai dewasa.

Tau ga sih? Kalian tuh salah satu sumber buat aku biar tetep kuat. Aku gatau kalau ga ketemu kalian bakal gimana? Mungkin kalau ga ada kalian aku udah nyerah aja di dunia. Kalian salah satu alasan aku senyum walau sebenernya ga baik-baik aja.

Banyak bahagia ya boys! Kalian harus tau, di luar sana banyak yang jadiin kalian sumber alasan untuk kuat jalanin hidup, termasuk aku. Tetep bahagia terus yaaa.... <3

Makasih udah nemenin aku sampai sejauh ini sampai aku lupa apa itu capek, lelah, sedih, insecure, dll. Thank you for being the reason i smile. <3

author: @visupilami
text:
Gửi Seventeen của tớ, 
Tuy tớ đã không đồng hành cùng với các cậu ngay từ thời debut, tớ chỉ vừa mới biết các cậu khoảng 2 năm thôi, nhưng tình cảm của tớ đối với các cậu thì đếm không xuể luôn. Tớ từng nhớ tớ đã mất tận 2 ngày để học hết tên các cậu. Bài đầu tiên tớ nghe là Don't Wanna Cry. Tớ hối hận khi không biết đến các cậu sớm hơn, nhưng tớ không hối hận vì đã stan các cậu đâu vì tớ gặp Seventeen ở thời điểm mà tớ cần nhất. Nay đã 6 năm rồi, hi vọng các cậu ngày càng thành công và nhớ giữ sức khỏe nha, tớ vẫn sẽ ở bên các cậu. ❤️
*SAY THE NAME, SEVENTEEN*

author: @princessmaellevares8477
text: It was the summer of 2016 when I met these beautiful and amazingly multitalented people. It was not intended, no one introduced them to me. I just somehow found their video in my cousin's gallery, it was like we were soulmates. It was meant to happen. At first I thought, "Oof, Kpop? Meh," I admit, I was really not into Kpop before. I just did not like them, and I did not even know why. But when I clicked their videos and listened to their songs "Pretty U" and "Adore U", I immediately liked them. The first member that attracted my attention was Jun. Then, I became even more curious about them. I watched mor of their videos. Even paused in the middle of it just to count the members, making sure if there were really seventeen memb or not HAHAHAHAHA. I started to download their videos and songs, and listen to them 24/7. Even tried singing with them, practicing my Korean skills HAHAHAHAHA. And before I could knew it, I was already into the Diamond Life. I also want to give gratitude to my friend who kept me updated, hyped, and crazy over Seventeen. She really was a big factor in my fangirling life. SEVENTEEN is my first love in Kpop, while CARAT is my first fandom. Both will forever and will always be my home, until my last.

author: @cha-yiwang9408
text:
Seeing my co-carat shared their story on how they met Seventeen, I had the urge to share mine, too. Hehe
So, it all started when Seventeen's Left and Right Mafia Dance on Dingo's channel played next. I was actually watching NCT Dream's We Go Up Mafia Dance. Without hesitation, I started the video and I remembered laughing all the time. They were hilarious and funny. Apart from it, I can see the sincerity of their friendship and the strong bond they have from the video. I may not know them very well at that point, but, there's this connection that I felt, a tingling feeling in my heart. I mean, I mean it. From then on up until today, their 6th year in the industry, I still shine as their diamond.^^ 

Dear Seventeen,
You have been one of my comfort. Your songs are very sincere that though I play it everytime, I'm still having goosebumps. God bless y'all!

HAPPY ANNIVERSARY 6th SEVENTEEN 🥰
Thank you for coming

thank you for taking my hand that time, when I was really vulnerable and wanted to kill myself. thank you for making me laugh in the middle of my life burden which is very heavy. Thank you for giving me a chance to rest through your Semicolon; album. Thank you for holding me. thank you you guys made me learn to love myself.
Thank you very much, 13 men for working hard for Carat, making the best for Carat, your work is not in vain, our Seventeen is making songs not only for Carat but for all young people who cannot try to love themselves.
keep being Seventeen in the following year, keep being OT 13 which if the members decrease by 1 it will look imperfect (13 + 3 + 1 = Seventeen)

Saythename! Seventeen !! 😍💗

Terimakasih karena telah terlahir kedunia, terima kasih karena telah memilih jalan yang membuat kalian bersama, terima kasih karena  selalu ada buat kami (carat), terimakasih karena kalian selalu kuat, terima kasih  sudah menyebarkan begitu banyak cinta dan kasih sayang untuk kami. Terima kasih karena telah membuat kami tersenyum dan tertawa ketika melihat ke layar ponsel. author: @bootifullperson6656
text:
Happy Anniversary kalian!! Inget kalian tuh berharga banget buat banyak orang diluar sana termasuk aku❤ mungkin kalian gak tau, tapi kalian rasanya udh deket banget, kayak udah jadi penyemangat, inspirasi, tempat ternyaman buat aku. Bahkan kadang rasanya kalian tuh udah jadi temen deketku dan gak jarang juga I feel like a mom who is proud of her sons.

Sesayang itu sama kalian. Dan aku harap kalian tetep tau bahwa banyak orang yang selalu dukung kalian disini terutama carats <3

Aku harap juga kalian (seventeen) yang udh jadi keluarga ini, tetep ada buat satu sama lain. Persahabatan kalian berharga banget, jadi terus bareng yaa. Aku percaya sama kalian dan kalian juga harus percaya carat ada buat kalian. Sampai besok kalian punya kehidupan kalian sendiri, aku tetep akan inget kalian sebagai bagian dari masa mudaku.

author: @Bil889
text:
Terimakasih buat sebong yang udah hadir di hidup aku, jadi salah satu sumber kebahagiaan juga. 

Mau cerita dikit, aku jadi carat era clap tapi sempet gak ngikutin sebong lagi hampir 2 tahun dan sekarang balik jadi carat lagi di tahun 2020 kemarin karena kepoin Joshua lagi dan lanjut nonton konten going svt. Dan sekarang udah 2021, katanya 2022 kontrak mereka habis 😭 tapi aku berharap mereka memperpanjang kontrak dan bisa terus sama-sama sama carat. Aku yakin kok carat, mereka pasti perpanjang kontrak😭

Sekali lagi terimakasih Sebong 💎💎 selamat ulang tahun yang ke 6 tahun❤️ Carat selalu ada untuk kalian begitu pun juga dengan kalian terimakasih 💎💎🥕🥕🥕❤️❤️

Btw komennya pada Indonesia semua makin berasa harunya 😭

author: @-AndiMaharaniFitriana-A-
text:
surat terbuka teruntuk carat (fandom terbaikku🥰)  

Carat akhirnya udh 6 tahun kita nemenin seventeen. Sekarang mereka udh  melambung tinggi. Semakin tinggi semakin kencang juga anginnya bukan? Semakin banyak org yg menilai tanpa tau kenyataannya, semakin banyak pula org yg iri kanrena pencapaian kita. Tapii carat harus tetep jadi carat yang apa adanya. Carat yang bakal ada dibarisan paling depan untuk sebong dalam keadaan apa pun. Carat yang bobrok dan tentu carat yang selalu mau dijadikan badut untuk sebong. Tidak ada kata berakhur untuk kita, seventeen dan carat,  karena kita adalah keluarga. Sampai kapan pun akan tetap seperti itu. Keabadian adalah hal yang mustahil tapi ikatan seventeen dan carat itu abadi. There is no the last say the name there’s only see you next time🥰❤️🤡✨ 

Kostum badutnya jgn lupa kakak

author: @shawnvenyzfrancisco4069
text:
I posted last night that I've only been with you for a short time. Wasn't there in the beginning and althrough out the years. I feel like I don't deserve to feel the love you are showing but I think you came into my life in the most perfect time. When I needed you the most. When I was lost, you found me. And I thank your for that. 1 year, 6 years, 10 years and even in 100 years, I'll be here. Haven't been sure of anything lately, but I'm sure of staying with you. 

In my language you are called

"Aking Tahanan" because you are 'my home'

 "Aking pahinga" because you are 'my rest'

"Ligtas ako sa piling mo" because "with you I feel the safest". 

🤍

author: @elaiza4932
text:
Thank you so much for this wonderful music! Thank you Seventeen. 💗

Happy 6th Anniversary to us! First of all, I wanted to say thank you for all the love and support you are constantly giving to carats. May the bright paint colors your life sebongie because you'll deserve all that and more. I wish you'll good health, happiness, wealth, and success. Also, I truly believe that you'll are very talented in every aspect that you all have shown us so far, and I wish you the best at everything you do! I also hope your days are always filled with love! please don't forget to take care of yourself and stay safe! hopefully one day SEVENTEEN will be able to come again to the Philippines. I love you, and again, take care. I am proud that seventeen remained firm to their brand. Despite the risk they face every time they release new music, they chose to focus on expressing their thoughts & feelings and dedicate the message to their fans, carats. I will always love you Sebongie, until forever. Thank you for inspiring us to do our best, thank you for giving us so much happiness. You make my day.

text:
세븐틴이 우리에게 항상 웃게하는 기쁨이라 위로가 되는 편지를 보내줘서 고마워.
작은 사랑이라고 하지만 우리는 너무 큰 사랑을 받고있다고 느끼고 있어. 매일이 행복해.
세븐틴이 우리의 곁에 늘 함께하듯 캐럿들도 늘 세븐틴의 곁에서 함께 있을게.
고개 숙여 울 땐 기대어 울 수 있는 든든한 품이, 추운 겨울지나 만날 따뜻한 봄이, 까만 하늘에 반짝이는 빛이, 비 내리는 날엔 비를 피할 우산이 되어줄게.
우리의 작은 사랑들이 모여 서로에게 큰 위로와 사랑이 되는 따뜻한 봄이길 바라.

author: @Aya-jx5fk
text: My heart is full of your love. It is totally enlarged that I feel like I am floating in cloud nine. When I discovered you guys, I thought that you guys might be interesting boy group and I stand corrected. Entering the carat life is one of the best things that I have ever done. Not one group that I had stan have ever made me feel this happy, content, and even felt treasured by you guys. The love that you showered us carats may be in general but it never once felt like that. Every 'I love you', 'take care', 'we miss you', 'see you', and 'be safe' never felt so fake. Every fiber of my being tremble each time you guys say those words to us. I may not be one of your best supporters out there, but I truly appreciate and love what you guys are doing. Your music gave me the strength every time I am down, gave me joy in my lonely days, and gave me the love everyday. Happy Anniversary SVT! Until the last 'Say the name' even after that I will be supporting you guys! :))))))

text: Punya banyak member itu pasti sulit bgt, dtambah mereka dari agensi kecil, pasti bakal banyak bgt konflik yg terjadi, bayangin aja orang yg beda² latar belakang & kepribadian harus tinggal di 1 tempat; tapi sebong berhasil bertahan sampai sekarang, mereka ga nganggap member sebagai rekan kerja doang, mereka bener² nganggep member sebagai keluarga, mereka saling dukung & saling melengkapi & saling menerima kekurangan, mereka pun ngelakuin hal yg sama ke carat, seventeen ga nganggap carat itu cm sekedar fans, seventeen bener² ngerangkul & menjadikan carat seperti bagian dari keluarga mereka. Carat juga, aku bahagia banget menjadi bagian dari fandom ini, walau mungkin kita belum pernah bertemu langsung tapi kalian bener² kaya keluarga kedua ku❤ carat seventeen semoga ke depannya apapun yg bakal kita lalui, kita bisa sama² terus, bahagia terus, dan saling support satu sama lain🥺 sayang banget sama seventeen carat💙💖💎

author: @aureliaasilah
text: Seventeen, makasih banget udah nemenin dari 2015🥺🥺 bener2 selama itu kenal sama mereka ga nyesel ngestan mereka selama ini. Bener2 ngerasa punya keluarga baru, orang2 yg bisa selalu ngehibur dan nyemangatin through up and down. Ga kerasa banget udah sejauh ini, makasi buat semua lagu indah dan memory indah yg udh kalian dan kita bangun sama2. Semoga kedepannya bakalan bareng2 terus ya apalagi sampe kalian semua udah nikah🥺 ato aku yg duluan nikah nanti gatau, kalian bakalan jd cerita indahku yg kuceritain ke orang kl pernah sayang kalian segini banyak, gamau hilang dan makin tumbuh tiap harinya ke kalian. Until the last say the name, let’s stay together, seventeen🥺🥺❤️

author: @latteneunmaliya3289
text:
Happy 6th birthday seventeen♡
Ga nyangka udah 6 tahun sejak aku ketemu kalian pertamakali di tahun 2015. Dalam 6 thn ini aku menyaksikan kalian tumbuh. Dari kelahiran carat, pengumuman warna fandom, 1st win pertama kalian, 1st rookie award, sampe daesang pertama kalian. Seventeen itu kayak bagian dr masa remajaku wkwk. Kalian udah spt teman  dan keluargaku. Tiap lihat mv lama kalian tuh rasanya 'gila, sekarang udah gede mereka' wkwkwkwk

Tapi ada 1 hal yg bener2 ga berubah dari kalian. Passion dan semangat kalian diatas panggung kalian g pernah luntur dan pasti PASTI tiap cb baru ada aja yg bikin kaget.

Aku bener2 bersyukur udah menjadi carat, semoga kedepannya (10thn, 20thn, 30thn? Wkwk)  kita bisa terus melangkah bersama ya. Kalau kalian lelah, boleh kok istiharat.

Thank you for being my youth, i love you.

this is my first year as a carat. ah a little sorry I didn't know you guys first. You guys are not the only group that I like, but somehow I feel afraid of losing you. I feel you are too precious to me. I've never felt this in any group. I'm too afraid of losing you guys, I don't know how my feelings have changed a lot lately. by listening to your songs I can cry. I really really like your song. Thank you so much for composing a song that inspires me a lot. we really love you, so take care of your health wherever you are. I hope the world gets better soon, and you can meet Carat directly. we love you so much! 😭😭❤

author: @heoxuang3037
text:
A-aku gak nangis kalian tuh yang nangis 😭

Aku gak pandai ngungkapin perasaanku tapi sumpah aku sayang banget sama kalian, sayang Seventeen, sayang carat. Kalian cinta pertama aku di dunia KPop dan akan selalu begitu. Jujur, aku belum pernah ngestan grup sampai bisa bikin aku sesayang ini kecuali SEVENTEEN. Biarpun suka oleng sana sini tetap kalian yang jadi rumah tempatku pulang. Di fandom inipun satu satunya fandom yang memang bikin aku nyaman.

Terima kasih banyak atas kerja keras kalian. Terima kasih udah bikin kami bahagia selama 6 tahun ini bahkan lebih yaa hehe. Kami akan selalu berusaha membalas semua kerja keras kalian. So, Happy 6th Anniversary SEVENTEEN don't forget to be happy <3 your happiness is our happiness too

author: @buildarocket.
text:
Happy 6th anniversary to you guys! it has been 6 years since you successfully made your debut, it has been a long journey for you and carat, i wish we could be together for a long long time, lets be happy together, and stay together for a long time! you are one of the most successful korean boygrup in the industry now, amazing, right? thank you for all your hard work, as a carat, we will work hard too, to make you more successful and to make you more known, thank you for the happiness, and the comforts you gave me through your songs, your contents, and everything. actually seeing a picture of you is already giving me comfort and happiness. thank you for everything you have done for me/us(carat) until the day we meet again, stay healthy, stay happy, stay safe, and lets walk in the flowery path, but, i'll walk with you through the rocky road too, i'll support and cheering for you til the end, i love you so much,
happy anniversary, SEVENTEEN💎💖💙

text:
6년 짧다면 짧고 길다면 긴 이 시간들 동안 너무 고생많았어. 지금까지의 길들이 순탄하지는 않았지만 잘 이겨내고 달려와 줘서 너무 고마워.
13명에서 세븐틴 이라는 이름으로 한 무대에 오를때 가장 멋있는거 알지? 앞으로도 너희의 길을 환히 밝혀줄테니 너희는 서로를 믿고 저위까지 날아 올라야돼! 
먼 훗날 다 떨어지게 되더라도 우리 6년이라는 시간은 잊지 말자. 서로 사랑하고 아끼고 고마워 했던 감정은 잊지말자. 너희가 걸을 길이 평생 언제나 찬란하길.

author: @horangisvault4121
text:
Dear SEVENTEEN,

Stanning you guys was the BEST decision I've made ever. I never imagined life could be even more beautiful and lovely. Thank you for giving me the love and comfort the world seems to rob off of me. I wonder how I could ever live without you. You've become my necessity, and the meaning of life itself. I will not promise, because promises are meant to be broken, but I will always, always be there for you, like how you guys would for us, too. Afterall, we're your SEVENTEEN carats! For this 6th Anniversary, I just wish you all evergreen happiness, and good health. I wish you all the best. If I could give you everything, I would, no joke.

author: @diniadwim9155
text:
Seeing so many carats write their story/thoughts makes me wanna do the same. If I'm being honest, I really don't know what the reason I can become a Carat, like suddenly I slip into diamond life without hesitation. I came to you when you were 4 years old, in 2019. In 2019, so many things happened to me, from the happiest thing to the worst thing (me and my best friends had the fighting at that time, maybe 3 months of fighting? Really). I have anxiety, but I listen to your songs that healed me, made me a better person, friend, and sister. I've been in a fandom before Carat, but in this fandom, it's so comfortable, meet so many carats, talk with them, carats, thank you for always being who you are, I love you, thank you for always supporting our boys, let's always support them until the last say the name. 
And to our boys, sebong, thank you for everything, keep doing what you like, because your happiness is ours too. We love you so much, thank you for coming to Carat's life ♡♡

author: @메이라K
text:
HAPPY 6TH ANNIVERSARY to this 13 wonderful guys, I became carat in this past few months and they already become a comfort place for me. I was at my lowest when I came across their music, just by hearing their voices suddenly I felt fine as if I  never felt bad all these times, this feeling was so new for me,cause after so long I felt it, for once I was okay for real.  I've found comfort in each smile of them,they are really precious for me, since they gave me back that strength that I thought to have already lost. I was so unmotivated before I found them, but they made me realize, I can do it, it take too long maybe to raise again but after so many tries I success
this 13 guys and carat really mean so much for me, thank you! Your guys presence in enough for me. And always remember, you can do it!
(sorry for my bad English)

author: @starrydaisy
text: I can't even explain my love for Seventeen seriously. They helped me with their music when I was at my lowest. The fact that I managed to go to one of the concerts in 2017 (Diamond Edge) is such an amazing experience and I got to feel how it's like to hear your songs in real life. Your songs are so comforting and I find myself listening to you guys every single day without fail. I'm so happy to say I was a Carat since 2015. Thank you for being born and thank you for everything that you do for us. What a blessing you guys are and I can't believe it's already been 6 years. I love you guys <3

author: @anarafi54
text:
Here's the english translation to make you cry more~

My love only amounts to this, 
Hi, my joy, 
Even in my deep despairs, 
You always make me smile by my side, 
It makes me momentarily forget about everything, 
Turn on a song we know and take one step, 
We hold hands and our feet [move] two step, 
Before I know it, 
You make today’s me look forward to tomorrow’s you. 

Baby it’s alright, Oh it’s okay,
Because it’s only you who knows all my lies, 
O ah I’m more thankful, 
When I often see you tired with your head down, 
Me, who doesn’t know what to do,
What can I possibly do? 
I’m sincerely sorry. 

My love only amounts to this, 
But thank you for staying by my side, 
My baby, 
Even if my love only amounts to this,  
I’ll be your spring during any winter,  
My heart can only say these words. 

Like a meteor shower, 
Be a light in the dark sky, 
I can do everything for you, 
I only have a big heart that wants to give you everything,
Me, who has become pathetic ,
I’m a fool who only receives, 
At some point, 
I started hating myself, 
I’m even more apologetic towards you.

Baby it’s alright, Oh it’s okay,
Because it’s only you who knows all my lies, 
O ah I’m more thankful, 
When I often see you tired with your head down,
Me, who doesn’t know what to do, What can I possibly do? 
I’m sincerely sorry.

My love only amounts to this, 
But thank you for staying by my side, 
My baby, 
Even if my love only amounts to this, I’ll be your spring during any winter, 
My heart can only say these words,

Although it’s just this song and lyrics, which contain my feelings that I wrote down with difficulty, 
For you for you for you for you, 
I sing this song for you tonight,
So that I can get closer to your love ...

My love only amounts to this, 
But my heart won’t change,
It’s only for you baby, 
Even if my love only amounts to this,
I’ll be your umbrella when it rains, 
I’ll protect you throughout all your days...

author: @Gathariaa
text:
Uwa.. banyak Carat yang curhat, aku ikutan juga deh

SEVENTEEN!! Terimakasih banyak sudah hadir di kehidupanku ^^
Jika saja aku tidak mempedulikan temanku ketika dia mengenalkan ku kepada Seventeen mungkin aku bukan Carat sekarang. Aku itu mulfand, tetapi pas sama Seventeen tuh kayak beda. Serasa memang ditakdirkan untuk mengagumi kalian sedalam ini. Kalian itu kayak punya aura yang menenangkan dan bisa membuat Carat bahagia hanya dengan kedatangan kalian. Sampai sampai aku pernah berpikir, apakah kalian itu benar benar manusia atau bukan? karena hanya eksistensi mu saja sudah membuat orang orang di seluruh dunia senang.

Aku merasa sangat beruntung bisa bertemu kalian, sangat beruntung sampai aku mau berterima kasih di depan kalian secara langsung walaupun aku masih kecil dan belum mempunya uang yang cukup hanya untuk bertemu kalian.

I love you so much like my heart will burst into maximal happines TT

author: @farahfauziyyah3382
text: Kurang bersyukur apasih kenal sama kalian? Kalian keren banget, hebat banget, tangguh banget, cantik banget, indah banget, just a wholesome 13 person with different personalities. Makasih banget udah hadir, special thanks buat youtube karena video anniversary kalian tahun lalu muncul di beranda dan aku cuma asal klik tapi aku enjoy banget???? Makasih udah nguatin aku lewat musik, guyon, gombal, sama hebohnya kalian. Makasih udah hadir. Makasih udah lahir. Makasih udah ada dan terus berkarya sampe sekarang. Makasih karna kalian nggak nyerah, aku juga gamau nyerah. Makasih karena kalian, wah gila, gue ternyata se-berlian ini. Makasih udah nggak main main ngasih nama kita yang nggak bisa di duplikatin apapun. Nanti, aku bakal dengan bangganya bilang aku Carat karena idolku bener-bener se talented dan se murni ini. Once again, thank you Seventeen.

author: @nadyaray.s799
text:
One of my friend once said that Seventeen won't last long because they have a lot of members. She said it in 2017, but... Look... It's 2021 now and she's wrong.  Seventeen has never lost a single member and has remained 13 for 6 years since they debuted.

For my Lovely Seventeen,
Thank you, Seventeen, for becoming Seventeen. Thank you, Seventeen, for standing and staying there for us. Thank you, Seventeen, for becoming my strength whenever I want to give up. I said thank you. I love you all.  You are my home, my beloved home.

And, for my Beloved CARAT,
Thank you for all of your support. Thank you for being on my side. Thank you for staying here for our Seventeen. Thank you, I said Thank You. I love you all, CARAT, my lovely and beloved home.


For Seventeen and CARAT from all over the world,
Let's stay together untill the last *Say The Name* ✨


Terima kasih, Seventeen
Terima kasih, CARAT
Aku mencintai kalian semua ❤️

author: @sarcasmilk8582
text: I'm a new carat and I'm really grateful for knowing SVT. These past few months have been really hard for me. I slowly can't remember the things that used to make me feel happy. I'm trying to get better, but sometimes it's just so exhausting to try and fail over and over again. But ever since I knew all of you, I've been feeling much better. Y'all always make me laugh and cry in joy. The effort y'all and the staffs put into everything y'all do is seriously awesome. Even "awesome" is not enough to describe it. Your hard work makes me realize that there's still a hope inside me. A hope to survive, to enjoy living this life, to watch y'all grow and grow together with y'all. Please stay safe, healthy, and hydrated. May your day be filled with happiness and joy. We love y'all <3

author: @indahwahyuningrum4349
text:
Ganteng banget kenapa sih.. 

Buat sebongkuuu, happy anniv yaaa. Makasih banyak udah ada di dunia ini, kalian tuh salah satu alasan aku ketawa tau nggak, makasih ya udah menghiburkuu. Aku nggak nyesel deh kenal kalian, ada kebanggaan tersendiri buatku. Bahagia terus yaaa SEPEUNTINNNN hehe, CARAT juga bahagia terusss, jangan sedih-sedih. Berharap bisa ketemu seventeen di dunia nyata, tunggu aku sih pokoknya sampe aku punya duit lebih-lebih buat ketemu kalian. Sampai jumpa di konser lah pokoknya hehe, mimpi dulu lah ya. Ohya mau cerita sedikit, mungkin saking berharganya kalian, nih aku berharap kalo sampe ada kehidupan selanjutnya yang kayaknya ga mungkin, tp berandainya sih pengen nyempil di antara kalian sebonggg, soalnya kalo ngegame seru banget huhu. Pengen ikutan terus kalo nonton gose. Pokoknya makasih dehh hiburan kaliannnn. Aku sih berharapnya kalian langgeng terus sampe punya anak, hehe~~

author: @bintangsanjaya9779
text:
Hi. Actually, I don't know if the English words are true or not. I don't know if you're gonna read my comments or not. But, thank you so much for giving us so much love. I don't expect much. We just hope you're always happy, always healthy. Whatever happens, we fans will support you. Thank you so much for accompanying us for the last six years. Happy birthday to you, sixth Seventeen. I hope everything will be forever.

사실, 저는 한국어 단어들이 사실인지 아닌지 모르겠어요. 당신이 내 댓글을 읽을지 안 읽을지 모르겠어요. 하지만 많은 사랑을 주셔서 정말 감사합니다. 별로 기대하지 않아요. 우리는 당신이 항상 행복하고 항상 건강하길 바랄 뿐이에요. 어떤 일이 있습니다도 저희 팬분들이 응원하겠습니다. 지난 6년간 저희와 동행해 주셔서 정말 감사합니다. 여섯 번째 세븐틴의 생일을 축하합니다. 모든 것이 영원하길 바랍니다.

author: @juliacarat
text:
Happy 6th anniversary dear seventeen !
I am really sorry that I wasn't here since day one but I promise I will be here until the very end :)
You are probably not going to ever read this and I know that but I want you guys to know that you are my one and only inspiration, I learnt a lot of things from you and I must say I love and appreciate my family much more than before because of you.
Hug, smile flower, us again and so many of your songs can always make me feel better even when I am facing very hard times.
In fact seventeen can make me cry, laugh, smile and even scream with even as little as a picture or a short video.
I even started learning Korean just because you got me to like this language :)
From the bottom of my heart I want you to know that I love you and I will support you forever and always, thank you so much for those 6 beautiful years, let's continue this journey together ^~^

author: @fayethalia9258
text:
Reason why SEVENTEEN will last long;

1. SEVENTEEN is the concept. They're just being themselves to be in any concept. they CHOOSE it. Most reason why alot of group (not just kpop) disband is because they're losing themselves inside the group n become toxic for each other.

2. Self produce. Like, REALLY self producing so much content. They're making a lot of decision within all the members in creative side. Even at the start it's feel burdensome, now that's really a privileged.

3. TALENT. This video just tiny little prove of how talented they are.

4. The Bond. Chemistry with each other members, *chefkiss! we all know practically they're family now. Even in the future, when they're go separate ways to pursue their own dreams, family will always be together💙 

So, here's to many more years to come SEVENTEEN and CARAT!🥂🎉


p.s : this is just my opinion, add some if you like!😊 Also, wanna thank to pledis entertainment to found this 13 gems together and make them shine bright like a diamond now!

author: @aihara3463
text:
It's only my thought but As much as I love Seventeen and I hope they become so much bigger than now, still (in deep my heart more than that) I just wish they can shine this beautifully enough for a long long time.  And I just wish we can love them this naturally enough as we are like now. Where we can enjoy their music happily without too much burden and greedy for such acknowledgment, achievement, etc. 

Don't take me wrong, I said it first, ofcourse I want they become bigger too, but let it be in natural ways. Since I have no doubt about Seventeen's Qualities and Hardwork, so I believe they only will be bigger and bigger in future...

author: @aparajitapal7834
text: Seventeen and carats love for each other will never be enough. The pandemic separated us physically but I truly believe that carats will always have seventeen because of their songs and other contents. Seventeen is talented, not just in terms of singing, dancing and rapping but also in their ability to feel like a warm blanket on a cold winter night. Seventeen always surprise us. They motivate us to do better, to make our own decisions and follow our dreams and to take a break when there is too much. I myself didn't stan them from the beginning but that does not matter. I found them and I promise that I won't leave till the last say the name. Seventeen, you make my dawn and my day. You protect us and we protect you. I am proud of Seventeen and proud to be a carat. Our futures are truly indefinite but whatever is instore for us, you make the journey beautiful. And no matter what happens, we will meet again.

author: @iWOOAHAEyou
text:
세븐틴 6주년 정말 축하해요🎉
사실 어떤 말을 해야 세븐틴에게 내 마음이 전부 전해질까 고민했어요. 결국 돌아오는 답은 그저 세븐틴이 되어줘서 고맙다는 말 밖엔 할 수 있는 말이 없더라구요. 순영오빠 말대로 정말 새로운 단어를 만들어야하나?ㅋㅋ

세븐틴이 지내온 2193일 중에 내가 함께한 날은 겨우 616일 밖에 되지 않아 미안하고 늦은만큼 더 사랑하고 아낍니다. 우리 앞으로 우리가 함께할 날은 무한하니까 걱정하지말고 웃음꽃만 피웠으면 좋겠어요. 

물론 우리의 시간들 속에 모두 꽃길만 있지는 않겠지만 세븐틴과 함께라면 불구덩이 속을 걸어도, 더 이상 나아갈 곳이 나락 밖에 없다 해도 행복할 것 같아요.
언제 이만큼이나 세븐틴이 소중해졌는지도 잘 모르겠어요.

이젠 정말로 세븐틴이 없으면 안될 것 같아요.
내 생애 중에 이렇게까지 마음을 쏟아부운 것도 처음이고, 누군가 때문에 긴 기다리고, 참아온 것도 모두 세븐틴이 처음이에요. 내 모든 일의 처음이 되어줘서 너무 고마워요.
이제부터는 내가 세븐틴의 처음을 함께했으면 하는 바램입니다.

우지오빠 말처럼 우리의 시간들은 추억이 되어 잔향만이 남겠죠? 하지만 중요하지 않을 수도 있는 그 잔향조차 소중하게 느껴지는 건 전부 세븐틴이 있기 때문이에요.

내가 말을 잘 못해서 이 글도 횡설수설하고 문장조차 잘 맞지 않아요. 그래서 이 점에 내 진심이 가려질까 불안하기도 합니다. 이 모든 단어 하나하나가 진심이에요.

세븐틴, 내 어두운 삶에 환한 빛이 되어줘서 고마워요.
거짓되었던 내 웃음을 진실된 웃음으로 만들어줘서 고마워요.
내가 세븐틴을 알지 못했다면 우린 절대 인연이 될 수 없었을텐데, 내 앞에 나타나줘서 고마워요.
내가 절망 속에 빠져서 잠겨갈 때 날 꺼내줘서 고마워요.
이젠 내가 그 역할을 했으면 좋겠네요 :)

우리 세븐틴! 아프지 말고, 캐럿 생각보다 본인 생각을 더 해주고, 무리하지 말고, 다치지도 말고 늘 웃음만 짓고 살아가기를 빌겠습니다. 다시한번 6주년 정말 축하하고, 
승철, 윤정한, Joshua Jisoo Hong, 文俊輝, 권순영, 전원우, 이지훈, 徐明浩, 김민규, 이석민, 부승관, Hansol Vernon Chew, 이(중)찬이라는 이름으로 내 앞에 나타나 뭐서 고마워요. 세븐틴 캐럿하나가 정말 많이 사랑합니다. 고맙습니다.

author: @caratdeobi2094
text:
Untuk member SEVENTEEN, terimakasih udah ada dan hadir sebagai SEVENTEEN. 
Menjadi Carat adalah salah satu keputusan yg sama sekalipun ga akan aku sesali dalam hidup. Karena seberuntung itu, rasanya bukan hanya punya kalian sebagai idol ku tapi punya kalian sebagai temen bahkan sahabat yang semangatin dan ngerti perasaan aku lewat lagu kalian, bikin aku ketawa lewat tingkah kalian, dan bikin aku terharu juga lewat surat kalian. 
Kalian berhasil ngealihin pikiran aku dengan baik, pikiran yg seringkali buat aku down bahkan sakit terus terus an. Tapi karena SEVENTEEN perlahan aku semangat lagi, punya tujuan hidup lagi dan mulai belajar mencintai diri sendiri apapun keadaannya. 

Intinya I love u guys, i loveee u so much, ayo bahagia selamanya! 
Selamat anniversary yg ke 6 Semoga bisa ngerayaain lagi sampe ke 7,8,9 atau bahkan 10 tahun lagi. 

Tapi satu hal yg pasti aku akan terus suport kalian^^
Maunya pake bahasa inggris barangkali kalian scroll dan baca tapi skill aku masih pasif hehe

author: @aivi9616
text:
Baca curhatan Carat lucu lucu dan terharu <3

Oke ikut curhat juga
Makasih ya Seventeen udah ngisi hari-hariku sama kebahagiaan tawa, canda, dan banyak emosi lain. 
Cuma mau bilang terimakasih dan maaf.
Terimakasih udah jadi penyemangat dan motivator tanpa sadar untuk ngga pernah nyerah dan selalu kerja keras.
Maafnya. Maaf kalo aku belum bisa ngasih yang terbaik buat kalian. Maaf karena belum bisa ngewujudin banyak mimpi bareng kalian. Maaf banget,, maaf banget..
Aku berharap kita terus bareng bareng. Aku akan tetep disini support kalian sebisaku, semampuku, 
Ayo tetap bersama buat waktu yang lama. Ngga peduli akan ada apa yg datang dimasa depan entah tawa atau air mata aku bakal tetep disini.
Aku percaya sama Seventeen.
Aku percaya sama Carat.
Makasih buat Carat udah jadi tempat ternyaman. Makasih udah berjuang bareng bareng buat Sebong. Ayo tetap berjuang bareng ya.
Kita pasti bisa kalo kita bersatu. Jadi, ayo kita bersatu. Bareng bareng kita pasti bisa💎

Semangat Seventeen
Semangat Carat

-💎
Thank you very much for everythings

author: @mynameis_kayepop6097
text:
I got teary eyed watching this. It's like everything they went through just flash before my eyes from their trainee days to the current them. I've been a fan of theirs since they're debut era and I'm really proud to call myself a Carat, I'm not just a fan but a family. The boys have become my family and my source of happiness in a world full of negativity. I'm thankful to have seen them in personal (through concerts) and experienced how true to themselves these boys are. They really make you feel like you're a part of their group, their friendship. No matter when you became a fan, you'll never fail to feel attached to them and wonder what their next step will be. You wish to see more of their growth and how they managed to stay humble and true amidst all diversities and their popularity.

I'm probably rambling now but I'm really just thankful to SEVENTEEN and wish them the best every step of the way. I only pray their friendship will last long.

author: @attaccult1924
text:
Happy 6th anniversary our sebongs!! Thank you for coming into my life when I needed you the most. Thank you for always being there for me when no one else was. Thank you for sharing your talents with us, you never fail to amaze us. Thank you for teaching me so many different things and for helping me discover feelings I've never even felt before. Thank you for always making us smile.

Please take care of yourselves, take rests, don't be too hard on yourselves, and don't forget to have fun too!! Know that carats will always support you no matter what, we'll stay by your side until the end. Carats are all very proud of you and everything you've achieved. 

Let's cherish these moments and make new memories together in the future!! 

I'm only one of the many millions of carats, but Seventeen will always be the one in my heart. I really can't express in words how grateful I am for you guys but one thing is for sure, all my love will always be for you. 

Together with Seventeen, 6 years of love with Seventeen 💎❤ Let's love each other 'til the end!!

author: @ting3838
text:
SEVENTEEN I OWE YOU MY LIFE. 

Thank you for helping me realize that there is light in this darkest times, thank you for being the standard, thank you for showing us how passionate you are, as much as I want to enumerate all the things I'm thankful for but I won't be able to do that but I'll pour my heart out here. Thank you for coming into my life, I'm not late because I know we met when I needed you the most. 2020 was a bitch, my plans got delayed, ruined all my plans and I lost a lot of my loved ones that I wasn't able to cope with I even prayed that if I'm gonna lose another one I can't promise to keep this life and then you came, a light in my life. You made me laugh and cry, that I never imagined someone can make me feel that way through the screens but you did, you made it possible to bring comfort through the screens. When I resigned because it was draining me emotionally and mentally, you were there for me. I tested positive with covid, you stayed by my side with all of your posts, contents and existence, you became my safe place. Your music, existence and everything that you do, inspires me to keep going but also knowing when to stop. I love you. I'm grateful for your lives, so please stay healthy and happy. Let's stay together for a long time, Seventeen.

author: @gabinqueens
text:
This is a reminder of how enormous yet pure SEVENTEEN's love for each other and to us Carats. I don't know when and if it is even possible for us to return even half the love they give us. For idols as passionate and loving as SEVENTEEN, they always say that us, being the person in the receiving end, is enough for them. Just knowing that there is us, who will apreciate their efforts and their craft is enough for them.

CARATS LET'S BE TOGETHER WITH SEVENTEEN NO MATTER WHAT, UNTIL THE LAST SAY THE NAME!

author: @haisahmadiyah5757
text:
Dear Seventeen, makasih yaaaa........ makasih buat segalanya, makasih udah debut, makasih udah selalu ngasih yang terbaik, makasih masih tetap bertahan sampe sekarang, makasih udah baik baik saja, makasih udah jadi alasan untuk ribuan carat untuk tetap semangat dan bertahan di setiap masalah, dahhh gatau lagi mau ngomong apa saking banyaknya. Pokoknya intinya 'Makasih', Anyways ini Anniv ke 3 ku sama sebong, agak nyesel baru tau sebong 3 tahun yang lalu, tapi bersyukur juga masih dikasih kesempatan buat kenal sebong dan dukung sebong. Aku emang bukan orang yang dukung sebong dari awal debut tapi aku pasti bakal dukung sebong sampe akhir and I promise to always be here for my boys......
.
Wkwkwk aku nulis apasih, banyak bgt ternyata eheheh, intinya tuh cuma "Thank you and I'm proud to be a carat" Horanghaeee everyone:)

author: @romebirdy2660
text:
I could feel the slightest wind blowing on my face, my skin, through my clothes, I could hear the sound waves of passionate and careful harmony of 13 artists and musical instruments all the way from South Korea, I could know that my heart is getting patched up in a way no other thing could heal it. I now feel the gratitude and eternal thankfulness for all the love and savageless reciprocity. 
Thank you, thank you, thank you

author: @nwenmin
text:
To.6년째 함께하는 캐럿분들과 세븐틴


데뷔 2주년 때부터 덕질해왔는데 6주년이네요 벌써 데뷔한지 6주년이라는 게 실감이 잘 나지 않는데...

으움..일단 태어나줘서 고맙구..! 세븐틴으로 데뷔해줘서 고맙고, 좋은 무대 보여줘서 고맙고, 좋은 노래 들려줘서 고맙고, 캐럿을 사랑해줘서 고마워요. 늘 좋은 모습만 보여주려고 하지 않아도 되니까 항상 건강했으면 좋겠어요.

남들에게는 그저 평범한 단어이지만, 우리에게는 세상에서 제일 특별하고 소중한 단어

'세븐틴, 그리고 캐럿'

60주년 600주년까지 캐럿들과 함께
더 예쁜 추억만 가득히 남겨요!

이 세상이 로즈쿼츠세레니티로 물들어가길


From. 덕질 4년차인데 굿즈는 고잉메거진
하나밖에 없는 세븐틴을 사랑하는 캐럿이

#흉내낼_수_없는_세븐틴_캐럿 #6년째_웃음꽃_주는_세븐틴 #세븐틴_6주년_영원히_가보자는거야 #세븐틴_캐럿_서로만_믿고가자 #6YearsOfLoveWithSEVENTEEN

author: @Vel_FanGirl
text:
umuuu🥺🥺🥺 we miss you so much. we really proud to all of what you have right now.. you really all deserve it. since then, we know how much you work hard just to make everything's okay. we really glad that even though your face a lot of hardship and trials you still stay together. you still stay and choose to be together. we CARAT are really proud of you Guys. we really thankful to you for making us happy, for bringing happiness to our daily lives. you guys are our happiness, our light and our strength like you what said before. when you were going to have a hard time, or whenever you're sad, you just guys think about us and then then you can make your self feel better.and you said we boost you energy always. then we want you to know that you're like that to us, whenever we have a hard time and we feel sad and tired, we only think about you just to make our selves feel better. you our are happiness, our energy. when I feel down, you guys gave me an energy. I love you so much, we CARAT LOVE YOU SO MUCH. I hope you don't change, I hope you continue to give happiness to the Carats who continue to love you like me. Hopefully, one day, I will have the opportunity to see you in person and be able to thank you for giving a happiness to me and to us.. you are one of the reasons why I am still able to smile even when I am sad, you are the reason why I want to get up in the morning with a smile on my face. every time I think of you, I smile spontaneously. you give color and energy to my quiet life, i love you so much SEVENTEEN. I am proud to shout and scream to the whole world that I am a member of your Fandom. I'm proud to say that I'm a Carat. I am proud to shout and scream to the whole world that you are the group i Stan and I idolize, that you are the group I love the most. i love you so so much. Thank you for being my or being our SEVENTEEN and Thank you again for making us as your 17 CARAT. WE LOVE YOU SEVENTEEN❤️❤️

author: @Nic-rb7dv
text: You see, they are not just anybody. They are family to us. I’ve seen that a lot of us became Carats just last year, when all of the things seems spiraling down, we found our way home through these 13 amazing humans. I can’t explain how thankful and emotional I am that I am here, spending my 1st anniversary with them and able to witness the wonderful things they do for us. It is not even our birthday but we are the ones getting so much from them. I am soooo sooooo thankful I get this chance to know them. I think it is not everyday that you meet someone in your life that will be able to bring comfort and home to you. Thank you, SEVENTEEN for being you. 🤍

author: @lei_16
text:
I can't really explain why is this song so special to me... I just feel so loved and safe here. Jihoon said in his birthday live that this song wasn't really supposed to exist, so that's why he had a more special attachment to it. I think that's so beautiful. What was not supposed to exist but did, is more special for some reason. 
Their voices are so good and embrace each other, comforting us. I made memories listening to this song, and I couldn't stop crying watching that video.

I'm so proud of them, of how far they've come, of how they improved so much. I realized that I was here since almost 2 years, which amazed me. Time flies so fast, I still remeber the night I listened to their music non-stop, writing in my diary. 

They give us so much love, and I hope we'll give them even more in the future. They work really hard, so let's break records and give them the feedback they deserve. <3 
Happy 6 years, boys ! We love you a lot. Let's stay happy together forever. Love you <3

정말 쿱스오빠 6년동안 그룹 이끄느라 수고 많았어요
정말 정한오빠 항상 능청스럽게 웃겨줘서 고마워요
정말 슈아오빠 언제나 멤버들 생각해줘서 고마워요
정말 준휘오빠 항상 신기한 상상력으로 웃겨줘서 고마워요
정말 순영오빠 춤 만드느라 항상 고맙고 수고했어요 고마워요
정말 원우오빠 가끔씩 한마디로 웃기게 해주어서 고마워요
정말 지훈오빠 세븐틴 노래 만들어주고 버텨줘서 고마워요
정말 명호오빠 항상 멤버들에게 팩폭 날리지만 항상 팀 생각해줘서 고마워요
정말 민규오빠 열심히 노래해주고 열심히 춤추고 노력해줘서 고마워요
정말 석민오빠 항상 웃긴데 본업은 진지하게 하면서 열심히 노래 해줘서 고마워요
정말 승관오빠 항상 본인 관리 열심히 해줘서 고마워요 
정말 한솔오빠 매일매일 웃고 뭐든 열심히 해줘서 고마워요
정말 이찬오빠 항상 열정 넘치고 뭐든 열심히 해줘서 고마워요

우리 세봉이들 6주년까지 와줘서 고마워요
사랑해요 !

author: @jaesthminie
text:
ENG Lyrics:

My love only amounts to this 
Hi, my joy 
Even in my deep despairs 
You always make me smile by my side 
It makes me momentarily forget about everything 
Turn on a song we know and take one step 
We hold hands and our feet [move] two step
Before I know it 
You make today’s me look forward to tomorrow’s you...


Baby it’s alright 
Oh it’s okay 
Because it’s only you who knows all my lies 
O ah 
I’m more thankful When I often see you tired with your head down 
Me, who doesn’t know what to do 
What can I possibly do? 
I’m sincerely sorry 
My love only amounts to this 
But thank you for staying by my side 
My baby...

Even if my love only amounts to this 
I’ll be your spring during any winter 
My heart can only say these words...

Like a meteor shower 
Be a light in the dark sky 
I can do everything for you 
I only have a big heart that wants to give you everything 
Me, who has become pathetic 
I’m a fool who only receives 
At some point, I started hating myself 
I’m even more apologetic towards you...

Baby it’s alright 
Oh it’s okay 
Because it’s only you who knows all my lies 
O ah 
I’m more thankful When I often see you tired with your head down 
Me, who doesn’t know what to do 
What can I possibly do? 
I’m sincerely sorry 
My love only amounts to this 
But thank you for staying by my side 
My baby...

Even if my love only amounts to this 
I’ll be your spring during any winter 
My heart can only say these words...

Although it’s just this song and lyrics, which contain my 
feelings that I wrote down with difficulty 
For you for you for you for you 
I sing this song for you tonight 
So that I can get closer to your love...

My love only amounts to this 
But my heart won’t change 
It’s only for you baby 
Even if my love only amounts to this 
I’ll be your umbrella when it rains 
I’ll protect you throughout all your days...

author: @camilailee
text:
Teruntuk, member Seventeen.
Terima kasih karena sudah bertahan sampai sejauh ini. Terima kasih untuk tidak menyerah menghadapi industri musik yang makin hari makin tidak tertebak, akan bagaimana pola mereka dalam menghargai makna 'musik' itu sendiri. Terima kasih, karena sudah menghasilkan banyak karya yang indah. Terima kasih untuk semua kerja keras kalian. Banyak keringat, air mata bahkan mungkin darah yang tercurah selama 6 tahun ini. Mari kita eratkan genggaman tangan kita satu sama lain agar tetap bisa bersama untuk merayakan "Seventeen's Day" di tahun-tahun berikutnya. Sekali lagi, terima kasih untuk 6 tahun yang luar biasa dan amat berharga ini💙
Salam sayang penuh kasih dari carat💎

author: @sarahgomez8399
text:
Se zarparon mal con esto, lo amé bocha. Amé sus vocales en vivo, sus expresiones, su manera de transmitir, todo; realmente me llegaron al alma porque estoy llorando y aún en shock. 
Nunca me equivoqué al unirme a este fandom, de verdad siento que Seventeen es una familia y que Carat también es parte de ella. Estoy profundamente agradecida con ellos, por darme la felicidad y energía que necesito todos los días para seguir adelante, no se hacen una idea de lo importantes que son para mí 💗💙💗💙💗💙💗💙💗💙

To my best boys,
We have each other from day one, we started from bottom until we walk on the beautiful flower path together. Our journey was not easy, there's a lot of challenges along the way but we still have each other and conquer it together. 
We are always to be proud to have each other. 

We, carats are always grateful that we these 13 best boys

❤❤
Always in our heart. Thank you Seventeen ❤

Love,
Your Carats

text: Hi I'm Kathleen my life is difficult for me but sometimes I'm okay it's just i can't handle it anymore but it's okay cause i know God is right next to me all the time  but sometimes im asking to myself if I'm okay cuz theirs no one can ask me that question do I'll do it myself and YES, sometimes  people around me asking me if I'm okay and i always answer "YES I'M FINE" but do people ask me why I'm fine because i might answer because "I'M JUST PRETENDING I'M OKAY ANG FINE" lot of people knew that im a strong girl but i think my heart is not that strong like my body ,For me why do people change personality?, I think my answer would be cuz they are so tired of being nice to people and tired of being ignore , I don't know if some people notice I'm getting angry easily want to be alone getting coldI got really scared cuz might one day all of the important people and things  it might suddenly disappear , I'm always thinking what is my Dream my lips always saying i think I want to be a Doctor but my heart i want to Dance and sometimes i really don't know what my dreams is, sometimes i justhinking about what might people think if i don't have a dream for me i don't carr if i don't have a dream cuz my happiness is more important to me we are growing up and in the time that we're old we i know that we can't do what we want like the old days when we're kids playing in groundBehind of my smile and laugh I'm crying insideI wish someday one person can understand me

author: @arinaedogawa4785
text:
Happy Anniversary SEVENTEEN! 

6th Years With Sebongs brings me a lot of experienced and the most thing is  POWER OF LOVE! Every single day I never feel Alone (NOT ALONE). When people ask me what are the luckiest thing I ever have? MY MY one and only answer is being one of your SHINING DIAMONDS( Sebongs). Then, they ask me why? I replied with, Being as a CARAT who stick TOGETHER with SEVENTEEN just a true BONDING which no one will feel the same unless they know who is their HOME to their heart. And that is you, Sebongs. You are my and our HOME, HOME, HOME, HOME! So they ask me what I am thankful for? And the only words that come out from my mouth which "THANK YOU FOR BEING BORN" to myself, other fellow Carat-deul, and our precious boys, SEVENTEEN! THANKS for let me be IN this AJU NICE (VERY NICE) family and MANSAE to us for creating 6th Years of memory, which as warmth as CAMPFIRE! I love you guys so much! Always RUN TO YOU no matter what happen next...

#6YearsOfLoveWithSEVENTEEN 
#6년째_웃음꽃_주는_세븐틴

author: @animegirl5081
text:
It's so cute to see them trying to keep a calm and sentimental atmosphere but as soon as the camera is off them you can see them smiling and jamming out haha ^^ 
💕💎HAPPY 6TH ANNIVERSARY💎💕 TO BOTH SEVENTEEN AND CARATS!!! Both have worked so hard and depend & love each other! Carats always give All Our Love to Seventeen and we receive love from Seventeen as well.
Thank you to Seventeen for staying by our side and being our light that guides us through hard times. The hard times that we navigated together were a little less dark because we could hold each other's hands. I hope we can continue to be each other's support and safe place where we can learn on each other when we need to. I hope Carats and Seventeen will take care because even after the last say the name, our memories will not be erased nor their impact lessened and I know these warm feelings will still remain forever. Thank you Seventeen for being my home. I love you~ FIGHTING~!!!💕💎

author: @youandme247__
text:
SEVENTEEN本当に6周年おめでとう
13人だからこそ歩んでこれた道であり、そこにCARATとの思い出も含まれていること、たくさんの愛を私達に与えてくれること、全てに感謝しています。本当にありがとう。SEVENTEENが存在し続ける限り、CARATはSEVENTEENを輝かせ続けるよ。
6周年という記念の日に素敵なMVを届けてくれてありがとう。大好きです。

세븐틴 정말 6주년 축하해요
13명이기에 걸어올 수 있는 길이고 거기에 캐럿들과의 추억도 담겨있는 것, 많은 사랑을 저희에게 주는 것 모두 감사합니다.정말 고마워세븐틴이 계속 존재하는 한 캐럿들은 계속 세븐틴을 빛낼 거예요.
6주년 기념일에 멋진 뮤직비디오를 전해줘서 고마워요매우 좋아합니다🤍
🍒👼🏻🐰🐱🐯🦊🍚🐸🐶🐴🍊🇺🇸🦖＋💎＝SEVENTEEN

author: @ドギョ子
text:
SEVENTEENデビュー6周年おめでとう！！！
13人もいるから、意見が食い違ったり大変なことも沢山あっただろうけど、本当に本当にこの13人がSEVENTEENで良かったなって思う。
息ぴったりの群舞は圧巻で、プラス全員がセンターに来れる実力！かっこよすぎる🥲💧
いつも大きな声で、caratちゃん〜って呼んでくれて素敵なグループを好きになったなって毎回自分を褒めてるよ！笑出会えて良かった愛
テンション上げたい時は、セブチ幸せな時もセブチ、辛くて苦しい時もそっと寄り添ってくれるセブチの歌声　笑い声　ゴセ　24時間セブチで染まってます。
これからもたくさん、花道で輝いてください！
いや、今よりもっと輝かせます！だいすきだ〜SEVENTEEN！！！

text: 이 13명의 재능 있는 남자를 만나게 해주셔서 정말 감사합니다. 제가 이 아이들을 얼마나 사랑하는지 설명할 수 없습니다. 그들과 함께한 첫 기념일이지만 저는 지금 쉬지 않고 울고 있습니다. 저는 멀티 스탠이지만 열일곱을 만났을때는 정말 다른 느낌입니다. 마치 행복을 찾은 것 같아 지금 내가 얼마나 행복한지 설명할 수 없어 나의 행복, 집, 나의 모든 것 6주년 축하해. 나는 너를 사랑해 최승철, 윤정한, 홍지수, 문준희, 권순영, 전원우, 이지훈, 서명호, 김명유, 이석민, 부승관, 초한솔, 이찬. 큰 팀이 되어줘서 고마워... 내 말은 가족이야. 내가 널 얼마나 사랑하는지 표현할 수 없어

author: @angelique_77-e4n
text:
My first year in kpop wasn't so peaceful. The first two groups I stan, well the fandoms was involved in fanwars. Then on, I was traumatized to stan a famous groups. Yet this past years, Seventeen was introduced to me. I was really overwhelmed by how carats are such a sweetheart. Then Seventeen grow more and more known each comebacks, my anxiety was on the top! I was afraid for another fanwars. But carats remain a sweetheart still. They didn't take Svt's success as their trophy. They remember the artists humble beginning and remain as a humble fandom, as well as Seventeen.

To carats, thank you for giving me another chance to stan a group in peace and to have such a great fandom. 
To Seventeen, thank you for being born.
HAPPY 6TH ANNIVERSARY!!!

author: @ynauculatingloop
text:
My love only amounts to this. 
Thank you for your genuine love. In "Thanks", you've been hoping that your typical words will reach us and yes, it did.

Now, you're sorry because your love is not enough to express your sincere gratitude to us. 

Thank you. Thank you for giving us the comfort we need at our darkest hours. Thank you for always thinking about our well being. 

Let me return the favor by saying my genuine thanks as well. 
Carathae, our boys!
